translation.en: I'm sorry that your order is running late.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，您点的餐可能会晚到一会。

translation.en: I've looked into it and I can see that your area is currently having a high volumes of order that is why they were assigning a rider for your order.
translation.zh: 我已经问过了，目前您所在地区的订单量很大，所以他们为您的订单指派了一名骑手。

translation.en: But just an update there is now a rider that has confirmed its arrival at the restaurant.
translation.zh: 最新消息是，现在有一名骑手确认他已经到达餐厅。

translation.en: Please note that if you pay for expedited shipping, the handling time for the order is still 3 business days.
translation.zh: 请注意，即使您支付了加急运输的费用，处理订单的时间仍然是 3 个工作日。

translation.en: Whenever the item ships, it will be shipped by the expedited service if you have paid for it.
translation.zh: 不过，如果您支付了此费用，无论何时发货，都将通过加急服务运输。

translation.en: Business days do not include Saturdays, Sundays and Federal Holidays.
translation.zh: 工作日不包括周六、周日和联邦假日。

translation.en: International shipments are usually delivered within 11 to 22 business days, depending on the time it takes to clear customs.
translation.zh: 国际包裹通常在 11 至 22 个工作日内送达，具体时间取决于清关时间。

translation.en: Shipping Rate - Free Standard Shipping if shown as free in the product
translation.zh: 运费 - 如果产品中显示为免费，则提供免费标准快递服务

translation.en: Note 1: Some countries may charge additional fees at local customs.
translation.zh: 注 1：有些国家的海关可能会收取额外费用。

translation.en: Please call your customs, or google it for exact charges.
translation.zh: 请致电海关或在 Google 上搜索，以了解确切的费用。

translation.en: Note 2: Any customs charges or taxes in the buyer's country will be paid by the buyer and we will not reimburse any amount whatsoever.
translation.zh: 注 2：买方国家收取的任何海关费用或税费将由买方支付，我们不会报销任何金额。

translation.en: We guarantee your satisfaction and offer a 30-day money-back return (or exchange) policy.
translation.zh: 为了让您满意，我们提供 30 天的退款（或换货）政策。

translation.en: If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your purchase, please contact us first before you leave negative/neutral feedback so that we can make things right!
translation.zh: 如果您因为任何原因对购买的商品不满意，请在给予中差评之前先联系我们，我们会帮您解决问题！

translation.en: You have 30 days to return the item from the day it was ordered.
translation.zh: 订购之日起 30 天内可以退货。

translation.en: You must furnish tracking numbers once you ship the item back to us.
translation.zh: 如果您退货，请您提供快递单号。

translation.en: IF the PRODUCT is DAMAGED or TAGS ARE REMOVED or USED Or WORN by you, then the RETURN IS INVALID.
translation.zh: 如果产品损坏、标签已剪掉、用过或有磨损，则不可退货。

translation.en: Return Duty in the Buyer's country if levied has to be paid by the buyer.
translation.zh: 退货时在买方国家产生的关税由买方支付。

translation.en: We take absolute care that precious jewels are packed well so that there is no damage to the product.
translation.zh: 对于贵重的珠宝，我们会细心打包，以免损坏产品。

translation.en: They are delivered in an elegant box, ideal for gifting to someone special.
translation.zh: 珠宝会装在一个高档盒子里，非常适合送给特别的人。

translation.en: Feedback & DSRs (Detailed Seller Ratings).
translation.zh: 反馈和 DSR（卖方详细评级）。

translation.en: “Our priority is to have 100% customer satisfaction and ensure that you have a great shopping experience.
translation.zh: “让顾客 100% 满意，为顾客提供出色的购物体验，是我们的第一要务。

translation.en: You can feel safe to trust us and please contact us should you have any question or comment.
translation.zh: 我们值得您信任，如果您有任何问题或意见，请联系我们。

translation.en: We take the feedback you leave with utmost importance.
translation.zh: 我们非常重视您的反馈。

translation.en: If for any reason you are dissatisfied or unhappy with our products or service, do first reach out to us and give us an opportunity to set things right.
translation.zh: 如果您因任何原因对我们的产品或服务不满意，请先联系我们，给我们一个解决问题的机会。

translation.en: We do not want any negative feedback rating and these cannot be changed once given, so do give us an opportunity to provide a faster resolution for any issue you may face.”
translation.zh: 我们不想收到任何差评，而且差评是不可更改的，所以请给我们一个机会，我们会很快解决您遇到的问题。”

translation.en: We specialise in Custom Made Solitaire Diamond Rings, Engagement Rings, Wedding Bands, Diamond Earrings, Wedding Necklace, Pendants and Loose Diamond Solitaire along with many gift items.
translation.zh: 我们专门从事钻石戒指、订婚戒指、结婚戒指、钻石耳环、婚礼项链、吊坠和单颗祼钻以及许多礼品的定制。

translation.en: We have also introduced Diamond jewelry in 92.5 Sterling Silver.
translation.zh: 我们还推出了 92.5 纯银钻石首饰。

translation.en: Our range includes Rings, Earrings, Pendants and Mangalsutra.
translation.zh: 我们的产品包括戒指、耳环、吊坠和 Mangalsutra。

translation.en: We have over 6 decades of experience in Jewelry Manufacturing.
translation.zh: 我们拥有超过 60 年的珠宝制作经验。

translation.en: We also deal in wholesale and export of 14 K, 18 K Handmade and Machine-made Gold Diamond Jewelry.
translation.zh: 我们还经营 14 K、18 K 手工和机制黄金钻石首饰的批发和出口业务。

translation.en: Libya: plan for presidential election on 24 December close to collapse
translation.zh: 利比亚：12 月 24 日选举总统的计划近乎流产

translation.en: The chances of Libya staging its first presidential elections on the long planned date of 24 December appeared close to collapse on Sunday after the body overseeing the vote said it was unable to announce the the approved candidates because of continued legal doubts.
translation.zh: 周日，利比亚计划了很久的 12 月 24 日举行首次总统选举的可能性似乎接近破灭，此前，监督投票的机构表示，由于法律方面仍存在疑问，无法宣布批准的候选人。

translation.en: With the elections less than a fortnight away and virtually no time for campaigning, a postponement would represent a bitter blow to the international community's hopes of reuniting the deeply divided country.
translation.zh: 在距离选举不到两周、几乎没有竞选时间的情况下，推迟选举对国际社会抱有的重新统一这个严重分裂国家的希望是个沉重的打击。

translation.en: Foreign powers will also fear the overall momentum towards democracy could dissipate.
translation.zh: 外国势力也会担心民主的整体势头会消失。

translation.en: In the short term they will have to agree whether or not the interim government continues in order to fill the political vacuum and prevent a return to civil war.
translation.zh: 他们必须在短时间内就临时政府是否继续存在达成一致，以填补政治真空并防止内战重新爆发。

translation.en: A series of court rulings have overturned the Libyan electoral commission's decisions to block high-profile figures including Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, the son of the former dictator, from standing for the presidency.
translation.zh: 一系列法庭裁决推翻了利比亚选举委员会阻止包括前独裁者的儿子赛义夫•伊斯兰•卡扎菲 (Saif al-Islam Gaddafi) 在内的知名人物竞选总统的决定。

translation.en: The interim prime minister, Abdul Hamid Dbeibah and warlord Khalifa Haftar, the head of the self-styled Libyan National Army, have meanwhile been approved by the commission but subsequently appealed by other parties.
translation.zh: 与此同时，临时总理阿卜杜勒•哈米德•德贝巴赫 (Abdul Hamid Dbeibah) 和自封的利比亚国民军首领、军阀哈利法•哈夫塔 (Khalifa Haftar) 得到了委员会的批准，但随后受到了其他党派的上诉。

translation.en: It said in a statement on Saturday it said could not announce the names of the approved candidates out of the nearly who 100 have applied because it was "keen to exhaust all means of litigation to ensure its decisions comply with issued judgements."
translation.zh: 该委员会在周六发表的一份声明中表示，不会公布近 100 名申请者中已经获得批准的候选人的名字，因为它“愿意用尽所有诉讼手段，以确保其决定符合已发布的判决”。

translation.en: Rival factions have accused each other of intimidating or bribing judicial officials to secure their reinstatement of their candidates, and the commission is looking to see if the decisions were valid.
translation.zh: 对立的派系互相指责对方胁迫或贿赂司法官员，以确保其候选人的复职，委员会正在观察这些决定是否有效。

translation.en: In the case of Dbeibah, he had pledged as a condition of becoming interim PM that he would not stand for election but has since argued in court that this was a moral pledge with no legal force.
translation.zh: 在德贝巴赫一案中，他曾承诺以不参加选举作为当选临时总理的条件，但他后来在法庭上辩称，这只是一个道德承诺，没有法律效力。

translation.en: Saif Gaddafi was convicted in absentia in 2015 on war crimes charges for his part in fighting the revolution that toppled his father, Muammar Gaddafi.
translation.zh: 赛义夫·卡扎菲于 2015 年在未出庭的情况下被判战争罪，罪名是参与推翻他父亲穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲的革命。

translation.en: He denies wrongdoing.
translation.zh: 他否认了这项指控。

translation.en: The presence of tens of thousands of foreign fighters, mercenaries and indigenous militia make the country a tinderbox, and there are fears an election conducted with disputed candidates would only lead to a result that was not recognized.
translation.zh: 数以万计的外国武装分子、雇佣军和当地民兵的存在使这个国家成为一个火药桶，人们担心由有争议的候选人参与选举只会导致选举结果不被承认。

translation.en: In a sign of the tensions over foreign forces, France is pressing the EU to agree on Monday to impose sanctions on the Russian private military contractor Wagner Group, which it says operates in Libya and the Sahel.
translation.zh: 法国正在向欧盟施压，要求欧盟周一同意对俄罗斯私人军事承包商瓦格纳集团 (Wagner Group) 实施制裁，法国表示，该集团在利比亚和萨赫勒地区开展业务。

translation.en: Moscow denies Wagner is linked to the Russian state and has said it would retaliate against EU sanctions placed on its citizens.
translation.zh: 莫斯科否认瓦格纳与俄罗斯政府有联系，并表示将对欧盟对其公民实施的制裁进行报复。

translation.en: The international community's ability to demand the Libyan political class stick to the 24 December election date, which was first agreed in February, has been hampered by the appointment of a UN special envoy, Ján Kubiš, who resigned three weeks before the elections after less than a year in the post.
translation.zh: 国际社会要求利比亚政治阶层按照 2 月达成的一致意见仍于 12 月 24 日进行选举的能力受到了联合国任命的特使 Ján Kubiš 的阻碍，这位联合国特使在利比亚选举前三周辞职，此前他在该职位任职不到一年。

translation.en: The UN secretary general, António Guterres, has since appointed Stephanie Williams, a forceful former UN deputy special envoy, to act as his special adviser.
translation.zh: 联合国秘书长 António Guterres 此前已经任命精明强干的前联合国副特使 Stephanie Williams 出任他的特别顾问。

translation.en: Russia vetoed her appointment as a full envoy, but she has deep knowledge of Libya and last year displayed a willingness to confront those in the political class opposed to elections.
translation.zh: 但是俄罗斯否决了对她的正式特使任命，她对利比亚了解颇深，去年还表现出了对抗反对选举的政治阶层的意愿。

translation.en: The UN mission issued a statement urging all sides not to reverse the gains made, pointing to the registration of nearly 3 million voters, the successful distribution of voter cards and the applications of large numbers of candidates for the presidency and parliament as signs of deep popular support for elections.
translation.zh: 联合国代表团发表声明，敦促各方不要扭转所取得的成果，指出登记了近 300 万的选民，成功分发了选民卡和许多人申请成为总统和议员候选人，这些都是受到民众支持的迹象。

translation.en: The US ambassador to Libya, Richard Norland, said "refusing to go to the elections and mobilizing to obstruct will only place the fate and future of the country at the mercy of those inside Libya and their external backers who prefer bullet power over ballot power."
translation.zh: 美国驻利比亚大使理查德·诺兰德 (Richard Norland) 说:“拒绝参加选举，动员民众进行阻挠，只会把国家的命运和未来置于利比亚内部和他们的外部支持者的摆布之下，这些人更喜欢子弹的力量，而不是投票权。”

translation.en: Android hardware Cleaning tip
translation.zh: Android 硬件清洁窍门

translation.en: Thin (0.3mm - 0.5mm) DRY interdental brushes are ideal for clearing those tiny port holes which house your smart device microphones and speakers.
translation.zh: 细细的（0.3 毫米- 0.5 毫米）DRY 牙间刷是清洁智能设备麦克风和扬声器所在的微小端口孔的理想选择。

translation.en: They are a cheap product and safer than many other methods, such as rubbing alcohols, tooth picks, pins, and needles.
translation.zh: 牙间刷很便宜，而且比酒精、牙签、大头针和缝衣针等这些方法都更安全。

translation.en: I just used this method to clear the microphone port on my Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic as it was not registering my voice when using speech to text functions.
translation.zh: 我刚刚用这个方法清理了我的三星 Galaxy Watch 4 Classic 的麦克风端口，因为我在使用语音转文本功能时，手机没有录制我的声音。

translation.en: After months of thinking, I would need to arrange a warranty replacement or need to book a repair.
translation.zh: 在经过几个月反复思考是否需要安排保修更换或预约维修之后。

translation.en: After much frustration shouting at my watch during phone calls so I could be heard and/or understood.
translation.zh: 在为了让别人能听到和/或听懂我说的话而在打电话时对着手表大喊大叫之后。

translation.en: After following manufacturer advice and using the water lock functions, resetting the device AND factory restoring my device.
translation.zh: 在按照制造商的建议并使用水锁功能复位设备并恢复设备出厂设置之后。

translation.en: And after scouring the internet on multiple occasions.
translation.zh: 在网上搜索好几遍之后。

translation.en: There seemed to be no guaranteed satisfaction.
translation.zh: 没有什么办法能让我满意。

translation.en: Then I had a revelation and I tried interdental brushes, and they work...
translation.zh: 然后我灵机一动，试了试牙间刷，它们很管用……

translation.en: They work very VERY well!
translation.zh: 非常非常管用！

translation.en: After a few pokes and twizzles with the thin but firm bristled rod, your device should work just as it did when it was brand new.
translation.zh: 用这根细而结实的鬃毛棒拨弄几下之后，您的设备就能像全新的时候一样工作了。

translation.en: *I advise this be done with a dry brush, and will not accept any repercussion if you decide to use it with any combination of any cleaning product.
translation.zh: *我建议使用干毛刷，如果您要配合其他清洁产品使用，后果自负。

translation.en: South Africa Pays Tribute to Last Apartheid Leader De Klerk
translation.zh: 南非向最后一位实施种族隔离制度的领袖德克勒克致敬

translation.en: South Africa on Sunday paid an official tribute to FW de Klerk, the final president of white rule, who freed Nelson Mandela from prison and steered the country from apartheid to democracy.
translation.zh: 南非周日正式向白人统治下的最后一任总统德克勒克 (FW de Klerk) 致敬，德克勒克将纳尔逊·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 从监狱中释放出来，带领南非从种族隔离制度走向民主。

translation.en: De Klerk died on November 11 aged 85 following a battle with cancer.
translation.zh: 11 月 11 日，德克勒克在与癌症抗争后去世，享年 85 岁。

translation.en: Four days of national mourning were declared in his honor.
translation.zh: 为纪念他，宣布全国哀悼四天。

translation.en: He served as president from 1989 to 1994 and is remembered most for leading South Africa's transition from white-minority rule to the first multi-racial elections in 1994.
translation.zh: 他于 1989 年至 1994 年担任南非总统，并因领导南非从少数白人统治过渡到 1994 年首次多种族选举而被人们铭记。

translation.en: De Klerk also shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Mandela in 1993 after freeing him from prison in 1990.
translation.zh: 德克勒克在 1990 年将曼德拉从监狱释放，并于 1993 年与他共同获得了诺贝尔和平奖。

translation.en: Mandela then became South Africa's first black president after his African National Congress party won the 1994 election.
translation.zh: 1994 年，曼德拉领导的非洲人国民大会党 (African National Congress party) 赢得大选，成为南非首位黑人总统。

translation.en: President Cyril Ramaphosa attended Cape Town's Protestant Groote Kerk - one of South Africa's oldest churches - on Sunday morning to deliver a eulogy in De Klerk's honor.
translation.zh: 南非总统西里尔·拉马福萨 (Cyril Ramaphosa) 周日上午现身于开普敦的新教格鲁特教堂（南非最古老的教堂之一），为德克勒克致悼词。

translation.en: "He was often misunderstood due to his over-correctness," De Klerk's widow Elita Georgiadis told around 200 attendees.
translation.zh: “由于他矫枉过正，他经常被误解，”德克勒克的遗孀 Elita Georgiadis 向约 200 名与会者诉说。

translation.en: I shall never forget this man who mesmerized me, who made me want to help him achieve this huge task ahead of him.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记他，他让我着迷，他让我想要帮助他完成摆在他面前的艰巨任务。

translation.en: A private mass and the national anthem preceded the ceremony, which featured a portrait of De Klerk between two candles and a choir decorated with white flowers.
translation.zh: 仪式前举行了私人弥撒，并奏起了国歌，两根蜡烛中间放着德克勒克的肖像，还有一个戴着白花的唱诗班。

translation.en: Despite a positive reputation abroad, De Klerk divided opinion in South Africa and his death prompted mixed reactions.
translation.zh: 尽管德克勒克在国外享有良好声誉，但南非国内对他的看法却存在分歧，他的去世引发了不同的反应。

translation.en: Critics say he remains inseparable from apartheid-era crimes and could have been held accountable for them had he lived longer.
translation.zh: 批评人士说，他仍然与种族隔离时期的罪行密不可分，如果他活得久一点，可能会被追究责任。

translation.en: De Klerk represented the National Party, which in 1948 formally established apartheid's racial segregation and disenfranchisement of South Africa's non-white majority.
translation.zh: 德克勒克代表国民党，该党在 1948 年正式确立了种族隔离制度，剥夺了南非占多数的非白人的选举权。

translation.en: Outside the church, a small group of protesters held signs saying, "Justice denied" and "Justice for apartheid victims" and were swiftly led away by police.
translation.zh: 在教堂外，一小群抗议者举着标语，上面写着“拒绝正义”和“为种族隔离受害者伸张正义”，他们很快被警察带走。

translation.en: The surrounding area was closed to traffic and placed under high security.
translation.zh: 周边地区已封锁交通，并处于高度戒备状态。

translation.en: Comments in his final years also tarnished De Klerk's image amid criticism for his failure to apologize officially for the crimes of apartheid.
translation.zh: 德克勒克最后几年的言论也损害了他的形象，因为他没有就种族隔离的罪行正式道歉。

translation.en: In 2020, he denied apartheid was a crime against humanity before retracting the statement and apologizing.
translation.zh: 2020 年，他否认种族隔离是反人类罪，然后收回声明并道歉。

translation.en: De Klerk's foundation issued a posthumous video apologizing "for the pain, hurt, indignity and damage that apartheid has done" to South Africa's non-white populations.
translation.zh: 德克勒克的基金会在他死后发布了一段视频，为种族隔离制度对南非非白人人口“造成的痛苦、伤害、侮辱和损害”道歉。

translation.en: I'm unable to make any changes once the order has been placed however, when the rider leaves the restaurant you will be able to contact them through the app.
translation.zh: 下单后，我就无法更改订单，但是在骑手离开餐厅后，您可以通过 App 与他联系。

translation.en: You can also track your rider through the app and phone them once they’re nearby.
translation.zh: 您还可以通过 App 跟踪骑手，等他到了附近给他打电话。

translation.en: For future orders, you can add instructions for your rider by editing your saved addresses in the app.
translation.zh: 对于未来的订单，您可以在 App 中编辑您保存的地址，为骑手添加说明。

translation.en: Avalanche at Washington state ski resort kills 1, traps 5
translation.zh: 华盛顿州滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成 1 人死亡，5 人被困

translation.en: An avalanche swept through part of a Washington state ski resort used to access backcountry skiing on Saturday, killing a 60-year-old man and temporarily trapping five others.
translation.zh: 周六，华盛顿州一处滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成一名 60 岁男子死亡，另有 5 人暂时被困。

translation.en: The avalanche was reported about 10:50 a.m. in the Silver Basin area of Crystal Mountain, which is located about 85 miles (137 kilometers) southeast of Seattle, said Pierce County Sheriff's Department Sgt. Darren Moss.
translation.zh: 皮尔斯县警长达伦·莫斯 (Darren Moss) 说，雪崩发生在上午 10 点 50 分左右，地点在西雅图东南约 85 英里（137 公里）的水晶山银盆地区。

translation.en: The identity of the man who died hasn't been released, but authorities say he wasn't breathing after being pulled out of the snow and didn't survive despite CPR efforts by another skier.
translation.zh: 死亡男子的身份尚未公布，但当局表示，他被从雪中拉出来后就没有了呼吸，有一名滑雪者对他进行了心肺复苏，但他还是没能活下来。

translation.en: The other skiers in his group rescued themselves with the help of two witnesses who saw them get swept up by the snow.
translation.zh: 在两名目击者的帮助下，与该男子一起的其他滑雪者获救，这两名目击者看到他们被雪吞没。

translation.en: All were wearing avalanche beacons.
translation.zh: 所有人都带着雪崩信标。

translation.en: While all of those caught in the avalanche were experienced backcountry skiers, a warning had been issued against skiing in the area, which was just inside the boundaries of Crystal Mountain Resort.
translation.zh: 被雪崩困住的都是经验丰富的野外滑雪者，但其实水晶山度假村边界以内的地区已经发布了禁止滑雪的警告。

translation.en: The private ski resort determines the conditions but there is nothing that stops skiers from going there because the property abuts public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest.
translation.zh: 虽然该私人滑雪度假村了解相关情况，但没有障碍物阻止滑雪者前往那里，因为它与贝克-斯诺夸尔米山国家森林的公共土地相毗邻。

translation.en: Frank DeBerry, the resort's president and CEO, said all six men held the ski resort's uphill travel passes, which means they were registered with ski patrol, participated in an orientation on how and where to access backcountry skiing through the resort's property and were required to check snow conditions prior to their excursion.
translation.zh: 该度假村的总裁兼首席执行官弗兰克·德贝里 (Frank DeBerry) 说，这六个人都有度假村的上山通行证，也就是说他们在滑雪巡逻队登记过，并且了解过如何以及通过度假村的哪个位置进入野外滑雪，他们应该被要求在远足之前检查过雪的条件。

translation.en: "Skiers can travel at will wherever they want in the national forest.
translation.zh: “滑雪者有权到国家森林里旅行。

translation.en: They had gone out into the forest but ended up back in bounds (of the resort) where this slide occurred," DeBerry said
translation.zh: 他们已经跑到森林里去了，但最后又回到了发生雪崩的地方，”德贝里表示。

translation.en: In addition to shutting the area where the slide occurred, the resort earlier in the day closed the Mt. Rainier Gondola because of winds reaching 100 miles per hour (161 kilometers per hour).
translation.zh: 除了关闭发生滑坡的区域外，该度假村当天早些时候还关闭了进山道路。雷尼尔贡多拉的风速达到每小时 100 英里（每小时 161 公里）。

translation.en: The avalanche came amid the season's first major snowfall.
translation.zh: 雪崩发生时正值这个季节的第一场大雪。

translation.en: The area is under a winter storm warning until Sunday morning, with the National Weather Service saying 12 to 15 inches (38 centimeters) of snow is possible for areas above 2,000 feet (610 meters).
translation.zh: 该地区的冬季风暴预警将持续到周日上午，美国国家气象局表示，在 2000 英尺（610 米）以上的地区可能会 有12 至 15 英寸（38 厘米）的降雪。

translation.en: "We've had a late start to the season and now we've gone from virtually no snow to a giant snow storm.
translation.zh: “今年雪来得比较晚，从一点雪都没下到突然来了一场暴雪，

translation.en: People got excited," DeBerry said.
translation.zh: 人们都很兴奋，”德贝里说。

translation.en: "We all have to remember that it's a sport that carries risk."
translation.zh: “我们都必须记住，滑雪有风险。”

translation.en: Crystal Mountain is the largest ski resort in Washington state, encompassing 2,600 acres (1,052 hectares).
translation.zh: 水晶山是华盛顿州最大的滑雪胜地，占地 2600 英亩（1052 公顷）。

translation.en: Description Please scroll to the bottom of the listing for more pictures.
translation.zh: 说明 滚动到列表底部可查看更多图片。

translation.en: Here we have for sale a Genuine Longines used chronograph wristwatch dial.
translation.zh: 我们有一只使用计时腕表表盘的正品浪琴出售。

translation.en: The dial is black in colour with white markers and a date aperature in the bottom sub dial.
translation.zh: 黑色的表盘，白色的标记，日期在底部的小表盘中显示。

translation.en: The dial is in very good, if not new old stock, condition.
translation.zh: 即使不是全新库存货，表盘的状况也非常良好。

translation.en: The back of the dial is unmarked.
translation.zh: 表盘背面没有标记。

translation.en: The dial measures 37mm in diameter and the dial feet are at approximately 7 and 37.
translation.zh: 表盘直径 37 毫米，面脚约为 7 和 37。

translation.en: Please see the pictures for more details.
translation.zh: 详情请见图片。

translation.en: The dial is guaranteed genuine.
translation.zh: 表盘保证是正品。

translation.en: Payment Payment is expected within 5 working days.
translation.zh: 请在 5 个工作日内付款。

translation.en: We accept payment by Paypal, Bank Transfer or payment on collection.
translation.zh: 我们接受 Paypal 付款、银行转账或托收付款。

translation.en: We do not have the facility to accept credit or debit cards directly, but these are acceptable though Paypal.
translation.zh: 我们不接受信用卡或借记卡付款，但接受 Paypal 付款。

translation.en: In some circumstances, we may only accept bank transfer, for example for an international transaction where a buyer has very low or no feedback.
translation.zh: 在某些情况下，我们可能只接受银行转账，例如，在买家无评价或评价很低的国际交易中。

translation.en: Shipping for domestic shipping we use 3 different types.
translation.zh: 对于国内订单，我们使用三种快递。

translation.en: The specified options vary per auction.
translation.zh: 每次拍卖指定的选项都不同。

translation.en: We normally use Royal Mail first class recorded for packages under £40 in value and Royal Mail special delivery for items over £40 in value.
translation.zh: 对于价值 40 英镑以下的包裹，我们通常使用 Royal Mail First Class，超过 40 英镑的包裹则使用 Royal Mail Special Delivery。

translation.en: Special delivery compensation levels are £500, £1000 and £2500 and we will cover your package for the relevant amount if this service is used.
translation.zh: Special Delivery 的赔付金额为 500 英镑、1000 英镑和 2500 英镑，如果您使用这项服务，我们将为您的包裹支付相应的金额。

translation.en: The third service we use in the UK is courier delivery which will normally be Citylink by 5.30pm next day.
translation.zh: 英国订单使用的第三项服务是普通快递，通常会在第二天下午 5:30 前由 Citylink 揽收。

translation.en: We only use this service for heavy or bulky items.
translation.zh: 我们只对很重或大件商品使用这项服务。

translation.en: For international shipping, we use 2 different methods.
translation.zh: 对于国际运输，我们使用两种方式。

translation.en: The main method of delivery is Royal Mail international Signed for.
translation.zh: 主要的邮寄方式是 Royal Mail international Signed for。

translation.en: This is a service that requires a signature on delivery but is only tracked within the UK.
translation.zh: 这项服务在投递时需要签名，但只能追踪英国境内的物流情况。

translation.en: However, delivery confirmation is available online.
translation.zh: 不过，送货确认可在网上看到。

translation.en: The maximum compensation level for this service is £500 and delivery times vary from destination to destination.
translation.zh: 这项服务的最高赔付金额是 500 英镑，送货时间因目的地而异。

translation.en: Also available at extra cost if required is next day international deliveries by FEDEX global express.
translation.zh: 如果需要，也可额外付费使用次日达联邦快递国际快递。

translation.en: This is on a quote only basis and you need to supply us with your address for a quotation.
translation.zh: 这只是基础报价，具体报价视您的地址而定。

translation.en: The maximum compensation level on this service is $1000 Terms of Sale.
translation.zh: 根据销售条款，这项服务的最高赔付金额是 1000 美元。

translation.en: All sales are final and we expect payment within 5 working days.
translation.zh: 所有销售均为最终销售，您应在 5 个工作日内付款。

translation.en: We offer a 30 day refund policy for items as long as they are received back in the original condition they were shipped in with all original packaging and they have not been tampered with.
translation.zh: 商品 30 天内可退货，前提是退回时的初始状况与发货时一样，原始包装都在，且没有损坏。

translation.en: We reserve the right to place restrictions on payment terms for items shipped to certain international destinations, such as ones where there is a high risk of fraud.
translation.zh: 我们保留对运送到某些国外目的地的商品的付款条款进行限制的权利，例如那些欺诈风险很高的目的地。

translation.en: We have been selling here on eBay for over a decade now, offering high quality items at great prices.
translation.zh: 我们已经在 eBay 经营了十多年，商品物美价廉。

translation.en: We both buy and sell premium brand watches on and offline and all our watches are checked by WOSTEP (Watches of Switzerland Training Enterprise Program) trained watchmakers.
translation.zh: 我们的网店和实体店买卖优质品牌手表，我们所有的手表都由 WOSTEP（瑞士钟表培训企业计划）培训过的制表师检查过。

translation.en: Where stated, watches will come with a mechanical warranty.
translation.zh: 凡有注明的，手表附有机械装置保修服务。

translation.en: Warranty does not cover misuse or abuse of watches and it is advised that all vintage watches should be tested for water resistance before any immersion.
translation.zh: 保修范围不包括误用或滥用手表，建议所有古董表在浸入水之前都应测试防水性能。

translation.en: If you wish to contact us, you may do so by using the contact seller button on the listing.
translation.zh: 如果要与我们联系，请使用清单上的“联系卖家”按钮。

translation.en: We are always interested to hear from new suppliers and we can also supply wholesale pricing on some items we sell other than watches.
translation.zh: 欢迎新供应商与我们联系，我们也以批发价格供应除手表外的其他商品。

translation.en: We are proud to be independant and we are not sponsored, approved nor endorsed by any of the brands that we sell, including Rolex.
translation.zh: 我们是独立的商店，没有得到任何品牌的赞助、批准或认可，包括劳力士。

translation.en: We value our feedback as we believe it says a lot about how we look after customers.
translation.zh: 我们重视顾客的评价，因为顾客的反馈可以反映我们的服务水平。

translation.en: We always leave feedback for our customers after we have received feedback ourselves for an item, as this lets us know that the item purchased has been received and that the customer is happy with it.
translation.zh: 我们在收到顾客的评价后，也会回应顾客，因为这说明顾客已经收到商品并对商品感到满意。

translation.en: If, however, you are not satisfied in any way, please let us know before leaving feedback so that we can try to rectify any issues
translation.zh: 不过，如果您有不满意之处，请在评价前联系我们，我们会尽力解决您的问题

translation.en: Get Supersized Images & Free Image Hosting
translation.zh: 获取超大尺寸图像和免费的图像托管

translation.en: Attention Sellers - Get Templates Image Hosting, Scheduling at Auctiva.com.
translation.zh: 卖家注意 - 从 Auctiva.com 获得模板图像托管。

translation.en: Track Page Views With Auctiva's FREE Count
translation.zh: 使用 Auctiva 的免费计数跟踪页面浏览量

translation.en: Dive into an immersive story encased in Black Desert's expansive world that's just waiting to be explored.
translation.zh: 《黑色沙漠》的广阔世界中有许多精彩的故事等着人们去探索。

translation.en: Accompanied by a Black Spirit, a companion whose destiny is intertwined with their own, players will discover the secret of the Black Stones and the history of their corrupting effects.
translation.zh: 在游戏中，玩家们与黑精灵的命运相互交织，相互陪伴着去探索黑石的秘密和充满腐败的历史。

translation.en: Players will enjoy jaw-dropping graphics with an insane level of character customization across 19 character classes.
translation.zh: 令人叹为观止的画面，19 个角色职业和角色高度定制功能，将让玩家们爱不释手。

translation.en: Each class offers intuitive skill-based combat, equipped with set of unique skills which can be freely combined into exciting and effective combos, always keeping you on your toes.
translation.zh: 每个职业都提供直观的基于技能的战斗，配备了一套独特的技能，可以自由组合为令人向往且有效果的连击，让人不忍错眼。

translation.en: Black Desert Prestige Edition is a living-world MMORPG with $140 worth of bonus content.
translation.zh: 《黑色沙漠》尊贵版是动态世界的 MMORPG，含有价值 140 美元的奖励内容。

translation.en: Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends in a guild to siege nodes and castles, and train in a variety of life skills such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, sailing, and much more!
translation.zh: 体验快节奏、动作场面多的战斗、猎杀怪物和大型头目，与朋友在公会中搏斗，围攻节点和城堡，并训练各种生活技能，如钓鱼、贸易、手工制作、烹饪、航海等等！

translation.en: Robust Character Creation Tools - Make the character YOU want to play.
translation.zh: 强大的角色创造工具 - 创造你想玩的角色。

translation.en: Seamless Movement Throughout the World - No loading times necessary as you explore.
translation.zh: 在整个世界无缝移动 - 在你探索的过程中，不需要任何加载时间。

translation.en: Combo-Oriented, Non-Targeted Combat - Take part in fast-paced, action-packed combat with skills that can be chained through combos.
translation.zh: 以连击为导向的无定位战斗 - 参与快节奏、动作场面多的战斗，可以通过连击来连接技能。

translation.en: Unique Weather and Climate - The weather and climate will have various effects on different zones that players can adapt to.
translation.zh: 独特的天气和气候 - 天气和气候将对不同的区域产生玩家可以适应的不同影响。

translation.en: Day/Night Cycle - Along with unique weather and climate changes, the game revolves around a day/night cycle that alters NPC behavior and triggers various events based on the time of day.
translation.zh: 日/夜循环 - 伴随着独特的天气和气候变化，游戏围绕着改变 NPC 行为的日/夜循环进行，并根据一天中的时间触发各种事件。

translation.en: Instanced Player Housing - From tents to palaces and everything in between, players can furnish and customize their own homes and can hire NPCs to keep your place clean or purchase things from the marketplace.
translation.zh: 实例化玩家住房 - 从帐篷到宫殿等等，玩家可以布置和定制自己的房屋，并可以雇佣 NPC 来清洁住所或从市场购买物品。

translation.en: Mounted Combat - Utilize your trusted mounts on the battlefield and take advantage of their mobility and effectiveness in combat.
translation.zh: 坐骑战斗 - 在战场上驾乘你信任的坐骑，在战斗中充分利用它们的机动性和有效性。

translation.en: Keep in mind, however, that mounts will need to be cared for, housed and protected as they can die in combat.
translation.zh: 不过，请记住，坐骑需要照顾、安置和保护，因为它们可能会在战斗中死去。

translation.en: Boss Hunts - Group up with friends or other players to hunt down field bosses and world bosses to get that rare loot.
translation.zh: 猎杀头目 - 与朋友或其他玩家组队追捕野外头目和世界头目以获得稀有战利品。

translation.en: Siege Warfare - Massive free-for-all guild battles!
translation.zh: 攻城战 - 大规模的自由公会战斗！

translation.en: Join a guild and participate in daily node wars or weekly conquest wars against many other competing guilds.
translation.zh: 加入一个公会，并参与每日的节点战争或每周的征服战争，对抗许多其他竞争性的公会。

translation.en: Win the node or castle and claim it for a week to collect taxes to increase your guild funds.
translation.zh: 赢得节点或城堡，可以占领一周，并可收集税收来增加公会资金。

translation.en: Ocean Contents - Craft your boat and make sail to the vast oceans to fish, hunt ocean monsters and bosses, underwater exploring and gathering, quest missions, trade, and so much more.
translation.zh: 海洋内容 - 可以制作船只，航行到广阔的海洋捕鱼，狩猎海洋怪物和头目，进行水下探险和采集，探寻任务，进行贸易，等等。

translation.en: Taming & Breeding - Catch and tame horses and elephants in the wild to make it your mount.
translation.zh: 驯服和繁殖 - 在野外捕捉和驯服马和大象，使它们成为你的坐骑。

translation.en: You can also breed horses for better offspring with improved mount stats and skills.
translation.zh: 你也可以培育更好的马匹后代，提高坐骑属性和技能。

translation.en: Crafting - Enjoy all aspects of crafting in Black Desert from tools, weapons, armor, jewelry, boats, costumes, outfits, and more.
translation.zh: 手工制作 - 在《黑色沙漠》中，可以体验亲手制作工具、武器、盔甲、珠宝、船、服装等的乐趣。

translation.en: Just about everything can be crafted in the world of Black Desert.
translation.zh: 在《黑色沙漠》的世界里，几乎可以手工制作一切东西。

translation.en: Professions - Take part and grow your character into a profession that can help your income.
translation.zh: 职业 - 参与其中，让你的角色成长为能增加收入的职业。

translation.en: With professions like gathering, processing, cooking, alchemy, training, fishing, hunting, trading, farming, and sailing, you can choose to play Black Desert Online the way you want to.
translation.zh: 你可以选择从事采集、加工、烹饪、炼金术、训练、钓鱼、狩猎、贸易、农耕和航海等职业，按照自己喜欢的方式来玩《黑色沙漠Online》。

translation.en: Thank you for the information.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识您。

translation.en: I hope you are having a great day!
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天！

translation.en: I apologize but I'm unable to find an account under the email provided.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，我找不到您提供的电子邮件帐户。

translation.en: The other thing you can try is to perform a factory reset to your device and then check if it gets detected by your computer
translation.zh: 另外，您还可以尝试在设备上执行出厂重置，然后检查能否被电脑检测到

translation.en: To do this, please follow these instructions:
translation.zh: 为此，请按照以下说明操作：

translation.en: If possible, back up any books or documents that you added to your eReader using #PRS_ORG#, or that you manually added using your computer.
translation.zh: 如果可以，请备份使用 #PRS_ORG# 添加到电子阅读器中或使用电脑手动添加的所有图书和文档。

translation.en: You do not need to back up any books you bought from #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 对于从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的图书，则无需备份。

translation.en: Any books you purchased from #PRS_ORG# can be re-downloaded from the #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# after a factory reset.
translation.zh: 执行工厂重置后，从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的图书可从 #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# 重新下载。

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap Home at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“主页”。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Tap Factory reset under Advanced.
translation.zh: 在“高级”下点击“出厂重置”。

translation.en: Tap Reset Now.
translation.zh: 点击“立即重置”。

translation.en: I'm still with you
translation.zh: 我一直在这里

translation.en: Oh, so glad you asked, I have a lot to say about this.
translation.zh: 很高兴你来问我，我有一肚子的话要说。

translation.en: Yes, there’s been a pretty drastic change.
translation.zh: 是的，变化真的很大。

translation.en: I have been overweight/obese since I was 3 years old, so existing like that is all I ever knew until age 30.
translation.zh: 我从 3 岁开始就超重/肥胖，在 30 岁之前，我一直都这样。

translation.en: The vast majority of my family and friends who knew me before treat me the same and are SO.
translation.zh: 我的大多数家人和以前认识的绝大多数朋友还是像从前一样对我，他们对我

translation.en: damn.
translation.zh: 真是太

translation.en: supportive.
translation.zh: 宽容了。

translation.en: I do have a select few familial relationships, which were strained to begin with, where it seems that my weight loss has exacerbated the existing problems.
translation.zh: 不过，我跟有些家族成员本来就紧张的关系在我减肥后似乎更严重了。

translation.en: This could be the result of their complexes or mine, because I think they’re used to being able to shit on me and I, in turn, am now even less willing to take their shit.
translation.zh: 这可能是他们的问题，也可能是我的问题，我觉得他们习惯了欺负我，而我不会再默默承受。

translation.en: One person in particular has, very weirdly, tried to take credit for my weight loss.
translation.zh: 特别是有一个人，他很奇怪，他觉得我减肥成功全靠他。

translation.en: Basically, they’ve insinuated that they were the driving force that got me here, under the guise of being supportive, when in reality they didn’t even know I was making these changes until I had already gone through with the RNY and lost well over 100lbs.
translation.zh: 他们会暗示说他们是我减肥的动力，他们打着支持我的幌子招摇过市，但直到我做完 RNY，并瘦了 100 多磅，他们才知道我减肥了。

translation.en: In fact, they were the last to know, intentionally, because I just didn’t want them to try to take control and bully me into things like I used to let them.
translation.zh: 事实上，他们是最后才知道的，我故意瞒着他们，因为我不想让他们还像从前那样控制我，对我为所欲为。

translation.en: Unsurprisingly, now they’ve taken to insulting my other features, like telling me my nose and forehead look too big since I lost weight and that I need a nose job and bangs to fix it - this is typical behavior from them.
translation.zh: 不出所料，现在他们开始侮辱我的其他特征，比如说我减肥后鼻子和额头看起来太大了，我需要做鼻子整形手术，用刘海来遮着额头——他们一贯如此。

translation.en: At first, they just private messaged me these things but when I didn’t respond, they took to commenting about it publicly on social media, with no shame.
translation.zh: 一开始，他们只是私下给我发这些信息，看到我没有回复，他们就开始在社交媒体上公开评论，肆无忌惮。

translation.en: When I was bigger, that would have destroyed me and I would have listened but now I just ignore it.
translation.zh: 以前，我很在意这些，所以会听他们的，但现在我听耳不闻。

translation.en: Luckily, my skin is thicker now (not just cause it’s in excess these days).
translation.zh: 幸运的是，现在我脸皮变厚了（不是这些天才变厚的）。

translation.en: The attention from strangers is by far the weirdest part for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说，陌生人的注意是我最难适应的。

translation.en: When I was bigger, people really didn’t pay me any attention.
translation.zh: 以前，没有人注意过我。

translation.en: Like, little to no eye contact.
translation.zh: 我跟陌生人之间几乎没有眼神交流。

translation.en: No saying hello or smiling at me as we pass on the street unless they knew me.
translation.zh: 我在街上走过时，除非是认识的人，否则没有人会对我打招呼或微笑。

translation.en: Definitely no going out of their way to help or compliment me.
translation.zh: 他们绝对不会特意帮助我或赞美我。

translation.en: It was more isolating than I realized because it’s what I was used to.
translation.zh: 如今想来，这种孤立感比我想像的更甚，但我以前早就习惯了。

translation.en: I knew people could be judgmental of my size - with many doing so openly - but I never realized, until I lost weight, the micro-level of it and just how subtle it can come about.
translation.zh: 我以前就知道人们会对我的身材指指点点，甚至很多人当着我的面说我如何如何，但直到我减肥后，我才意识到这其中的微妙之处。

translation.en: Not only was I unaware of it, simply because it’s what I was used to, but I also don’t think those who perpetuate it are actively aware they’re doing it.
translation.zh: 我早就习惯了，所以我没有意识到这一点，但我认为那些一直这么做的人也从未主动意识到这一点。

translation.en: I really believe it is a subconscious bias, bred and exacerbated by the portrayal and treatment of overweight people in media, that many people just don’t realize they project.
translation.zh: 我真的认为这是一种潜意识的偏见，而媒体对超重人群的描述和对待则滋生并加剧了这一偏见，许多人根本没有意识到他们在将这种意识投射到了行为上。

translation.en: Now, it feels like everyone everywhere looks at me, smiles at me, talks to me, etc.
translation.zh: 现在，我感觉每个人都在看我，对我微笑，找机会和我说话，等等。

translation.en: Both men and women engage with me differently, making more efforts to talk to/get to know me - and that’s just platonically.
translation.zh: 不管是男人还是女人，对我都不一样了，他们更乐于与我交谈/了解我——当然只是柏拉图式的。

translation.en: Romantically, my dating pool has expanded from what few were willing to be seen with me to what feels like… everyone lol.
translation.zh: 在爱情方面，我的约会对象已经从“很少有人愿意和我走在一起”扩大到了“感觉所有人都对我有意思”，哈哈。

translation.en: It is DAUNTING.
translation.zh: 我会感到害怕。

translation.en: I assumed that, at the very least, the fact that I was morbidly obese, have lost all this weight and now have excess skin would deter some people, but despite the fact that I put my weight loss and excess skin right at the forefront (because I don’t want it to be a secret), it has bothered/deterred approximately no one in my experience.
translation.zh: 因为我以为，过去病态般肥胖的我减肥后松弛的皮肤会让人望而却步，但是尽管我并未隐瞒我减肥和皮肤松弛的事实（因为我不想让它成为秘密）,但在我的记忆里，几乎没有人因此对我丧失兴趣。

translation.en: It seems to have done the opposite and made them more interested, actually.
translation.zh: 实际上，似乎还起到了相反的作用，这让他们更感兴趣。

translation.en: Huge shock to me.
translation.zh: 真是让我震惊。

translation.en: I do have to put a little PSA here, though, for men who are newly talking to/dating a woman who has lost weight: comments like “I am so happy you lost the weight, you clearly haven’t realized how gorgeous you are yet” is NOT the way to go.
translation.zh: 不过，我必须忠告那些刚刚和减肥的女性交谈或约会的男性，不要说类似“看到你减肥了，我真高兴，很显然你不知道你有多漂亮”这样的话。

translation.en: I have heard some variation of this more times than I care to count and they all thought it was a compliment.
translation.zh: 我已经听过很多很多这样的话了，他们都觉得这是一种赞美。

translation.en: Hey r/Military!
translation.zh: 军事发烧友们，你们好！

translation.en: I am from a country where military duty is mandatory and I am just wondering how's it like for other countries.
translation.zh: 我来自一个强制服兵役的国家，我想知道其他国家对服兵役有什么要求。

translation.en: Hello everyone!
translation.zh: 大家好！

translation.en: I am from Estonia, where I am part of the National Defense Force.
translation.zh: 我来自爱沙尼亚，是爱沙尼亚国防军的军人。

translation.en: Here military service is mandatory for all men from the ages of 16-29.
translation.zh: 在爱沙尼亚，所有 16-29 岁的男性都必须服兵役。

translation.en: You have to complete either 8 or 11 months of training after which you are sent to the "reserve" unit until you turn 60.
translation.zh: 我们需要完成 8 或 11 个月的训练，然后进入“预备役”部队，直到 60 岁。

translation.en: In that time, the Defense Force is eligible to demand you take part in some military exercises once or twice a year for approx 2 weeks per year.
translation.zh: 在此期间，国防军有资格要求我们每年参加一次或两次军事演习，每年大约 2 周。

translation.en: However, you are not mandated to go on a foreign mission.
translation.zh: 不过，我们不会被送去执行外国任务。

translation.en: If you want to do that, you have to join the "scouts battalion" where you will be a professional military dude with pay and such.
translation.zh: 要想执行外国任务，必须加入“侦察兵营”，成为一名带薪的职业军人。

translation.en: I am just wondering how is it for other countries?
translation.zh: 我只是想了解一下其他国家在这方面的规定。

translation.en: If you join the military in, for example, the USA or the UK, then are you mandated to go fight in another country?
translation.zh: 如果你入伍，比如你在美国或英国，那么你会被授权去另一个国家作战吗？

translation.en: What do you guys think about mandatory military service?
translation.zh: 你们怎么看待服兵役这件事？

translation.en: During training when I was in Tapa 2018-2019, there were also units from the UK, US, France, Belgium, Denmark and Canada.
translation.zh: 2018-2019 年我在塔帕训练期间，还有来自英国、美国、法国、比利时、丹麦和加拿大的军人。

translation.en: Unfortunately though, we really didn't have much time to socialize and I didn't get to ask those guys in person what it's like for them to serve in their country's military.
translation.zh: 遗憾的是，我们的社交时间不多，我也没有机会亲口问问那些人在他们国家对服役有什么要求。

translation.en: I know that there are probably mostly NATO members in this subreddit, but it would be interesting to hear from other (non-NATO) countries as well.
translation.zh: 我知道个版块里的大部分人可能都来自北约成员国，但如果能听到其他非北约国家网友的分享也很有趣。

translation.en: Sorry for my poor grammar.
translation.zh: 英语是我的第二语言，

translation.en: English is my second language.
translation.zh: 所有我可能说得有点文法不通，望大家海涵。

translation.en: You can also reset it from there.
translation.zh: 您也可以从此处重置。

translation.en: However I recommend you resetting it from your computer, even if you are logged in on your computer, this is for you to remember your password, as this information is important to know by memory
translation.zh: 不过，即使您从电脑登录，我还是建议您从电脑重置，这是为了让您记住密码，因为这些信息很重要，必须记住

translation.en: Once your password is reset from your computer, please try accessing once again on our daughter's e-reader with your new password
translation.zh: 在电脑上重置密码后，请尝试使用新密码从您女儿的电子阅读器再次访问

translation.en: please let me know if it works
translation.zh: 请告诉我这个方法是否可行

translation.en: I enjoy articles like this help untangle the convoluted web of sociopathic megalomaniac men that my dad glorified ad nauseam and the plurality of leaders he decried.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这样的文章，它有助于厘清我父亲令人作呕地美化的反社会自大狂男人和他谴责的多数领导人构成的错综复杂的网络。

translation.en: Guess where Nixon and Carter fell, and his golden boy Reagan could do no ills.
translation.zh: 猜猜尼克松和卡特落在了哪里，而他的金童里根却毫发无损。

translation.en: While I have long since known that this world view is complete BS and in fact I despise each of those megalomaniacs from Caesar through Bonaparte, Nixon, Reagan, Bush and Trump,
translation.zh: 虽然我早就知道这种世界观完全是胡扯，事实上我鄙视凯撒、波拿巴、尼克松、里根、布什和特朗普等每一个自大狂。

translation.en: I can appreciate the historical significance of Caesar or Napoleon, but the quasi-sacred nature of their sanitized histories turned me off them later on in life.
translation.zh: 我能理解凯撒或拿破仑的历史意义，但他们的历史被神话之后，变成了近乎神圣的存在，这让我在后来的生活中对他们失去了兴趣。

translation.en: To this day, I still refuse to study the history of Poland as that would just allow the paranoid conspiracies of my dad to bubble forward.
translation.zh: 直到今天，我仍然拒绝学习波兰历史，因为那样只会让我父亲的偏执的阴谋论冒头。

translation.en: Returning to this article, I love the small details that remind you that there actually was one good choice (despite smaller flaws - but mostly acting in good faith) and one side that was not good, did not act in good faith, and where malice was and is the more likely explanation than stupidity.
translation.zh: 回到这篇文章中，我非常喜欢那些小细节，它们提醒你其实有一个不错的选择（尽管略有瑕疵，但主要是出于善意），不好的一方没有采取善意的行动，并且过去和现在，恶意都是比愚蠢更合理的解释。

translation.en: That's the thing.
translation.zh: 就是这样的。

translation.en: Republicans love to hide behind stupidity rather than admit malice, but make no mistake if the ideological basis of a party is being under siege.
translation.zh: 共和党人喜欢以愚蠢作为挡箭牌，他们不会承认有恶意，但如果一个政党的意识形态基础受到围攻，那就不容犯错了。

translation.en: Then coincidence, serendipity, etc. rarely exist.
translation.zh: 所谓的巧合、意外等很少存在。

translation.en: The besieged mentality means that every action must count, or else you are expensing limited energy on frivolous acts.
translation.zh: 被包围的心态意味着每一个行动都必须有意义，否则你有限的精力只能花在琐碎的行为上。

translation.en: But Republicans love to hide behind our more nuanced understanding of the world and try to throw back the various philosophical razors.
translation.zh: 但共和党人喜欢躲在我们对世界更细致入微的理解背后，并试图抛回各种哲学剃刀。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to chat to me today.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天联系我。

translation.en: Once this chat has ended you will be sent a 'rate my chat' feedback email.
translation.zh: 本次聊天结束后，您将收到“对我进行评价”的反馈电子邮件。

translation.en: Please kindly fill this in if you have a moment, however if you don't have time then may I wish you a wonderful day and thank you again.
translation.zh: 请您抽空对我进行评价，如果您没有时间，也没关系，再次感谢您！

translation.en: Our concentrated combination of dedication and expertise benefits our customers.
translation.zh: 我们以高度凝结的敬业精神和专业知识为我们服务。

translation.en: Norton has been outperforming the competition in many reputable head-to-head tests, and only Norton has won the PC Magazine Editors’ Choice Award 34 times, including 11 years in a row – more than any other security company.
translation.zh: 诺顿在许多信誉良好的直接测试中都胜过了竞争对手，只有诺顿获得过 PC 杂志编辑选择奖 34 次，而且有一次连续 11 年获得此奖，这是任何其他安全公司都无法比拟的。

translation.en: What does that mean for you?
translation.zh: 这对您意味着什么？

translation.en: When you buy Norton Security, you’re getting one of the best security products on the market today.
translation.zh: 这意味着，在您购买 Norton Security 后，您就得到了当今市场上最好的安全产品之一。

translation.en: We include a protection promise only Norton can make
translation.zh: 我们提供的保护承诺只有诺顿才能做到

translation.en: We’re so confident in our ability to keep you secure, we offer refund assurance: If your PC or Mac gets a virus our Norton experts cannot remove, we’ll give you a refund*
translation.zh: 我们有信心保证您的安全，我们提供退款保证：如果您的电脑或 Mac 电脑感染了诺顿专家无法清除的病毒，我们会给您退款*

translation.en: With Norton Security Deluxe, you can secure your device quickly and easily.
translation.zh: 有了 Norton Security Deluxe，您可以快速、方便地保护您的设备。

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe provides a simple view detailing the protection status of your device.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 在一个简单的视图中详述了您的设备的防护状态。

translation.en: From a single dashboard, you can monitor your security and identity protection settings, and even view the history of files scanned and downloads analyzed.
translation.zh: 您可在一个仪表板上监控安全性和身份保护设置，甚至可以查看扫描文件和分析下载的历史记录。

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。

translation.en: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.zh: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。

translation.en: To activate, sign up online and save your billing information in your Norton account.
translation.zh: 要激活产品，请在线注册，并在诺顿账户中保存您的账单信息。

translation.en: Automatically renews each year, unless the renewal is cancelled before the day you are due to be charged in my.norton.com or by contacting Norton Support.
translation.zh: 每年自动续订，除非您在 my.norton.com 或联系诺顿支持在收费日之前取消续订。

translation.en: The subscription renewal is charged at the renewal price found at norton.com/pricing.
translation.zh: 订阅续订按 norton.com/pricing 上的续费收费。

translation.en: Price subject to change, but a notification email is sent before billing.
translation.zh: 价格可能会有变化，但计费前会发送通知电子邮件。

translation.en: Under NortonLifeLock Cancellation & Refund Policy once activated, you can cancel your contract and request a full refund within 60 days of the purchase, and for each annual renewal within 60 days of being charged.
translation.zh: 根据《NortonLifeLock 取消和退款政策》，激活产品后，您可以在购买后 60 天内和支付费用后 60 天内（如果是每年续订）取消合同并要求全额退款。

translation.en: Subscription begins upon online activation.
translation.zh: 在线激活时即开始订阅。

translation.en: To launch the service, download/install on each device, and/or complete set-up.
translation.zh: 要启动服务，请在每个设备上下载/安装，并/或完成设置。

translation.en: Updates and features may be added, modified or removed, subject to the License and Services Agreement.
translation.zh: 根据许可证和服务协议的规定，可能会增加、修改或删除更新和功能。

translation.en: Data collection, storage and use for subscription management and renewal purposes subject to NortonLifeLock Global Privacy Statement.
translation.zh: 根据《NortonLifeLock 全球隐私声明》，将为订阅管理和续订目的收集、存储和使用数据。
