translation.en: Liz Truss pledges another £75m in aid to Afghanistan at G7 meeting
translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助

translation.en: A further £75 million in aid is to be given to Afghanistan by the UK to help address its worsening humanitarian situation, Liz Truss has announced.
translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯宣布，英国将向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助，以帮助解决该国日益恶化的人道主义局势。

translation.en: The Foreign Secretary said the commitment would help save lives and "support stability in the region."
translation.zh: 这位外交大臣说，这项承诺将有助于挽救生命和“支持该地区的稳定”。

translation.en: It follows discussions among G7 foreign ministers in Liverpool on Saturday about what co-ordinated action can be taken in Afghanistan, along with how to engage with the Taliban rulers.
translation.zh: 此前，七国集团 (G7) 外长周六在利物浦讨论了在阿富汗可以采取何种协同行动，以及如何与塔利班统治者接触。

translation.en: The militant group stormed Kabul in a lightning advance in August, as 20 years of occupation of the central Asian country was brought to a close with a hurried allied withdrawal.
translation.zh: 今年 8 月，这个激进组织闪电般地袭击了喀布尔，与此同时，随着盟军的匆忙撤离，它们对这个中亚国家长达 20 年的占领宣告结束。

translation.en: Ms Truss said: "The UK is providing vital humanitarian assistance in Afghanistan this winter.
translation.zh: 特拉斯女士说：“今年冬天，英国将向阿富汗提供至关重要的人道主义援助。

translation.en: The funds announced today will save lives, protect women and girls and support stability in the region.
translation.zh: 今天宣布的援助资金将拯救生命，保护妇女和女孩，并支持该地区的稳定。

translation.en: We are determined to do all we can for the people of Afghanistan."
translation.zh: 我们决心尽我们所能帮助阿富汗人民。”

translation.en: The additional financial support will bring the UK's commitment to Afghanistan to £286 million this year.
translation.zh: 这笔额外的财政支持将使英国今年对阿富汗的承诺达到 2.86 亿英镑。

translation.en: It will be used to provide support for victims of gender-based violence and to fund essential child protection services.
translation.zh: 它将用于向基于性别的暴力受害者提供援助，并资助基本的儿童保护服务。

translation.en: The United Nations and aid agencies will prioritise those most at risk including households headed by women and disabled people, the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office said (FCDO).
translation.zh: 外交、联邦和发展办公室 (FCDO) 表示，联合国和援助机构将优先考虑那些最危险的家庭，包括以妇女和残疾人为户主的家庭。

translation.en: Officials said no funding would go directly through the Taliban, instead being funnelled through the Afghanistan Humanitarian Fund, World Food Programme (WFP) and other organisations.
translation.zh: 官员们表示，资金不会直接交给塔利班，而是通过阿富汗人道主义基金、世界粮食计划署 (WFP) 和其他组织进行援助。

translation.en: The WFP will receive £34 million of the funding announced on Sunday.
translation.zh: 世界粮食计划署将于周日收到宣布的 3400 万英镑资金。

translation.en: David Beasley, the organisation's executive director, said the donation would "help us save many lives."
translation.zh: 该组织的执行董事大卫·比斯利 (David Beasley) 表示，这笔捐款将“帮助我们拯救许多生命”。

translation.en: "What we are seeing on the ground is heart-breaking - 23 million people are facing severe hunger in a country crippled by drought, conflict and an economic crisis," he said.
translation.zh: 他说:“我们在实地看到的情况令人心碎——2300 万人面临严重的饥饿，这个国家因干旱、冲突和经济危机而陷入瘫痪。”

translation.en: "Women and children are bearing the brunt of this suffering and, as the harsh winter descends, more and more are slipping into malnutrition and starvation each day."
translation.zh: “妇女和儿童首当其冲，随着严冬的到来，每天都有越来越多的人陷入营养不良和饥饿的境地。”

translation.en: This week the UN's humanitarian chief warned that Afghanistan's economic collapse was "happening before our eyes" and urged the international community to take action to stop "the freefall" before it leads to more deaths.
translation.zh: 本周，联合国人道主义事务负责人警告说，阿富汗经济的崩溃“正在我们眼前发生”，并敦促国际社会采取行动，防止其“自由落体”，以免造成更多的死亡。

translation.en: Martin Griffiths said: "It's getting more and more dire by the week."
translation.zh: 马丁·格里菲思 (Martin Griffiths) 说：“形势一周比一周可怕。”

translation.en: The funding announcement comes after ministers this week faced awkward questions about the Afghan withdrawal effort following a whistleblower's evidence to MPs.
translation.zh: 本周，在一名举报人向议员们提供证据后，部长们面临着有关从阿富汗撤军的尴尬问题。

translation.en: Raphael Marshall, who worked for the Foreign Office during Operation Pitting, claimed just 5% of Afghan nationals who applied to flee under one UK scheme received help as a result of the "dysfunctional" and "chaotic" handling of the situation.
translation.zh: 在皮廷行动期间为外交部工作的拉斐尔·马歇尔 (Raphael Marshall) 声称，由于对局势的“功能失调”和“混乱”的处理，在根据英国计划申请逃离的阿富汗公民中，只有 5% 得到了帮助。

translation.en: Mr Marshall told the Commons Foreign Affairs Committee that some of those hoping to escape were murdered after being left behind in Kabul.
translation.zh: 马歇尔告诉下议院外交事务委员会，一些希望逃跑的人被留在喀布尔后被谋杀。

translation.en: He also claimed Boris Johnson requested that "considerable capacity" was made available to evacuate animals from a shelter run by former Royal Marine Paul "Pen" Farthing, putting the lives of troops at risk to help aid their departure on a privately funded plane.
translation.zh: 他还声称，鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 要求提供“相当大的能力”，帮助前皇家海军陆战队员保罗·潘·法尔辛 (Paul "Pen" Farthing) 经营的收容所中的动物离开阿富汗，最终帮助这些动物乘坐私人飞机离开，而这是以将士兵的生命置于危险之中为代价。

translation.en: The Prime Minister has called the claims "complete nonsense."
translation.zh: 首相称这种说法“完全是无稽之谈”。

translation.en: At the Museum of Liverpool on Sunday, Ms Truss will have discussions with foreign ministers from the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, who are attending the G7 gathering for the first time - most of them virtually.
translation.zh: 周日，特拉斯将在利物浦博物馆 (Museum of Liverpool) 与东南亚国家联盟 (Association of Southeast Asian Nations) 的外交部长们进行讨论，这些国家是首次参加 G7 峰会，而且大部分通过网络参加会谈。

translation.en: The Foreign Secretary will stress the importance of working with south-east Asia's "economies of the future" to tackle the current challenges facing the West, the FCDO said.
translation.zh: FCDO 表示，外交大臣将强调与东南亚“未来经济体”合作以应对西方目前面临的挑战的重要性。

translation.en: The invitation to Asian ministers comes after the UK's integrated review on foreign policy announced in March a "tilt" towards the Indo-Pacific, in a move seen as aiming to counter China's growing influence in the region.
translation.zh: 在邀请亚洲各国部长出席会议之前，英国在 3 月份进行的外交政策综合评估中宣布，英国将向印度-太平洋地区“倾斜”，此举被视为旨在抗衡中国在该地区日益增长的影响力。

translation.en: The other thing we need you to try is to reset the USB ports in your computer.
translation.zh: 此外，您还需要重置电脑上的 USB 端口。

translation.en: You can find instructions to do this in the following link: #URL#
translation.zh: 以下链接介绍了如何执行此操作：#URL#

translation.en: Please make sure to try the three methods listed in there.
translation.zh: 请尝试此处列出的三个方法。

translation.en: If after trying them the issue remains, please make sure to contact us again
translation.zh: 如果试完这三个方法后，问题仍然存在，请再联系我们

translation.en: When it comes to buying quality gear, a sleeping bag needs to be first on the list.
translation.zh: 说到购买高质量的装备，睡袋应该是第一位的。

translation.en: You can scrimp on all manner of kit but not on a sleeping bag.
translation.zh: 你可以在所有装备上省钱，但睡袋不行。

translation.en: A lot of your time when out camping or expeditions will be spent in your sleeping and with Snugpak you are assured quality.
translation.zh: 当你外出野营或探险时，睡觉时间很长，有了 Snugpak，睡觉质量就有保证了。

translation.en: A tried and tested favourite, this British made sleeping bag combines micro pack size with serious performance.
translation.zh: 这款英国制造的睡袋是一款久经考验的最受欢迎的睡袋，它体积小，但性能出色。

translation.en: Many view the Softie 12 Osprey the ultimate four season synthetic fill sleeping bag available.
translation.zh: 许多人认为 Softie 12 Osprey 是四季适用的终极版合成填充睡袋。

translation.en: Since 1987, it has been setting the standard for winter pack size performance for others to follow.
translation.zh: 自 1987 年以来，该公司一直在为冬季背包的尺寸性能设定标准，成为其他公司效仿的目标。

translation.en: Those who know about the Softie 12 Osprey have either used one or wished they had one.
translation.zh: 那些知道 Softie 12 Osprey 的人要么用过它，要么就是希望能拥有一个。

translation.en: Used from the heights of the Scottish mountains to the bottom of your snow hole.
translation.zh: 它适合在上至苏格兰山脉高处，下至雪洞底部的众多场合使用。

translation.en: The Softie 12 Osprey like many of our other sleeping bags in the Softie Original Series have been assigned a NATO Stock Number.
translation.zh: Softie 12 Osprey 像 Softie Original 系列的许多其他睡袋一样，都被分配了 NATO 库存编号。

translation.en: The quilted top of the bag is tailored, pleated, and fitted with a drawcord so it pulls into shape, rather like a jacket hood.
translation.zh: 这款睡袋的顶部绗缝考究，有褶皱，还配有拉绳，这样它就能拉出形状，有点像夹克的兜帽。

translation.en: To prevent the 2-way zip from snagging either the zip baffle or the bag edges, an "anti-snag strip" of webbing is sewn in behind the zip.
translation.zh: 为了防止双向拉链被拉链挡边或包边卡住，在拉链后面缝了一条“防钩带”。

translation.en: Liner Fastening and Hanging Tabs Inner tabs are provided to keep a loose liner in position, corresponding in position with the tabs we provide on our liners.
translation.zh: 内衬紧固件和内里的挂耳可以将松动的内衬固定在合适的位置，与内衬上的挂耳相对应。

translation.en: External tabs allow you to easily hang the bag for airing and drying.
translation.zh: 外部的挂耳方便晾晒。

translation.en: Tapering the bag to a circle foot creates the "mummy" shape which is easy to warm and minimises the weight of material used.
translation.zh: 睡袋的底部做成圆形，形成“木乃伊”形状，这样既有助于保暖，又能将所使用材料的重量降至最低。

translation.en: Hard to see in the picture, but a zip baffle runs the full length of the bag, behind the zip,to prevent heat escaping through the zip area.
translation.zh: 睡袋有一条从头贯穿到尾的拉链挡边，就在拉链的后面，这是为了防止热量通过拉链区域逃逸，不过这在图中很难看到。

translation.en: Buy a left and a right hand to make a double (please check when ordering)
translation.zh: 购买一只左开睡袋和一只右开睡袋，可以拼成双人睡袋（订购时请核对）

translation.en: Comes complete with a compression stuff sack, to make the bag smaller when not in use.
translation.zh: 配有压缩袋，可在不使用睡袋里作收纳使用。

translation.en: Can be used with the Snugpak Exanda Panel to make a wider sleeping bag for more comfort.
translation.zh: 可与 Snugpak Exanda Panel 一起使用，睡袋会变得更宽、更舒适。

translation.en: This sleeping bag can be made extra long.
translation.zh: 这款睡袋可以做得特别长。

translation.en: Single profiled sleeping bag with one layer of softie insulation.
translation.zh: 这款单层异形睡袋使用了一层柔软的保温材料。

translation.en: Snugpak are based in a listed mill built in the 1800s on the edge of the beautiful Yorkshire Dales.
translation.zh: Snugpak 公司位于美丽的约克郡山谷边缘，这座建于 19 世纪的工厂被列入了文物保护名录。

translation.en: They are very proud to be one of the last manufacturers of quality sleeping bags and insulated clothing not only in the UK but across Europe.
translation.zh: 让他们引以为豪的是，不仅在英国，乃至在整个欧洲，他们都是高质量睡袋和绝缘服装的顶级制造商之一。

translation.en: We have a dedicated workforce at our West Yorkshire factory in the North of England who are trained to use state-of-the-art machinery and traditional sewing techniques to bring our ideas to life.
translation.zh: 我们在西约克郡工厂的工人都在英格兰北部接受过训练，学习使用最先进的机械和传统的缝纫技术，将我们的想法变成现实。

translation.en: Contact Left Limited is an official supplier for Snugpak and carries a large range of their kit in our EBAY shop.
translation.zh: Contact Left Limited 是 Snugpak 的官方供应商，我们的 EBAY 商店有他们的许多套件出售。

translation.en: Contact Left LTD is a leading supplier of kit to the Armed Forces and Close Protection Industry
translation.zh: Contact Left LTD 是武装部队和贴身护卫行业的领先供应商

translation.en: I do apologise about this, we must gain permission from the account holder to discuss an order with another person, I apologise if this was done previously, however, I would not be able to discuss this with yourself without the account holders permission.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，我们在获得帐户持有人的许可后才能与其他人讨论订单，如果以前这样做过，那么我道歉，但我在没有获得帐户持有人的许可之前，还是不能讨论这个。

translation.en: I was buying new tires.
translation.zh: 那次我想买个新轮胎。

translation.en: I found the ones I wanted on a tire store website.
translation.zh: 我在一家轮胎店的网站上找到了我想要的轮胎。

translation.en: I printed out the page and took it to my local shop.
translation.zh: 我把网页打印出来，拿到了当地的一家门店。

translation.en: It was part of a chain.
translation.zh: 这是一家连锁店。

translation.en: The guy at the shop checked things out and it turns out that the current price of the tires was more than my printout.
translation.zh: 门店里的人查了一下，结果发现轮胎的当前价格比我打印出来的价格要高。

translation.en: Don’t know where he got the higher price from.
translation.zh: 不知道他的价格为什么更高。

translation.en: Luckily, the guy was honest and rather than trying to charge the higher price, he sold me the tires for the price I had on my printout.
translation.zh: 幸运的是，这个人很诚实，他没有收取更高的价格，而是按我打印出来的价格把轮胎卖给了我。

translation.en: He said that because I had the printout, he had to sell me the tires at the printout price.
translation.zh: 他说因为我有打印件，所以他必须按打印件的价格卖给我轮胎。

translation.en: He was gracious about it too.
translation.zh: 他一直彬彬有礼。

translation.en: Been buying tires from them ever since.
translation.zh: 从那以后我就一直从他们那里买轮胎。

translation.en: The order was processed as a pick up order that means you chose it to be picked up by you.
translation.zh: 订单被处理为取件订单，这意味着要由您自己取件。

translation.en: That's why we are unable to assign a rider for this.
translation.zh: 正因如此，我们无法为您指派骑手。

translation.en: As the order has already been accepted, we are unable to cancel the order at this point.
translation.zh: 由于订单已被接受，我们目前无法取消订单。

translation.en: I understand, but my colleague explained yesterday that we have to be in touch with the warehouse, this has been done for you - so we are awaiting the reply.
translation.zh: 我理解，但是我的同事昨天解释了，我们必须和仓库联系，现在正在等待回复。

translation.en: As soon as we have the information, we can then let you know the whereabouts of your order
translation.zh: 我们一有消息，就会把订单的情况告诉您

translation.en: The item was due to dispatch 18.12
translation.zh: 这个商品应该是 12 月 18 日就发货了

translation.en: After that, please delete your authorization
translation.zh: 之后，请删除您的授权

translation.en: 1) Deauthorize your Ereader
translation.zh: 1) 取消对您的电子阅读器的授权

translation.en: Turn on your eReader.
translation.zh: 打开您的电子阅读器。

translation.en: Connect your eReader to your computer using a Micro USB cable.
translation.zh: 使用 Micro USB 缆线将您的电子阅读器连接到电脑。

translation.en: On your eReader: Tap Connect.
translation.zh: 在您的电子阅读器上：点击“连接”。

translation.en: On your computer: Open #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 在您的电脑上：Open #PRS_ORG#.

translation.en: Under 'Devices', right-click on #PRS_ORG# eReader.
translation.zh: 在“设备”下，右键单击 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器。

translation.en: Click Erase Device Authorization.
translation.zh: 单击“擦除设备授权”。

translation.en: Click OK at the confirmation screen.
translation.zh: 单击确认屏幕上的“确定”。

translation.en: 2) De-authorize #PRS_ORG#
translation.zh: 2) 取消授权 #PRS_ORG#

translation.en: To deauthorize #PRS_ORG#, click Help > Erase Authorization.
translation.zh: 要取消授权 #PRS_ORG#，请单击“帮助”>“擦除授权”。

translation.en: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for the account you used to authorize #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 在弹出窗口中，输入您用于授权 #PRS_ORG# 的帐户密码。

translation.en: Click Erase Authorization
translation.zh: 单击“擦除授权”

translation.en: Were the steps helpful?
translation.zh: 这些步骤有用吗？

translation.en: Sadly I have not received a response for more than two minutes.
translation.zh: 很遗憾，已经两分多钟了，但我没有收到回应。

translation.en: For quality purposes this chat interaction will be closed, please remember you can always come back and we will be happy to continue assisting you.
translation.zh: 为了提高服务质量，本次聊天互动将关闭，但请记住，您可以随时回来，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: No you wouldn't be able to enter an appointment date, you would need to place the order and we would then we can place the items on hold for you, we can place these on hold initially for three months
translation.zh: 不，您无法输入预约日期，您需要下订单，我们会为您保管商品，可以保管三个月

translation.en: Is there anything else I can help with this afternoon for you?
translation.zh: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.
translation.zh: 祝您今天过得愉快，如果您需要其他帮助，请随时联系我们。

translation.en: Ok, please do me the favour to follow the next steps>
translation.zh: 好的，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.zh: 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 按住电源按钮，直到屏幕顶部显示“关机”。

translation.en: Continue holding down the power button for 3-4 seconds.
translation.zh: 继续按住电源按钮 3-4 秒。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。

translation.en: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear.
translation.zh: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: After the e-reader has been reset, it will ask you to set your language preferences and a WiFi network.
translation.zh: 重置电子阅读器后，它将询问您是否设置语言首选项和 WiFi 网络。

translation.en: After that you will need to sign in with your e-mail address and password
translation.zh: 随后，您需要使用电子邮件地址和密码登录

translation.en: I haven’t seen any comments from Australians yet, so I might as well say a few words.
translation.zh: 我还没有看到有澳大利亚人发言，那么我来说几句。

translation.en: It’s difficult to find equipment that’s unique or out of the mainstream.
translation.zh: 现在很难找到独特的或非主流的设备。

translation.en: Most boards are mass market boards such as sector 9s or Loaded Tan Tien’s … I have both and I’m not hating.
translation.zh: 大多数板子都很大众，比如 sector 9s 或 Loaded Tan Tien……这两种我都有，而且也不讨厌它们。

translation.en: If I want something out of the ordinary, however, I buy direct from the manufacturer or through Muir.
translation.zh: 不过，如果我想要个性化的板子，我会直接向制造商或通过 Muir 购买。

translation.en: Shipping is always a problem and it’s always expensive.
translation.zh: 然而运输不易，而且运费很贵。

translation.en: I really wanted the Tortuga but when it was all priced up, it was over AU$500 (incl. shipping and exchange rate).
translation.zh: 我真的很想要 Tortuga，不过它在涨价后超过了 500 澳元（包括运费和汇率）。

translation.en: Shipping alone was approx. US$100.
translation.zh: 单是运费就大约要 100 美元。

translation.en: I understand this isn't something you have control over … I only wanted to illustrate the considerations and trade-offs made from this side of the world.
translation.zh: 我知道这不是你能控制的事情……我只是想说明，在世界的另一边还有各种考虑和权衡。

translation.en: Finally, love your boards!
translation.zh: 最后，好好爱你的板子吧！

translation.en: Much respect.
translation.zh: 敬礼！

translation.en: This is the thing people don't get.
translation.zh: 人们不明白，

translation.en: The math doesn't say you can't get really sick if you're young and healthy.
translation.zh: 统计学并没有说年轻健康的人就不会生病。

translation.en: Maybe I'm a pessimist, but that's better than thinking you're invincible.
translation.zh: 我可能有点悲观，但这总比认为自己坚不可摧的人强。

translation.en: That shit will get you killed.
translation.zh: 盲目自信会害死你的。

translation.en: I think I took it seriously because I've been sick a lot, and I hate it.
translation.zh: 我不敢那么轻狂，是因为我病过很多次，我讨厌这样。

translation.en: I'm healthy in general, but the flu always hits me very hard.
translation.zh: 总体来说，我是健康的，但流感总是给予我重击。

translation.en: I was scared that Covid was going to be worse.
translation.zh: 我很害怕新冠病毒会变得更糟。

translation.en: It wasn't, probably because I didn't get exposed to a lot of the virus, but it was bad enough.
translation.zh: 即使没有，也可能是因为我没有接触到很多病毒，但这已经够糟糕的了。

translation.en: Still took months for my body to return to normal.
translation.zh: 我的身体还要好几个月才能恢复正常。

translation.en: I don't know why it affects people differently, but for me it was body pain and headaches that were the worst part.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么它会对不同的人产生不同的影响，但对我来说，身体疼痛和头痛是最难忍受的。

translation.en: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息，希望您一切顺利。

translation.en: Please let me verify your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.zh: 我允许我验证您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.en: I will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please give me a moment.
translation.zh: 请稍候几分钟。

translation.en: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry that your mother hasn't received the egift card, please conform the email that was sent.
translation.zh: 感谢您的耐心等待，很抱歉您的妈妈还没有收到电子礼品卡，请查看发送的邮件。

translation.en: Russia warned of 'consequences' if Ukraine attacked
translation.zh: 俄罗斯遭警告称，入侵乌克兰将导致“巨大后果”

translation.en: The Group of Seven has warned Russia of massive consequences and severe costs if President Vladimir Putin attacks Ukraine, according to a draft statement.
translation.zh: 根据一份声明草案，七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京 (Vladimir Putin) 进攻乌克兰，将面临巨大后果和严重代价。

translation.en: US intelligence assesses that Russia could be planning a multi-front offensive on Ukraine as early as next year, involving up to 175,000 troops.
translation.zh: 美国情报机构评估称，俄罗斯可能计划最早于明年对乌克兰发起多线进攻，兵力多达 17.5 万。

translation.en: The Kremlin denies it plans to invade and says the West is gripped by Russophobia.
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫否认计划入侵乌克兰，并表示西方被俄罗斯恐惧症所控制。

translation.en: Moscow says the expansion of NATO threatens Russia and has contravened assurances given to it as the Soviet Union collapsed in 1991.
translation.zh: 莫斯科说，北约的扩张对俄罗斯构成威胁，违反了 1991 年苏联解体时向俄罗斯作出的保证。

translation.en: At a meeting in the northern English city Liverpool, the G7 delegates said they were united in their condemnation of Russia's military build-up near Ukraine and they called on Moscow to de-escalate.
translation.zh: 在英格兰北部城市利物浦举行的会议上，七国集团代表表示，他们一致谴责俄罗斯在乌克兰附近的军事集结，并呼吁莫斯科缓和局势。

translation.en: "Russia should be in no doubt that further military aggression against Ukraine would have massive consequences and severe cost," the draft statement said, confirmed by G7 sources.
translation.zh: 经七国集团消息人士证实的声明草案称:“俄罗斯应该毫不怀疑，对乌克兰的进一步军事侵略将产生巨大的后果，必将付出严重的代价。”

translation.en: "We reaffirm our unwavering commitment to Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity, as well as the right of any sovereign state to determine its own future," the draft said.
translation.zh: “我们重申对乌克兰主权和领土完整，以及任何主权国家都有权决定自己未来的坚定承诺，”草案说。

translation.en: For Moscow, the growing NATO embrace of a neighbouring former Soviet republic - and what it sees as the nightmare possibility of alliance missiles in Ukraine targeted against Russia - is a "red line" it will not allow to be crossed.
translation.zh: 对莫斯科来说，北约对这个前苏联邻国的日益接纳——以及北约在乌克兰部署针对俄罗斯的导弹的可能性——是一条它不允许越过的“红线”。

translation.en: Mr Putin has demanded legally binding security guarantees that NATO will not expand further east or place its weapons close to Russian territory; Washington has repeatedly said no country can veto Ukraine's NATO hopes.
translation.zh: 普京要求有法律约束力的安全保证，北约不会进一步向东扩张，也不会在俄罗斯领土附近部署武器；华盛顿一再表示，任何国家对乌克兰加入北约都没有否决权。

translation.en: In 2014, Russia seized the Black Sea peninsula of Crimea from Ukraine, prompting the West to slap sanctions on Russia.
translation.zh: 2014 年，俄罗斯从乌克兰手中夺取了黑海半岛克里米亚，促使西方对俄罗斯实施制裁。

translation.en: The Kremlin said today that Mr Putin told US President Joe Biden that Russian troops posed no threat and that Moscow was being demonised for moving troops around its own territory.
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫今天表示，普京告诉美国总统乔·拜登，俄罗斯军队不会造成威胁，莫斯科不应因为在自己的领土调动军队而被妖魔化。

translation.en: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said there were very serious conceptual differences between Russia and the United States on Moscow's "red lines."
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫发言人佩斯科夫 (Dmitry Peskov) 表示，俄罗斯和美国在莫斯科的“红线”问题上存在非常严重的概念分歧。

translation.en: The G7 comprises Britain, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Canada and the United States, and includes a representative from the European Union.
translation.zh: 七国集团包括英国、法国、德国、意大利、日本、加拿大和美国，还包括一名来自欧盟的代表。

translation.en: "We call on Russia to de-escalate, pursue diplomatic channels and abide by its international commitments on transparency of military activities," the G7 said in the draft.
translation.zh: 七国集团在草案中表示:“我们呼吁俄罗斯缓和局势，寻求外交渠道，遵守其关于军事活动透明度的国际承诺。”

translation.en: "We reconfirm our support for the efforts of France and Germany in the Normandy Format to achieve full implementation of the Minsk Agreements in order to resolve the conflict in eastern Ukraine," the draft said.
translation.zh: 草案说:“我们重申支持法国和德国在诺曼底模式下为全面实施《明斯克协议》所作的努力，以解决乌克兰东部的冲突。”

translation.en: China's Xi and Russia's Putin dominate the G7
translation.zh: 中国主席习近平和俄罗斯总统普京成为了七国集团的关注点

translation.en: Pope calls for 'serious international dialogue' to defuse Ukraine tensions
translation.zh: 教皇呼吁进行“严肃的国际对话”来缓和乌克兰的紧张局势

translation.en: Pope Francis, in his first comments on the tensions between the West and Russia over Ukraine, today called for serious international dialogue to resolve tensions and urged both sides to avoid an armed conflict.
translation.zh: 今天，教皇方济各 (Pope Francis) 首次就西方和俄罗斯在乌克兰问题上的紧张关系发表评论，他呼吁进行严肃的国际对话来解决紧张关系，并敦促双方避免武装冲突。

translation.en: He said he was praying for "dear Ukraine, for all its churches and religious communities and for all of its people, so that tensions there are resolved through a serious international dialogue and not with weapons."
translation.zh: 他说，他为“亲爱的乌克兰，为所有的教堂和宗教团体，为所有的乌克兰人民祈祷，让紧张局势通过严肃的国际对话而不是武器得到解决。

translation.en: Weapons are not the path to take.
translation.zh: 武器不是我们该做的选择。

translation.en: May this Christmas bring peace to Ukraine," the pope told thousands of people in St Peter's Square for his noon blessing and address.
translation.zh: 愿这个圣诞节为乌克兰带来和平，”教皇在圣彼得广场对数千人演讲，并在中午进行了祝福和讲话。

translation.en: Ukraine is predominantly Orthodox Christian, with Catholics of either the Latin Rite or Byzantine rite making up about 10% of the population in the former Soviet republic.
translation.zh: 乌克兰的第一大宗教是东正教，信奉拉丁礼或拜占庭礼的天主教徒占这个前苏联共和国人口的 10% 左右。

translation.en: Separately, Mr Biden has said he told Mr Putin that Russia would pay "a terrible price" and face devastating economic consequences if it invaded Ukraine.
translation.zh: 另外，拜登表示，他警告普京，如果入侵乌克兰，俄罗斯将付出“可怕的代价”，并面临毁灭性的经济后果。

translation.en: Plus Muscle Maintenance to support muscular structure and activity
translation.zh: 外加肌肉保养，为肌肉结构和活动做补充

translation.en: Joint Aid for Dogs is a high specification joint and muscle supplement with glucosamine for dogs, designed to aid freedom of movement.
translation.zh: Joint Aid for Dogs 是一种优质的关节和肌肉补充剂，含有狗狗需要的葡萄糖胺，旨在帮助狗狗自由行动。

translation.en: Joint Aid for Dogs can be fed to all dogs from any age at the ‘General Support’ level to maintain freedom of movement and muscle condition throughout their lives.
translation.zh: Joint Aid for Dogs 可以按照“一般补充”水平喂给任何年龄的狗狗，帮助它们终生保持行动自由和肌肉状况。

translation.en: For elderly and working dogs or those showing reduced muscle mass, Joint Aid for Dogs is recommended to be fed at the ‘Full Support’ level.
translation.zh: 对于上了年纪的狗狗和工作犬，或肌肉萎缩的狗狗，建议按照“完全补充”水平喂养 Joint Aid for Dogs。

translation.en: What are the key benefits of using Joint Aid for Dogs?
translation.zh: 使用 Joint Aid for Dogs 有何重要好处？

translation.en: -Maintains flexibility of movement in all working and pet dogs regardless of age, size and level of exercise.
translation.zh: -保持所有工作犬和宠物犬的运动灵活性，无论其年龄、体型和运动水平如何。

translation.en: -Supports the formation of cartilage, tendons, ligaments, synovial fluid and muscles.
translation.zh: -对软骨、肌腱、韧带、滑膜液和肌肉的形成有益。

translation.en: -Helps maintain the natural anti-inflammatory actions of the dog's metabolism.
translation.zh: -有助于维持狗狗新陈代谢的自然抗炎作用。

translation.en: -Provides a unique combination of 22 active nutraceuticals.
translation.zh: -提供 22 种活性保健品的独特组合。

translation.en: -Contains the unique Oatinol™ Delivery System to maintain a high rate of nutrient absorption.
translation.zh: -含有独特的 Oatinol™ 输送系统，保持营养的高吸收率。

translation.en: -Contains high levels of Omega 3 to support optimum health and performance.
translation.zh: -含有大量的欧米茄 3，有助于维持最佳健康和性能。

translation.en: -Manufactured as palatable and easy-to-feed 2mm pellets.
translation.zh: -制造成美味且易于喂食的 2mm 颗粒。

translation.en: -Can be fed to all dogs regardless of age, size or level of exercise.​
translation.zh: -可以喂给任意年龄、大小或运动水平的所有狗狗。

translation.en: -For continued support, Joint Aid is recommended to be fed on a daily basis.
translation.zh: -若要持续补充，建议每天喂食 Joint Aid。

translation.en: A measure is included in the pack.
translation.zh: 包中含有一个计量器。

translation.en: Nutraceuticals are nutritional substances that provide additional health benefits.
translation.zh: 营养药品是可以额外带来健康好处的营养物质。

translation.en: Through the addition of the following nutraceuticals, Joint Aid provides a complementary support for all dogs.
translation.zh: Joint Aid 添加了以下营养药品，可为所有狗狗提供营养补充。

translation.en: High levels of 5 particular dietary amino acids, essential for the production of muscle tissue.
translation.zh: 含有大量的 5 种特定的膳食氨基酸，对肌肉组织的产生至关重要。

translation.en: Chondroitin is essential for the resilience of cartilage.
translation.zh: 软骨素对软骨的弹性至关重要。

translation.en: It maintains normal enzymatic activity and water-holding capacity to provide healthy resistance to compression.
translation.zh: 它可以保持正常的酶活性和持水能力，提供健康的抗紧缩。

translation.en: Collagen possesses great tensile strength and provides the framework that gives tissues their firmness and resilience.
translation.zh: 胶原蛋白具有很大的拉伸强度，并提供可使组织变得坚固、有弹性的框架。

translation.en: Please use the “add to basket” function to combine your order, then checkout and pay as normal.
translation.zh: 请使用“加入购物篮”功能组合订单，然后正常结账和付款。

translation.en: We will then refund any excess shipping when we dispatch.
translation.zh: 我们发货时会退还多余的运费。

translation.en: If you would like to know upfront what the shipping will be, please send us a message stating which items and sizes you would like and the country they are to be shipped to.
translation.zh: 如果您想提前知道运费的价格，请把您想要的商品和尺寸，以及收货地点所在的国家/地区告诉我们。

translation.en: Q. Can you send my order to a different address?
translation.zh: Q.能把我的订单寄到另一个地址吗？

translation.en: A. If you are in the UK, we have no problem sending to a different UK address but you must have picked an item that has signed for delivery as its default shipping, or have picked the signed for delivery option when you placed the order.
translation.zh: A.如果您在英国，我们可以将您的订单寄到另一个英国地址，但您必须选择签名收件作为默认快递的商品，或者在下单时就选择了签名收件选项。

translation.en: For international orders, we cannot change the address.
translation.zh: 对于国际订单，我们无法更改地址。

translation.en: If there is a mistake, please let us know as soon as possible so that we can cancel the order and so that you can re-purchase with the correct address.
translation.zh: 如果地址有错，请尽快告诉我们，我们会取消订单，然后您可以用正确的地址重新购买。

translation.en: Q. Can I have the measurements of an item?
translation.zh: Q.我能知道商品的尺寸吗？

translation.en: A. Please check both the listing description and the pictures in the listing.
translation.zh: A.请查看清单中的描述和清单中的图片。

translation.en: Whenever possible, we will attempt to put up a size guide.
translation.zh: 我们会尽量张贴一个尺寸指南。

translation.en: If you can’t find a size guide, please contact us.
translation.zh: 如果找不到尺寸指南，请联系我们。

translation.en: Q. How does the clothing compare to my country's sizes?
translation.zh: Q.衣服的尺码和我国的尺码比起来怎样？

translation.en: A. Unless stated otherwise, all items were designed for the UK market.
translation.zh: A.除非另有说明，所有商品都是根据英国市场设计的。

translation.en: If you are in North America, the sizing in the UK is slightly smaller so you may need to go up one size.
translation.zh: 如果您在北美，英国的尺码要小一些，所以您可能需要加大一个尺码。

translation.en: Please see size charts for further guidance.
translation.zh: 请参阅尺码表以了解更多信息。

translation.en: Normally, the UK sizes are the same as the EU sizes and shouldn’t need to be altered.
translation.zh: 通常情况下，英国的尺码和欧盟的尺码是一样的，不需要改变。

translation.en: Q. When will my order arrive?
translation.zh: Q.我什么时候能收到订单？

translation.en: A. For the UK, we send almost all orders via Royal Mail 1st Class.
translation.zh: A.如果您在英国，我们几乎所有订单都交由 Royal Mail 1st Class 配送。

translation.en: This has a 1-3 day delivery estimate.
translation.zh: 大概 1-3 天能送到。

translation.en: If you require a next-day delivery, we do offer a Royal Mail Special Delivery 1pm service.
translation.zh: 如果您需要次日送达，我们提供下午 1 点的 Royal Mail Special Delivery。

translation.en: For Europe, most orders take between 3-5 days to arrive in the country and for the rest of the world 5-7 days.
translation.zh: 对于英国以外的欧洲国家，大多数订单需要 3-5 天送达，世界其他地区则需要 5-7 天。

translation.en: After that, we cannot offer an estimate on delivery times as it comes down to individual country's postal service and customs if outside of the EU.
translation.zh: 对于欧盟以外的地区，我们无法估算交货时间，因为这与各个国家的邮政服务和海关有关。

translation.en: Q. Can I exchange for a different size/item?
translation.zh: Q.我可以换成另一个尺码/商品吗？

translation.en: A. Yes, there are two ways this can be done.
translation.zh: A.可以的，换货的方式有两种。

translation.en: 1) Please contact us asking for a returns address.
translation.zh: 1) 请联系我们，索要退货地址。

translation.en: When you send the item back, you must include a note stating your eBay ID and the size that you require.
translation.zh: 退货时，必须在纸条上写明您的 eBay ID 和要换的尺码。

translation.en: If you placed an international order, half of the shipping original charged would be applied again.
translation.zh: 如果是国际订单，将再次收取原运费的一半。

translation.en: 2) Use the eBay option to return an item.
translation.zh: 2) 使用 eBay 选项退货。

translation.en: This option is also suitable if you would like a refund, as once we have received the item back we will refund you; if you need an exchange, please purchase the correct item either before or after the refund as required.
translation.zh: 如果您要退款，也可以使用这个选项，我们收到退回的商品后即会为您退款；如果您要换货，请根据需要在退款前或退款后购买正确的商品。

translation.en: Please use the “add to basket” function so that you order stays together.
translation.zh: 请使用“加入购物篮”功能组合订单。

translation.en: If items are ordered individually, we cannot guarantee that they will be shipped together.
translation.zh: 如果单独下单，我们不能保证各个订单会一起发货。

translation.en: Once all items are in your shopping basket, please checkout and pay as normal and we will refund the excess shipping.
translation.zh: 在将所有商品加入购物篮后，正常结帐并付款，我们将退还多余的运费。

translation.en: If you haven’t received your refund after we have marked an item as dispatched, please send us a message so that we can have the refund processed.
translation.zh: 如果您尚未收到退款，订购的商品即标记为已发货，请发消息提醒我们退款。

translation.en: Q. Do you include a receipt?
translation.zh: Q.有收据吗？

translation.en: A. No, we do not include receipts in packages unless requested.
translation.zh: A.除非您有要求，否则我们不提供收据。

translation.en: If you require a receipt, please send us a message and we can have one emailed over.
translation.zh: 如果您需要收据，请告诉我们，我们可以通过电子邮件发给您。

translation.en: If you require a VAT receipt, please contact us and we can email one over.
translation.zh: 如果您需要增值税收据，请联系我们，我们可以发邮件给您。

translation.en: Q. I have been waiting a while for my order and it hasn’t arrived.
translation.zh: Q.我的订单发货好久了，我都没收到。

translation.en: Is it possibly lost?
translation.zh: 不会是丢了吧？

translation.en: A. For orders going to the UK, please give your order 7 days to arrive, Europe 21 days and rest of world 30 days.
translation.zh: A.英国订单大约 7 天到达，欧洲 21 天，世界其他地区 30 天。

translation.en: If you order still hasn’t arrived after these dates, please contact us so that we can investigate with the delivery agent.
translation.zh: 如果您的订单经过这些天数日期之后仍未送达，请与我们联系，我们将询问货运代理。

translation.en: Please note this can take up to 2 weeks, but as soon as we have an update, we will let you know.
translation.zh: 请注意，我们最多 2 周才能知道结果，但是一有新消息，我们会立即通知您。

translation.en: Q. I am outside of the EU.
translation.zh: Q.我不在欧盟国家。

translation.en: Do I have to pay any duties or customs?
translation.zh: 我需要支付关税吗？

translation.en: A. Please check this information with local authorities.
translation.zh: A.请向当地政府部门了解这一信息。

translation.en: We do not accept any responsibility for customs or duty charges, nor will we pay any money towards them.
translation.zh: 我们不代收关税，也不向海关支付任何款项。

translation.en: We do not alter information on customs declarations so please don’t ask.
translation.zh: 我们不能更改报关信息，因此无法回答这方面的问题。

translation.en: We thank you for your custom.
translation.zh: 感谢您的惠顾。

translation.en: We are a small business based in the Isle of Man, and if you have any enquires about your order or any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us.
translation.zh: 我们只是马恩岛的一家小企业，如果您的订单有问题，请随时联系我们。

translation.en: We will attempt to get back to you as quickly as possible but it may take up to 24 hours.
translation.zh: 我们会在 24 小时内尽快给您回复。

translation.en: If you haven’t received a response after this time, please send the message again in case we have overlooked it or on the rare occasion when there is a problem with the eBay Messages.
translation.zh: 如果您在 24 小时后没有收到回复，请再次发送消息，以防我们漏掉了消息，或者 eBay 消息出现问题（虽然这种情况很少见）。

translation.en: I am just checking this information for you, I won't be long
translation.zh: 我只是查一下信息，不会太久的

translation.en: I have checked and this would be contactless so they would not be able to bring the item to your property I am afraid, I do apologise about this
translation.zh: 我查过了，只能选择无接触式投递，所以他们不能把包裹送到您家里，我很抱歉

translation.en: Scholz, Polish prime minister discuss migration, energy, EU
translation.zh: 奥拉夫•肖尔茨 (Olaf Scholz) 与波兰总理讨论移民、能源和欧盟问题

translation.en: Germany's new chancellor, Olaf Scholz came to Warsaw Sunday for talks with Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki about migration, energy, European Union matters and tensions east of the bloc's border.
translation.zh: 德国新任总理奥拉夫•肖尔茨星期天抵达华沙，与波兰总理马泰乌什·莫拉维茨基 (Mateusz Morawiecki) 就移民、能源、欧盟事务以及欧盟东部边境的紧张局势举行会谈。

translation.en: He was greeted by Morawiecki, with military honors, in front of the Polish premier's office.
translation.zh: 他在波兰总理办公室前受到莫拉维茨基的军事礼遇。

translation.en: It was one of Scholz's early visits after he was sworn in with his coalition Cabinet on Wednesday.
translation.zh: 这是肖尔茨周三宣誓就职联合内阁后首批访问目的地之一。

translation.en: Poland is a vocal opponent of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline that will carry Russian gas directly to Germany saying it makes Europe dependent on Russia's deliveries, and exposes it to pressure from Moscow.
translation.zh: 波兰直言不讳地反对将俄罗斯天然气通过北溪 2 号管道直接输送到德国，称这会使欧洲依赖于俄罗斯的天然气输送，并使其面临来自莫斯科的压力。

translation.en: Germany's regulator has suspended the approval procedure for the completed pipeline because of legal issues.
translation.zh: 由于法律问题，德国监管机构暂停了对已完工管道的审批程序。

translation.en: The government in Warsaw is also involved in an intensifying dispute with the European Commission, the EU's executive arm, which is withholding pandemic recovery funds from Poland saying the government's policies erode judicial independence there.
translation.zh: 华沙政府也卷入了与欧盟执行机构欧盟委员会日益激烈的争端，欧盟委员会拒绝向波兰提供疫情恢复资金，称政府的政策侵蚀了波兰的司法独立。

translation.en: Scholz and Morawiecki are also to discuss complex bilateral relations under Germany's new government.
translation.zh: Scholz 和 Morawiecki 还将讨论德国新政府领导下复杂的双边关系。

translation.en: The good neighborly ties are still overshadowed by World War II, especially under Poland's current right-wing government, which is saying Germany owes Poland compensation for wartime damages.
translation.zh: 两国的睦邻关系仍然被二战阴影所笼罩，特别是在波兰现任右翼政府的领导下，他们说德国应向波兰支付战时损害赔偿。

translation.en: Agnieszka Lada-Konefal, the deputy director of the German Institute for Polish Affairs in Darmstadt, Germany, expects Scholz's government to continue dialogue and contact with Poland, which is an important member on EU's eastern flank and Germany's fifth-largest trading partner.
translation.zh: 位于德国达姆施塔特的德国波兰事务研究所副所长 Agnieszka Lada-Konefal 希望肖尔茨政府继续与波兰进行对话和接触，波兰是欧盟东翼的重要成员，也是德国第五大贸易伙伴。

translation.en: The visit comes 30 years after the two parliaments ratified a treaty on good neighborly relations and friendly cooperation.
translation.zh: 30 年前，两国议会批准了睦邻友好合作条约。

translation.en: Germany's new foreign minister, Annalena Baerbock, was in Warsaw on Friday.
translation.zh: 德国新任外交部长贝尔博克 (Annalena Baerbock) 周五在华沙。

translation.en: She voiced Germany's support for Poland which has sealed its eastern frontier to migrants who are apparently encouraged by the Belarus government to seek illegal passage.
translation.zh: 她表达了德国对波兰的支持，波兰封锁了东部边境，阻止明显受到白俄罗斯政府鼓励的非法移民通过。

translation.en: She also called for humanitarian treatment of the migrants stuck at the border.
translation.zh: 她还呼吁给予滞留在边境的移民人道主义待遇。

translation.en: Poland and the EU say the government of Belarusian President Aleksander Lukashenko is seeking to destabilize the bloc by encouraging migration into its countries.
translation.zh: 波兰和欧盟表示，白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科鼓励移民进入波兰，试图破坏欧盟的稳定。

translation.en: On Friday, Scholz met with French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris and later with EU and NATO officials in Brussels.
translation.zh: 星期五，肖尔茨在巴黎会见了法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙 (Emmanuel Macron)，随后在布鲁塞尔会见了欧盟和北约官员。

translation.en: Scholz, a center-left politician, became Germany's ninth post-World War II chancellor, opening a new era for the EU's most populous nation and largest economy after Angela Merkel's 16-year tenure.
translation.zh: 中左翼政治家肖尔茨成为二战后德国第九位总理，为这个欧盟人口最多的国家和最大经济体开启了一个新时代，安格拉·默克尔 (Angela Merkel) 担任德国总理16年。

translation.en: His government is made up of a coalition of his center-left Social Democrats, the environmentalist Greens and the pro-business Free Democrats.
translation.zh: 他的政府是由中间偏左的社会民主党、环保主义者绿党和亲商业的自由民主党组成的联盟。

translation.en: The Shuttlebays of the Enterprise-D
translation.zh: 进取号 D 的穿梭机

translation.en: The **Enterprise-D** of *The Next Generation* had **three** shuttlebays.
translation.zh: *下一代*中的**进取号 D** 有**三架**穿梭机。

translation.en: On the show, we always see Shuttlebays 2 and 3 on decks 12 and 13.
translation.zh: 我们在剧中总是看到 2 和 3 号穿梭机停放在 12 号和 13 号甲板上。

translation.en: These two shuttlebays were represented by a full-size studio set that could house full-size shuttlecraft sets.
translation.zh: 这两架穿梭机展示过全尺寸内景，可以放下整个航天飞机。

translation.en: I always loved it when episodes would showcase the twin shuttlebays at the back of the mid-section, neck, or whatever you want to call it.
translation.zh: 我特别喜欢看剧中从这两架穿梭机中间部分（或者颈部，或者随便您怎么叫它）的后面呈现它们并排停放的场景。

translation.en: How come we never saw the main shuttlebay?
translation.zh: 为什么我们从来没有看到过主穿梭机？

translation.en: It was located below the main bridge on decks 3&4 and would presumably be a massive facility.
translation.zh: 主穿梭机在主桥下的 3 号和 4 号甲板上，可能是一个巨大的设施。

translation.en: Instead of going there, the bridge crew would take a turbolift ride right past it all the way down to deck 13.
translation.zh: 桥上的工作人员没有去过这里，只是乘坐涡轮增压机直接经过它一直前往 13 号甲板。

translation.en: In the original *Star Trek*, a miniature set was built and used with a miniature shuttle to give the shuttlebay life.
translation.zh: 原版*星际迷航*制作了一个微型布景，还布置了一架微型航天飞机，让穿梭机看起来就像是真的一样。

translation.en: Characters were sometimes seen talking by doors that opened into the shuttlebay with the miniature set and shuttle superimposed to give the ship scale and life.
translation.zh: 有时可以看到剧中的人物在打开的穿梭机门旁交谈，微型布景和航天飞机叠加在一起，让穿梭机有一种真实感。

translation.en: Couldn't they have done this on TNG?
translation.zh: 在 TNG 中不能这么做吗？

translation.en: We saw Worf and Data launch a shuttle from the main shuttlebay in "The Best of Both Worlds, Part II," but the shuttle launch was seen from inside the shuttle.
translation.zh: 在“The Best of Both Worlds（下）”中，我们看到 Worf 和 Data 从主穿梭机发射了一架航天飞机，但发射过程是从航天飞机内部看到的。

translation.en: We simply see the wall outside the window as the shuttle flies out, quickly replaced by space.
translation.zh: 当航天飞机飞出去时，我们只看到窗外的墙一闪而过，紧接着就看到了太空。

translation.en: The only time we saw the shuttlebay in full scale was in "Cause and Effect."
translation.zh: 唯一一次看到主穿梭机全身是在《Cause and Effect》中。

translation.en: We see a space shot of the roll door opening, decompressing the main shuttlebay, and we get a quick glimpse of inside along with a few parked shuttles.
translation.zh: 我们看到太空发射时，卷帘门打开，给主穿梭机减压，里面停放着一些航天飞机，但这个镜头只是一闪而过。

translation.en: Any ideas as to why the main shuttlebay was never seen outside these two instances?
translation.zh: 除了这两处情节，再也没有出现过主穿梭机了，您知道是为什么吗？

translation.en: My apologies again for the inconvenience this has caused you.
translation.zh: 给您带来不便，再次表示歉意。

translation.en: We are still looking ways to improve our services and this will be noted as a feedback to one of our valued customer.
translation.zh: 您是我们的重要客户，我们要告诉您的是，我们一直在努力改善服务。

translation.en: Thank you - so this query is with warehouse as stated in yesterdays chat, we have to await the reply to the investigation.
translation.zh: 谢谢，我们昨天说过，这个问题要与仓库核实，现在正在等待答复。

translation.en: As soon as we have heard back, tis is when you will be emailed
translation.zh: 我们一收到回复，就会给您发邮件

translation.en: I case the screen frozen one more time, please process this steps:
translation.zh: 如果屏幕又一次冻结，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following:
translation.zh: 执行以下操作之一，将您的电子阅读器连接到电源：

translation.en: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader.
translation.zh: - 打开电脑，把随附的 USB 线先连接到电脑，再连接到电子阅读器。

translation.en: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.zh: - 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off.
translation.zh: 按住电源按钮，直到电子阅读器右上方的电源灯灭掉。

translation.en: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off.
translation.zh: 在电子阅读器关闭时，您将看到“关机”按钮。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。

translation.en: Wait for the Restore screen to appear.
translation.zh: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process.
translation.zh: 您的电子阅读器屏幕将变黑，并开始恢复过程。

translation.en: Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.zh: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

translation.en: I see it all the time in my line of work.
translation.zh: 我在工作中经常看到这种情况。

translation.en: And it doesn’t even have to be life or death to be frustrating.
translation.zh: 人不一定在面对生死问题时才会绝望。

translation.en: Had a recent patient who needed a very specific knee procedure to walk normally and improve quality of life.
translation.zh: 最近，我有个病人需要做一个非常特殊的膝盖手术，才能正常行走和提高生活质量。

translation.en: Peer to peer failed.
translation.zh: 但被互助保险拒绝了。

translation.en: Insurance says it’s not medically necessary.
translation.zh: 保险公司说这不是必须的医疗手术。

translation.en: We appeal.
translation.zh: 我们提出申诉。

translation.en: They say no again.
translation.zh: 他们又拒绝了。

translation.en: We go to third party appeal.
translation.zh: 我们向第三方上诉。

translation.en: We submit all the pertinent medical research supporting the need for the procedure.
translation.zh: 我们提交了所有相关的医学研究，表明这项手术的必要性。

translation.en: We even included the second opinion of a different surgeon outside of our program — yeah, he recommends the procedure.
translation.zh: 我们甚至还提交了另一位与我们的项目无关的外科医生的意见——是的，他也推荐了这个手术。

translation.en: 24 hours later, they hit us back with the final “No.
translation.zh: 24 小时后，他们的最终答复仍然是：“不同意。

translation.en: Not medically necessary.”
translation.zh: 这在医学上不是必要的。”

translation.en: My surgeon flips his shit and is like “FINE!
translation.zh: 我的外科医生崩溃了，说“好吧！

translation.en: But you’re going to fucking tell me which procedure you would recommend, because I don’t know another one that is gonna help this poor kid”.
translation.zh: 但你他妈得告诉我你推荐哪种手术啊，因为我不知道还能怎么帮这个可怜的孩子”。

translation.en: Of course, they don’t.
translation.zh: 他们当然不会这样做了。

translation.en: And this kid is screwed.
translation.zh: 这孩子完蛋了。

translation.en: No other option.
translation.zh: 他没有其他的选择。

translation.en: As it turns out this procedure is generally hated by insurance because it’s pretty expensive.
translation.zh: 事实证明，保险公司普遍不喜欢这种手术，因为它太贵了。

translation.en: We always have to fight for it, but they’ll usually agree after an appeal.
translation.zh: 我们一般都会申诉，而且都得到了他们的同意。

translation.en: Not this time.
translation.zh: 但这一次不行。

translation.en: The system is so broken.
translation.zh: 这个体制真是让人失望。

translation.en: Iowa Santa retires after 50 years
translation.zh: 爱荷华州圣诞老人工作 50 年后退休

translation.en: An Iowa Santa who has been making children smile for 50 years says he's ready to hang up the red suit and enjoy a quieter Christmas.
translation.zh: 爱荷华州的一位圣诞老人 50 年来一直给孩子们带来欢声笑语，他说他已经准备好收起红色衣服，享受一个安静的圣诞节。

translation.en: Dave Stoufer revealed health issues and age-related issues had led to his decision to retire from the "longest job" he had ever had.
translation.zh: 戴夫·斯托弗 (Dave Stoufer) 透露，由于健康和年龄问题，他决定从他做过的“时间最长的工作岗位”退休。

translation.en: His wife Rachel Nicola said while she was very proud of the work her husband had done to bring joy to so many people, she was looking forward to having more time to celebrate Christmas with him.
translation.zh: 他的妻子雷切尔·尼古拉 (Rachel Nicola) 表示，虽然她为丈夫给这么多人带来欢乐而感到自豪，但她也希望能有更多时间和他一起庆祝圣诞节。

translation.en: To repair your account on the #PRS_ORG# app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.zh: 要在 #PRS_ORG# App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：

translation.zh: 在 #PRS_ORG# App 的主屏幕上，点击屏幕底部的“更多”。

translation.en: Tap Repair your account.
translation.zh: 点击“修复帐户”。

translation.en: If you have a lot of items, it may take a while to repair your account.

translation.zh: 回到主屏幕，点击图书或音频书，然后查看是否显示缺少了的图书。

translation.en: Oriflame Optimals Hydra Radiance Hydrating Day Cream + Hydra Radiance Moisturising Night Cream- Normal/Combination Skin
translation.zh: Oriflame Optimals Hydra 焕肤水润日霜 + Hydra 焕肤水润晚霜 - 中性/混合型肌肤

translation.en: Formulated with a Swedish natural ingredient blend of Red Algae, Brown Algae and Aqua Minerals with Vitamin C and Anti-Pollution Active.
translation.zh: 含有瑞典天然成分混合物 - 红藻、褐藻和维生素 C 与抗污染活性的水矿物质。

translation.en: Aqua Minerals keeps skin hydrated and supple.
translation.zh: 水矿物质可以保持肌肤的水润和柔软。

translation.en: A hydrating day & night cream that leaves thirsty skin soft, supple and refreshed.
translation.zh: 保湿日霜和晚霜，让干渴的肌肤柔软、水润、清新。

translation.en: Formulated with a Swedish natural ingredient blend of Red Algae, Brown Algae and Aqua Minerals with Vitamin C and Anti-pollution Active.
translation.zh: 含有瑞典天然成分混合物 - 红藻、褐藻和维生素 C 与抗污染活性的水矿物质。

translation.en: The Major Credit Cards and Online bank Transfers are welcomed.
translation.zh: 接受主要信用卡和网上银行转账。

translation.en: Immediate Payment is required after the Winning Bid
translation.zh: 中标后需立即付款

translation.en: Item will be shipped on the same day or next day of receiving full payment.
translation.zh: 收到全额付款当天或第二天发货。

translation.en: Delivery time is approximately 10-21 working days (Bad weather can cause delays in delivery as well and may take more than a month to reach.).
translation.zh: 大约 10-21 个工作日后交货（恶劣的天气也会导致交货延迟，可能需要一个多月才能到达）。

translation.en: With an additional fee, we can arrange 5-11 business days express shipping courier (India post parcel.)

translation.en: We offer a combined shipping discount for purchasing two or more items from our shop.
translation.zh: 若从我店购买两件或两件以上的商品，我们提供联合航运折扣。

translation.en: Just ask us by clicking the "Ask a question"
translation.zh: 单击“提问”即可联系我们

translation.en: International Customers are responsible for their country’s custom duty and taxes.
translation.zh: 国际客户负责缴纳所在国家的关税和税收。

translation.en: The Buyer Has To Responsible For The Return Shipping Charge.
translation.zh: 退货运费由买家负责。

translation.en: Refund Can Be Made Only If A Replacement Is Not Available.
translation.zh: 在不提供换货服务的情况才能退款。

translation.en: Any Charges On Shipping, Handling And Insurance Are Non-Refundable.
translation.zh: 邮费、处理费和保险不可退款。

translation.en: We do not reimburse the shipping cost.
translation.zh: 我们不包邮。

translation.en: Our priority is 100% customer satisfaction.
translation.zh: 让客户 100% 满意是我们的首要任务。

translation.en: We give importance to our customers and deliver the highest quality of customer service.
translation.zh: 我们重视客户，努力提供最高质量的客户服务。

translation.en: Ethics and integrity are the best part of our business, and we believe in delivering the best quality product and services at the best prices.
translation.zh: 我们秉持道德和诚信开展业务，致力于以最优惠的价格提供最好的产品和服务。

translation.en: Moreover, we make it one of our central goals to answer questions as fast and as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 此外，尽快答复客户也是我们的中心目标之一。

translation.en: Our priority is 100% customer satisfaction.
translation.zh: 让客户 100% 满意是我们的首要任务。

translation.en: We aim to provide strictly 5-star service in all categories.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是在所有类别中提供 5 星级服务。

translation.en: We maintain 100% customer satisfaction!
translation.zh: 我们至今维持着 100% 的客户满意度！

translation.en: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.zh: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。

translation.en: When you receive the item, please leave us positive feedback.
translation.zh: 您在收到商品后，如果满意，请给我们一个好评。

translation.en: Positive feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will also leave you positive feedback.
translation.zh: 我们感谢您的好评，同时我们也会给您好评。

translation.en: If you are unhappy for any reason, please do not leave medium or negative Feedback.
translation.zh: 如果您因任何原因感到不满意，请不要给予中评或差评。

translation.en: Give us a chance, and we will give our best.
translation.zh: 给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。

translation.en: We will quickly address the problem and give you a satisfactory answer.
translation.zh: 我们会尽快处理您遇到的问题，给您一个满意的答复。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information
translation.zh: 请给我几分钟时间，我先验证您的信息。

translation.en: In this case what you can try is connecting the device using different USB cords.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，您可以尝试使用不同的 USB 线连接设备。

translation.en: Any generic micro-USB cord should work.
translation.zh: 任何普通的 Micro-USB 线都可以使用。

translation.en: Also, please try using different USB ports in your computer
translation.zh: 此外，请尝试使用电脑上的不同 USB 端口。

translation.en: From which country do you deliver?
translation.zh: 您从哪个国家发货？

translation.en: When is the package with us?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候能收到包裹？

translation.en: They have many thanks for their help.
translation.zh: 他们对获得的帮助表示感谢。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: Regrettably the prices of the items are as they show online, we cannot change or reduce this for you
translation.zh: 遗憾的是，这些商品的价格正如网上所示，我们无法改价或降价

translation.en: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.zh: 交货期如网站上所示。

translation.en: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。

translation.en: That is why we ask that you allow these lead times please.
translation.zh: 这就是我们要求留出备货期的原因。

translation.en: The lead time showing is when the next batch is due to arrive.
translation.zh: 备货期显示的是下一批货物到货的时间。

translation.en: I try to call the rider but he does not understand me.
translation.zh: 我试着呼叫骑手了，但他不明白我的意思。

translation.en: That is why please call the rider once he is near to the address place on the order using the app

translation.en: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.zh: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.zh: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声

translation.en: Hi, are you still there?
translation.zh: 嗨，您还在吗？

translation.en: We haven't heard from you.
translation.zh: 我们没有收到您的回复。

translation.en: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.zh: 我们联系不上了。

translation.en: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.zh: 我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。

translation.en: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。

translation.en: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.zh: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。

translation.en: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.zh: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接

translation.en: How was the farewell to Etho was like?
translation.zh: 与 Etho 的告别是怎样的？

translation.en: First of a quick disclaimer: I am not the account user but her wife.
translation.zh: 第一项简单声明：我不是账号使用者，而是他的妻子。

translation.en: I have permission to use this account because I just suck at tech and it kind of helps me with mental health issues (and I do see the irony of a technophobe asking about the redstone titan :P)
translation.zh: 我有权使用这个账号，因为我是个技术盲，它在某种程度上可以帮助我疏导心理（我确实看到过一个技术恐惧者询问红石巨人的讽刺段子 :P）

translation.en: Second and far more important disclaimer: I do not want to stir drama nor suspect something wasn't right.
translation.zh: 第二项，但也更为重要的声明：我不想挑起事端，也不想怀疑有什么不对劲。

translation.en: Afaik it was just a change of wind that didn't suit everyone.
translation.zh: 我想这只是风向的变化，虽然它并不适合所有人。

translation.en: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.
translation.zh: 我只是个怀旧的老粉丝。

translation.en: With that out of the way >.<...
translation.zh: 把这件事解决了 >.<...

translation.en: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.zh: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。

translation.en: Never missed a release from GuudeBoulderfist, loved the collabs, etc.
translation.zh: 我从未错过 GuudeBoulderfist 发布的内容，对联名款充满狂热等等

translation.en: While watching a random YouTube feed, I came across a vid detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.zh: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。

translation.en: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.zh: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。

translation.en: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.zh: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。

translation.en: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.zh: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。

translation.en: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.
translation.zh: 我在谷歌上搜索了一通，知道了他的一些事情。

translation.en: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.zh: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。

translation.en: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.
translation.zh: 整个故事都发生在我把兴趣转移到其他方面之后，所以我完全不知道这件事。

translation.en: What I am after is the other side of the picture?
translation.zh: 事情的另一面是什么样？

translation.en: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.zh: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。

translation.en: So how was the response from 'the old gang'?
translation.zh: “老帮派”的反应如何？

translation.en: Did you keep doing stuff together?
translation.zh: 你们还合作吗？

translation.en: Did you slowly drift apart?
translation.zh: 你们是不是慢慢疏远了？

translation.en: Still chat or invite one another to events?
translation.zh: 还有聊天或邀请对方参加活动吗？

translation.en: Again, I'm not expecting anything dramatic or to see people at each other's throats.
translation.zh: 再说一遍，我不希望发生什么戏剧性的事情或者看到人们互相掐架。

translation.en: Kinda the opposite.
translation.zh: 与此相反，

translation.en: I guess in a way, a form of low-key closure of something kinda small in my life to reflect a bit of positivity on my own mentally troubled butt.
translation.zh: 低调地结束生命中的一件小事，这多少能映射出我对自己心理问题表现出的积极方面。

translation.en: P.S. I couldn't help but see the charity fund raiser you had and the buttloads you collected.
translation.zh: 附言：我没有忍住，去看了你的慈善基金募集人，知道你募集到了大量资金。

translation.en: That's awesome as heck!
translation.zh: 真好！

translation.en: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，但下单后，我们就无法改地址了。

translation.en: In this case, what I suggest is you can call the rider once he is nearby already for you to be able to amend the address.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，我的建议是，在骑手到达附近时呼叫骑手，然后就能改地址了。

translation.en: To do this, simply access your order page, tap 'Help and support' and choose the option 'Call rider'.
translation.zh: 只需进入您的订单页面，点击“帮助与支持”，然后选择“呼叫骑手”选项。

translation.en: did you sign out and sign in on your app?
translation.zh: 您从 App 注销并登录了吗？

translation.en: did you do the 2 procedures?
translation.zh: 这两个过程都完成了吗？

translation.en: if you did both procedures and didn't solve the issue I can refund the money to your Store Credit account.
translation.zh: 如果这两个过程都执行了，仍然不能解决问题，我可以向您的 Store Credit 帐户退款。

translation.en: that way you can buy the book of your choice immedialtrely.
translation.zh: 这样您可以立即购买自己选择的图书。

translation.en: would that be okay
translation.zh: 这样可以吗

translation.en: are you there?
translation.zh: 您还在吗？

translation.en: for quality purposes i will have to release this chat if there is no interaction in the next 2 minutes
translation.zh: 如果您在接下来的 2 分钟内没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我将结束本次聊天

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.zh: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。

translation.en: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.zh: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。

translation.en: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.zh: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。

translation.en: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.zh: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。

translation.en: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.zh: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。

translation.en: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.zh: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。

translation.en: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.zh: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。

translation.en: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.zh: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。

translation.en: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.zh: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。

translation.en: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.zh: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。

translation.en: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.zh: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。

translation.en: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.zh: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。

translation.en: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。

translation.en: Audio Inputs - 6 balanced or S/PDIF audio (each selectable) on terminal blocks, one for each of the 2 universal video and 4 computer graphics video inputs.
translation.zh: 音频输入 - 端子板的 6 路平衡或 S/PDIF 音频（每个均可选），每个用于 2 路通用视频和 4 路计算机图形视频输入。

translation.en: Built-in ProcAmp - Color, hue, sharpness, contrast, and brightness are set individually for each input.
translation.zh: 内置 ProcAmp - 分别为每路输入设置颜色、色度、清晰度、对比度和亮度。

translation.en: The unit has been fully tested across all inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: 该装置已针对所有输入和输出进行了全面测试。

translation.en: The unit will require an speaker output connector.
translation.zh: 该装置将需要一个扬声器输出连接器。

translation.en: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.zh: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.zh: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。

translation.en: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook, but I'm willing to help you.
translation.zh: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。

translation.en: I'll share with a couple of steps to perform into your device, okay?
translation.zh: 我将与您分享一些可在设备上执行的步骤。

translation.en: This macro extension tube set can be transform your lens into a macro lens.
translation.zh: 这个微距延长管套装可以把你的镜头变成一个微距镜头。

translation.en: The set is consist of three tubes of different length, which can be used in any combination or individually to obtain the different magnification.
translation.zh: 这个套装包含三根不同长度的延长管，可以任意组合使用，也可以单独使用，以获得不同的放大倍率。

translation.en: The 3 individual rings can be used separately with the camera body mount and a lens adapter, and of course the magnification ratio will be different.
translation.zh: 这三个单独的环可以与相机机身和镜头适配器分开使用，当然放大倍率也会不同。

translation.en: You have 8 ranges of different combinations.
translation.zh: 总共有 8 种不同的组合。

translation.en: Extension tubes are metal tubes with a rear-lens mount at one end and a camera-body mount at the other end.
translation.zh: 延长管是金属管，一端是后镜头支架，另一端是相机本体支架。

translation.en: The extension tube set does not affect image quality as there is no optics inside.
translation.zh: 延长管套装不影响图像质量，因为内部没有光学元件。

translation.en: No electronic contact and auto focus cannot be performed.
translation.zh: 不能执行电子接触和自动对焦。

translation.en: Exposure and focus have to be adjusted manually.
translation.zh: 曝光和对焦必须手动调节。

translation.en: Set up camera and lens to manual mode, switch off and detach the lens;
translation.zh: 将相机和镜头设置为手动模式，关闭并分离镜头；

translation.en: Attach extension tube between the camera and lens
translation.zh: 将延长管连接到相机和镜头之间

translation.en: Put the object close to the lens and use a lot of light
translation.zh: 把物体靠近镜头，使用充足的光线

translation.en: When tubes are attached, you need to do all manually
translation.zh: 连接延长管时，需要手动完成所有操作

translation.en: and it is important that you use a lot of external light.
translation.zh: 必须要有充足的外部光线。

translation.en: If you don't do this in a bright environment, then you may have trouble to see the object through the viewfinder
translation.zh: 如果环境不够明亮，可能很难通过取景器看到物体

translation.en: Before doing it, I would like you to consider that any annotation that you have made in your books may be deleted, as well as filters, reading progress, downloads and other customization.

translation.zh: 如果您有第三方电子书，可能也会丢失

translation.en: You can adjust the text size, fonts, line spacing, and justification to make reading easier on your eyes.
translation.zh: 您可以调整文本大小、字体、行间距和对齐方式，给您带来更舒适的阅读体验。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: Please keep tapping where the images are showing, are you able to see the images and follow where to tap?
translation.zh: 请一直按住图片出现的位置，您是否看到了图片，能否点击指示的位置？

translation.zh: 我会继续提供图片

translation.en: But please let me know if you were able to tap on your device where the images say
translation.zh: 但是，请您告诉我，您能否在设备上点击图片指示的位置

translation.en: It was prior to 2018.
translation.zh: 这是 2018 年之前的事了。

translation.en: I got stranded by US Air in Philadelphia instead of taking me all the way to Newark, and me and a dozen other people were trying to get cars late in the evening.
translation.zh: 我被困在了费城，我本该搭乘美国航空公司的飞机前往纽瓦克的，当时夜已经很深，我和其他十几个人都想租车。

translation.en: The counter people were the worst I have ever seen.
translation.zh: 柜台工作人员是我见过的最差劲的工作人员。

translation.en: A line out the door and they were taking breaks and talking about random non-work related stuff like we weren’t even here.
translation.zh: 门外排着队，他们却在休息，还聊着和工作无关的话题，就好像我们是空气一样。

translation.en: I had a confirmed reservation went.
translation.zh: 但我已经预订了他们的车。

translation.en: After an hour of waiting, I told her what I had reserved and she loudly accused me of lying to her and told me off.
translation.zh: 所以，等了一个小时后，我跟柜台的人说我已预订车了，可她大声指责我胡说，叫我走开。

translation.en: I finally gave up and walked over to Hertz, who charged me a fortune, but they got me a car right away.
translation.zh: 最后我放弃了，走到了 Hertz 那里，他们收了我一大笔钱，但马上给我安排了一辆车。

translation.en: I swore to never use Avis again.
translation.zh: 我发誓再也不用 Avis 了。

translation.en: Worst car experience ever.
translation.zh: 这是我遇到的最糟糕的用车体验。

translation.en: National & Hertz have always been good experiences for me.
translation.zh: National 和 Hertz 一直都很靠谱。

translation.en: Those two, followed by Enterprise.
translation.zh: 紧随其后的是 Enterprise。

translation.en: Enterprise wasn’t really bad in any way but they were never as convenient as National where I could walk up and pick out a car and drive away without waiting forever at a counter.
translation.zh: 无论从哪方面来说，Enterprise 都不差，但总归没有 National 那么方便，在 National，永久不必在柜台前等候，随时都能找到一辆车开走。

translation.en: I know these are anecdotal experiences but I’ll go out of my way to tell everyone to avoid Avis like the plague.
translation.zh: 我知道这些都是趣闻轶事，但我还是要告诉大家，要像躲避瘟疫一样避开 Avis。

translation.en: It’s true that good customer service will keep customers loyal, and a bad customer experience will drive away 10 times as many more customer opportunities.
translation.zh: 要知道，优秀的客户服务才能拥有忠诚的客户，而糟糕的客户体验将流失 10 倍的客户。

translation.en: French fishermen threaten to disrupt British imports in post-Brexit fishing row
translation.zh: 在英国退欧后的渔业纠纷中，法国渔民威胁要中断从英国进口

translation.en: French fishermen have threatened to disrupt British imports in an attempt to press London for more licenses as tensions escalate between France and the UK over post-Brexit fishing rights.
translation.zh: 法国渔民威胁中断从英国进口，以求向伦敦方面施压，要求其发放更多许可，目前英法两国围绕英国退欧后的捕鱼权问题的紧张局势不断升级。

translation.en: The threat was made on Saturday a few hours after Britain agreed to issue another 23 licenses to French fishermen to alleviate tensions between the two neighbors who have been at loggerheads over the fishing row for the past six months.
translation.zh: 这一威胁是在周六发出的，就在几个小时前，英国同意向法国渔民另外发放 23 张捕鱼许可证，以缓解这两个邻国之间的紧张关系，过去 6 个月来，这两个国家一直因该捕鱼区而不和。

translation.en: France is seeking 81 more approvals to reach 104 licenses needed for its boats to operate in British and Channel Island waters under the Brexit agreement signed last year.
translation.zh: 根据去年签署的英国脱欧协议，法国正寻求再获得 81 张许可证，以达到其船只在英国和海峡群岛水域运营所需的 104 张许可证。

translation.en: The European Union had specified a December 10 deadline for London to grant licenses to French fishing boats under Brexit, with Paris threatening European legal action in case of no breakthrough.
translation.zh: 欧盟曾明确规定，在英国退欧期间，英国必须在 12 月 10 日之前向法国渔船发放许可证，法国威胁称，如果没有突破，欧洲将采取法律行动。

translation.en: Underlining that France is entitled to around 80 more UK licenses, a group representing fishermen in the key port of Boulogne-sur-Mer and others along the northern coast threatened late on Saturday to launch protests.
translation.zh: 代表主要港口布洛涅 (Boulogne-sur-Mer) 和北部海岸其他地区渔民的一个组织上周六晚间威胁要发起抗议，指称法国还有资格获得约 80 个英国许可证。

translation.en: "Protests should be expected ... protests that will target British imports," the local CRPMEM fishing industry group for the Hauts-de-France region said in a statement.
translation.zh: “抗议应该是预料之中的……抗议活动将针对英国进口产品，”法国上德地区当地渔业组织 CRPMEM 在一份声明中说。

translation.en: The group said its members were "exasperated" by the news of only 23 new licenses and felt "betrayed" by the European Commission, which could launch legal action against Britain over the issue.
translation.zh: 该组织表示，其成员对只有 23 个新牌照的消息感到“愤怒”，觉得被欧盟委员会“背叛”了，欧盟委员会可能会就此问题对英国采取法律行动。

translation.en: The CRPMEM said the protests would be "in line with blockades of ports in Brittany, Normandy and the north of France which took place on November 26."
translation.zh: CRPMEM 表示，抗议活动将“与 11 月 26 日发生的对布列塔尼、诺曼底和法国北部港口的封锁一致”。

translation.en: On that day, French fishing boats briefly blocked ferries and other boats in the ports of Calais, Saint-Malo and Ouistreham, while vehicles were also sent to disrupt traffic seeking to use the Channel Tunnel rail link.
translation.zh: 当天，法国渔船在加莱、圣马洛和乌斯特雷姆港口短暂拦截了渡轮和其他船只，同时还派车辆扰乱试图通过英吉利海峡隧道铁路的交通。

translation.en: Several rounds of talks between the two sides have since been held but a durable solution has yet to be worked out.
translation.zh: 此后双方进行了几轮会谈，但尚未制定出持久的解决方案。

translation.en: Therefore, we are prepared to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have before placing an order or after you have received your order.
translation.zh: 因此，如果您在下单前或收到商品后遇到问题，

translation.en: Please kindly contact us via eBay messages and a member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 请通过 eBay 消息联系我们，我们将尽快给您答复。

translation.zh: 请注意：我们的办公时间为：周一到周五，09:00 - 17:30。

translation.zh: 周末不办公。
