translation.zh: 非办公时间不发货。

translation.en: Also all orders placed on the weekends will be dispatched within the next working days.
translation.zh: 此外，所有周末订单将在下一个工作日天内发出。

translation.en: Our aim is to offer our customers the best service possible.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是为客户提供最好的服务。

translation.en: That is why we dispatch our orders within 1 working day once the payment has cleared.
translation.zh: 因此，我们会在客户付款后的 1 个工作日内发出订单。

translation.en: The delivery services we offer is standard tracked post (2-3 working days), first class service, as well as an express service.
translation.zh: 我们提供的送货服务是 Standard Tracked Post（2-3 个工作日）、First Class Service 和 Express Service。

translation.en: Please note, there may be slight delays from the courier service during festive occasions (e.g. Christmas).
translation.zh: 请注意，在节日期间（如圣诞节），快递服务可能会稍有延迟。

translation.en: Returns must be within 30 days of delivery in the exact same condition as they were sent.
translation.zh: 收货后 30 天内可退货，前提是商品状况与发货时完全相同。

translation.en: Please kindly message us via eBay messages regarding your return.
translation.zh: 如需退货，请通过 eBay 消息联系我们。

translation.en: Please include your eBay user name and a reason for return on a note to the parcel to speed up your refund or exchange process.
translation.zh: 请在包裹中放入一张纸条，写上您的 eBay 用户名和退货原因，以加快退款或换货过程。

translation.en: We will refund delivery costs if the goods are faulty, but for all other returns, this will not apply.
translation.zh: 如果商品有问题，我们将退还运费；出于其他原因的退货则不退还运费。

translation.en: This stuff withers when exposed to any critical thought.
translation.zh: 如果以批判性思维来看，这些东西会不攻自破。

translation.en: I'm not going to rule out that there are vast swaths of people who don't practice critical thinking, but either way, proving it wrong is no guarantee that it will wither.
translation.zh: 我不排除有很多人根本没有建立批判性思维，但无论如何，证明它是错误的并不能保证它就会消失。

translation.en: After all, we've already had a forensic audit and a hand recount of these votes, and that didn't help.
translation.zh: 毕竟，我们已经进行了司法审计和手工重新计票，但并无作用。

translation.en: Should we just keep allowing them to "audit" votes until they get the results they want?
translation.zh: 我们应该继续允许他们“审计”投票，直到他们得到他们想要的结果吗？

translation.en: >This is letting Uri Geller try and pull his shit on James Randi.
translation.zh: >这样就是让尤里·盖勒 (Uri Geller) 对詹姆斯·兰迪 (James Randi) 下手。

translation.en: This is where the story ends and the lie goes to die.
translation.zh: 故事会就此结束，谎言会就此终结吗？

translation.en: No, it's not.
translation.zh: 不，不会的。

translation.en: This is Uri Geller trying to pull his shit on James Randi, not liking the results, and hiring a company whose CEO has claimed he believes Geller's powers are real to "study" his powers and investigate whether Randi is a Communist who's trying to ruin Geller.
translation.zh: 尤里·盖勒想对詹姆斯·兰迪下手，他不喜欢这样的结果，并雇佣了一家公司，该公司的首席执行官声称，他相信盖勒的能力是真实的，他们要“研究”他的能力和并调查兰迪是否是一个试图毁掉盖勒的共产主义者。

translation.en: If there are no results produced here, they'll ask for another audit.
translation.zh: 如果没有结果，他们会要求再次审核。

translation.en: Or they'll claim that shredded ballots were fed to chickens that were then incinerated.
translation.zh: 或者他们会说撕碎的选票已经烧成灰给鸡吃了。

translation.en: >At some point, you have to do the actual work of looking at reality and comparing it to what they think and point out where they are wrong.
translation.zh: >在某种程度上，你得做些实际的工作，揭露现实，将其与他们的想法进行比较，并指出他们的错误。

translation.en: We've already done this.
translation.zh: 我们已经做过了。

translation.en: Twice.
translation.zh: 而且是两次。

translation.en: It hasn't stopped them.
translation.zh: 但这并没有让他们停下来。

translation.en: And it's not like this is harmless.
translation.zh: 何况，这样并非没有坏处。

translation.en: There are already allegations that these people are breaking federal law by not properly securing ballots.
translation.zh: 已经有人指控，这些人没有妥善保管选票，违反了联邦法律。

translation.en: Also mentioned in that article: This company plans to physically canvas parts of Maricopa county to ask people if their ballots match.
translation.zh: 该文章还提到：该公司计划在马里科帕县的部分地区进行实地调查，询问人们选票是否匹配。

translation.en: How comfortable would *you* be if someone showed up to ask you who you voted for in the last election, knowing that if you don't tell them, your vote might be flagged and discarded?
translation.zh: 如果有人来问你在上次选举中投了谁的票，而且知道如果你不说，你的票可能会被做上标记和丢弃，你心里舒服吗？

translation.en: How sure are you that this company is going to keep that data private, and not let others in your community know?
translation.zh: 对这家公司是否会对这些数据采取保密措施，不让你所在社区的其他人知道，你有多大的把握？

translation.en: And would you be as likely to vote if you knew that was a possibility every time?
translation.zh: 如果你知道每次都有这种可能性，你还会投票吗？

translation.en: I know plenty of people who wouldn't.
translation.zh: 我知道很多人不会了。

translation.en: Samco Sport vacuum tubing is a pure silicone rubber hose, which is available in internal diameters (I.D) from 3mm to 9mm.

translation.en: Suitable for low pressure installations only.
translation.zh: 只适用于低压安装。

translation.en: Samco’s vacuum hose is not designed to carry oil, fuel or for continuous transfer of pressurised hot water.

translation.en: Featuring an incredible stretch characteristic in diameter, allowing the hose to stretch onto a connection for a perfect seal (i.e. you can stretch a 3mm I.D hose onto a 5mm O.D connection).
translation.zh: 它的特点是在直径方向上具有不可思议的拉伸特性，可将软管拉伸到接头上，以实现完美密封（即，您可以将 3mm 内径的软管拉伸到 5mm 外径的接头上)。

translation.en: Add 5 double wire clamps to your order for just 99p, perfect for securing the vacuum hose in place!
translation.zh: 将 5 个双线夹添加到您的订单中，只需 99 便士，就能完美地确保真空软管安装到位！

translation.en: With more than 12 years’ experience of dealing with aftermarket Samco Sport performance silicone hoses, we are proud to be the world’s leading motorcycle silicone hose specialist distributor.
translation.zh: Samco Sport 硅胶软管性能出色，我们拥有超过 12 年的售后经验，因此，我们可以自豪地说，我们是世界领先的摩托车硅胶软管专业经销商。

translation.en: With a large stock of universal race parts options, we strive on 100% service.
translation.zh: 我们拥有大量的通用零件选件，致力于提供全方位的服务。

translation.en: Samco Sport Vacuum hose has a whole host of applications: emission control, radiator overflow, windscreen washers and perfect for carburetor vent hose replacement on motocross and road bike applications.
translation.zh: Samco Sport 真空软管适用于大量应用：排放控制，散热器溢出、挡风玻璃垫圈，也是替换摩托车和公路自行车应用上汽化器排气软管的完美之选。

translation.en: This is a great product and suitable for all bikes, cars and commercial applications.
translation.zh: 这款产品十分出色，适合所有自行车、汽车和商业应用。

translation.en: Not suitable for high pressure water installations or hot water systems.

translation.zh: 这根软管不适合输送油。

translation.en: Time is running out for Iran nuclear deal, Germany says
translation.zh: 德国表示，留给恢复伊朗核协议的时间不多了

translation.en: Germany's foreign minister warned on Saturday that time was running out to find a way to revive a 2015 nuclear deal between world powers and Iran, speaking after meetings with her counterparts from G7 countries.
translation.zh: 德国外长周六警告称，可用于重启 2015 年世界大国与伊朗之间核协议的时间已经所剩无几，德国外长在与七国集团 (G7) 外长会晤后发表讲话。

translation.en: Talks have resumed in Vienna to try to revive the nuclear pact, with both sides trying to gauge the prospects of success after the latest exchanges in the stop-start negotiations.
translation.zh: 维也纳重启会谈，试图恢复核协议，在对断断续续的谈判进行最新交流之后，双方都试图评估成功的前景。

translation.en: "Time is running out," German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock told reporters in Liverpool, England where G7 foreign ministers are meeting.
translation.zh: 在英国利物浦召开的 G7 外长会议上，德国外长安娜琳娜·贝伯克 (Annalena Baerbock) 对记者说：“时间不多了。”

translation.en: It has shown in the last days that we do not have any progress.
translation.zh: 过去的几天里表明我们没有取得任何进展。

translation.en: Baerbock said Iran had resumed the talks with a position that set the negotiations back six months.
translation.zh: 贝尔博克说，伊朗已经恢复了谈判，但它的立场使谈判推迟了六个月。

translation.en: The current round of talks in Vienna follow a pause of five months after the election of a hardline anti-Westerner as Iran's president, Ebrahim Raisi.
translation.zh: 目前在维也纳举行的这轮谈判在强硬派反西方人士易卜拉欣·莱希 (Ebrahim Raisi) 当选伊朗总统后暂停了五个月。

translation.en: Earlier, U.S. officials said Secretary of State Antony Blinken had held a "productive" meeting with counterparts from Britain, Germany and France on Friday, discussing the way forward for the Iran talks.
translation.zh: 早些时候，美国官员说，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯 (Antony Blinken) 星期五与英国、德国和法国外长举行了富有成效的会谈，讨论了伊朗谈判的未来方向。

translation.en: A senior State Department official said there was an "intense" conversation among the G7 countries, which were united in their position on the nuclear talks.
translation.zh: 美国国务院一名高级官员表示，G7 国家之间进行了“激烈”的对话，他们在核谈判上的立场一致。

translation.en: "The statement will also be strong on the importance of getting Iran back to the table and that it is possible to conclude a deal but that the time is shrinking, so we're united in that," the official, briefing reporters on the condition of anonymity, said.
translation.zh: “声明还将强调让伊朗回到谈判桌的重要性，以及达成协议的可能性，但时间在缩短，所以我们在这一点上是一致的，”这名要求匿名的官员向记者介绍情况时说。

translation.en: The official added that U.S. Special Envoy for Iran Robert Malley was heading back to Vienna for talks.
translation.zh: 这名官员补充说，美国将采取措施伊朗问题特使罗伯特·马利 (Robert Malley) 正在返回维也纳参加会谈。

translation.en: Iranian officials have previously said they were sticking to their tough stance.
translation.zh: 伊朗官员此前曾表示，他们将坚持自己的强硬立场。

translation.en: Under the original nuclear deal, abandoned in 2018 by then-President Donald Trump, Iran limited its nuclear program in return for relief from U.S., European Union and U.N. sanctions.
translation.zh: 根据最初的核协议，伊朗限制其核项目，以换取美国、欧盟和联合国减轻对伊朗的制裁。2018 年美国时任总统唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 退出了该协议。

translation.en: The West fears the program would be used to develop weapons, something Tehran denies.
translation.zh: 西方国家担心该项目会被用于发展武器，而伊朗对此予以否认。

translation.en: Raisi said on Saturday that Tehran was serious in its nuclear talks in Vienna, the official IRNA news agency reported.
translation.zh: 据伊朗伊斯兰共和国通讯社 (IRNA) 报道，莱希周六表示，德黑兰对在维也纳举行的核谈判是认真的。

translation.en: The indirect U.S.-Iranian talks, in which diplomats from France, Britain, Germany, Russia and China shuttle between them because Tehran refuses direct contact with Washington, aim to get both sides to resume full compliance with the accord.
translation.zh: 由于德黑兰拒绝与华盛顿直接接触，法国、英国、德国、俄罗斯和中国的外交官穿梭于美伊之间的间接谈判，旨在促使双方恢复全面遵守协议。

translation.en: The G7 meeting which is expected to result in a joint call for Iran to moderate its nuclear program and grasp the opportunity of the Vienna talks.
translation.zh: 预计 G7 会议将共同呼吁伊朗缓和其核项目，并抓住维也纳会谈的机会。

translation.en: Please note that in some countries the local mail services do not deliver postal tubes along with letters and small packets.

translation.en: For this reason, the stated delivery period covers a wide range.

translation.en: Please therefore allow around 25 working days from dispatch before contacting us about a suspected delivery problem.

translation.en: We do offer premium Airmail services with priority handling and tracking.

translation.en: Generally, delivery is faster via these services but please be aware they are not timed or guaranteed delivery services and the same service level of up to 25 working days delivery timeframe is applied by the postal companies.

translation.en: If you require your order urgently, please choose the express courier postage option (if this is not shown for your country, please contact us for a quote).

translation.en: Aston Villa latest Premier League club to suffer Covid outbreak
translation.zh: 阿斯顿维拉是英超联赛中最新一家遭遇新冠肺炎疫情的俱乐部

translation.en: Aston Villa have become the latest Premier League outfit to suffer a Covid outbreak, with a number of positive cases discovered at the club.
translation.zh: 阿斯顿维拉成为最新一家遭受新冠肺炎疫情的英超球队，俱乐部发现了多例阳性病例。

translation.en: Sunday's training session at Bodymoor Heath was cancelled as a result, a session that was designed for just a small number of players' recovery after the loss to Liverpool on Saturday.
translation.zh: 因此，周日在 Bodymoor Heath 的训练被取消了，这是一项为少数球员在周六输给利物浦后的恢复而设计的训练。

translation.en: It is not thought to be a serious outbreak at this stage, with The Athletic reporting that just one player has tested positive, with the rest being staff at the training ground.
translation.zh: 据 The Athletic 报道，目前还不认为这是一场严重的疫情爆发，只有一名球员检测呈阳性，其余都是训练场上的工作人员。

translation.en: Villa face an away game at Norwich City on Tuesday night in the Premier League and there is no suggestion that it will be cancelled, with training also expected to go ahead as normal on Monday.
translation.zh: 维拉将在周二晚上对阵诺维奇，没有迹象表明比赛会被取消，训练也将在周一正常进行。

translation.en: The identity of the player that has tested positive has not been confirmed, nor whether it was any of the men who were involved against Liverpool.
translation.zh: 检测结果呈阳性的球员身份尚未得到确认，也不知道是否有参加利物浦比赛的球员。

translation.en: Manchester United have also suffered a Covid outbreak on Sunday and there seems to be more concern about that situation, with the Red Devil's trip to Brentford on Tuesday now reportedly under threat.
translation.zh: 曼联周日也出现了新冠肺炎疫情，据报道，周二红魔对阵布伦特福德之旅受到了威胁，这似乎更令人担忧。

translation.en: Tottenham Hotspur have already been struggling with the virus, with their match against Brighton on Sunday postponed after eight players and five members of staff returned positive results.
translation.zh: 托特纳姆热刺队有 8 名球员和 5 名工作人员检测结果呈阳性，因此周日与布莱顿队的比赛被推迟。

translation.en: Championship sides West Brom and Queens Park Rangers have also suffered outbreaks and QPR's clash with Sheffield United on Monday has been postponed.
translation.zh: 英冠球队西布朗和女王公园巡游者也遭遇了疫情，女王公园巡游者周一与谢菲尔德联队的对战也被推迟。

translation.en: Anyone who tests positive for the omicron variant of Covid-19 will have to isolate for 10 days, as will anyone who has been identified as a close contact of a positive result.
translation.zh: 任何新冠病毒奥密克戎变异株检测呈阳性的人都必须隔离 10 天，被确认为密切接触者的结果呈阳性的人也必须隔离 10 天。

translation.en: I know it is in chinese, you don't need to use your device's internal function nor the correct language to perform these last steps sent.
translation.zh: 我知道它是中文的，您不需要使用设备的内部功能，也不需要更正语言，就能执行我发刚发送的几个步骤。

translation.en: Please, do me the favor to read them first and then performing them
translation.zh: 请先读完再动手操作

translation.en: the instructions are to manually reset your device
translation.zh: 这些说明是用于手动重置设备的

translation.en: The correct language is not needed.
translation.zh: 不需要更正语言。

translation.en: However, if you wish to make a return request I can also help you
translation.zh: 不过，如果您要退货，我也可以帮您

translation.en: We offer nine types of posters:
translation.zh: 我们提供 9 种类型的海报：

translation.en: Please choose the desired poster format from the drop-down menu.
translation.zh: 请从下拉菜单中选择所需的海报格式。

translation.en: Posters are sent in a sturdy carded A5 envelope.
translation.zh: 海报用结实的 A5 卡片信封寄出。

translation.en: Used when the 6x4" (10x15cm) is too small,
translation.zh: 当 6x4“ (10x15cm) 太小时使用，

translation.en: Posters are sent in a sturdy carded A5 envelope.
translation.zh: 海报用结实的 A5 卡片信封寄出。

translation.en: High-quality photo lab look in a glossy finish,
translation.zh: 拥有摄影室作品般的高品质光泽度，

translation.en: High gloss finish injects life into the print, making colours appear vivid and sharp,
translation.zh: 高光泽度为海报注入生命力，使色彩显得生动鲜明，

translation.en: Posters are sent in a sturdy carded A5 envelope.
translation.zh: 海报用结实的 A5 卡片信封寄出。

translation.en: Printed on super-premium semi-gloss photo paper, it provides high colour definition with reduced reflection in a direct light.
translation.zh: 使用超优质的半光泽度相纸打印，色彩清晰度高，并可减少直接光线反射。

translation.en: A3 Posters are sent in a cardboard poster tube.
translation.zh: A3 海报装在纸板海报筒内寄出。

translation.en: Printed on high quality 280g super-premium semi-gloss photo paper, it provides high colour definition with reduced reflection in a direct light,
translation.zh: 使用优质的 280g 半光泽度相纸打印，色彩清晰度高，并可减少直接光线反射，

translation.en: A2 Posters are sent in a cardboard poster tube.
translation.zh: A2 海报装在纸板海报筒内寄出。

translation.en: Our A4 and A3 laminated posters are coated with plastic, and they have approximately 2mm thin transparent plastic border on each side.
translation.zh: 我们在 A4 和 A3 层压海报上裹了塑料，每一面都有大约薄到 2 毫米的透明塑料边框。

translation.en: They do not come with a frame.
translation.zh: 不配相框。

translation.en: A4 frame can be hung or stand freely.
translation.zh: A4 相框可自由悬挂，也能站立。

translation.en: A4 framed pictures come with a black wooden frame with glass front.
translation.zh: A4 有框照片配有一个黑色木制框架，正面是玻璃。

translation.en: Pictures come in a sturdy carded envelope in the box with the frame.
translation.zh: 照片装在一个结实的信封中，信封与相框装在一个盒子中。

translation.en: If you need a print with or without borders, please leave us a message.
translation.zh: 如果您需要有边框或无边框的印刷品，请给我们留言。

translation.en: Various computer screens, operating systems, and even different web browsers have different coloor characteristics, so it's almost impossible to get a given coloor to look the same on every screen.
translation.zh: 不同的电脑屏幕、操作系统，甚至是不同的 Web 浏览器呈现的颜色不尽相同，因此几乎不可能没有色差。

translation.en: If the colours of the posters don't fit your expectation, please send us a message.
translation.zh: 如果海报的颜色不符合您的期望，请告诉我们。

translation.en: In most cases, we can change it to satisfy your needs.
translation.zh: 大多数情况下，我们可以根据您的需要进行修改。

translation.en: This is a different issue.
translation.zh: 这是另一个问题。

translation.en: Disabled people in America just aren't treated right, full stop.
translation.zh: 在美国，残疾人就是没有得到合理的待遇，仅此而已。

translation.en: It doesn't have anything to do with income or living alone.
translation.zh: 这与收入或独自生活没有任何关系。

translation.en: Services and consideration for the disabled (as well as the poor) just aren't close to where they should be.
translation.zh: 面向残疾人（以及穷人）的服务和关怀远没有达到应有的水平。

translation.en: We treat the disabled like crap.
translation.zh: 我们视残疾人如草芥，

translation.en: We treat the poor like crap.
translation.zh: 对待穷人像对待垃圾一样。

translation.en: Everyone in the US should be ashamed.
translation.zh: 每个美国人都应该为此感到羞耻。

translation.en: You're correct that our society needs to value human life more.
translation.zh: 你说得对，我们的社会应该更尊重人的生命。

translation.en: If we did, we'd see these mass gun shootings go down.
translation.zh: 做到这一点，大规模枪击事件就会平息，

translation.en: We'd see fewer traffic accidents and deaths.
translation.zh: 交通事故和死亡事件就会减少。

translation.en: Health care and child care would be affordable and much easier access, and so on.
translation.zh: 医疗护理和儿童保健不再是沉重的负担，也更容易获得，有诸多好处。

translation.en: Unfortunately, American society has "accepted" the statistics of hardship, deaths and other casualties as just "a way of life"...in exchange for "freedom" or some such BS.
translation.zh: 不幸的是，美国社会已经“接受”了困难、死亡和其他伤亡的统计数字，只是“一种生活方式”……以换取“自由”或诸如此类的东西。

translation.en: I see your comment about being disabled and not being supported as just another example of how America just doesn't support people.
translation.zh: 我认为你提出的关于残疾人和人民没有获得支持的说法就是美国没有爱护人民的另一个例证。

translation.en: It's in the same vein as the author's point, not a conflict.
translation.zh: 这与作者的观点一致，并无冲突。

translation.en: I can see here that there is no rider assigned yet to your order.
translation.zh: 我这里看到您的订单还没有指派骑手。

translation.en: However I will note this on the records.
translation.zh: 我会把这一点记录下来。

translation.en: You can also use the app to call or chat them, once they are nearby the location you will have an option to contact the rider.
translation.zh: 您也可以使用这个 App 打电话或使用聊天功能，在骑手到达附近位置时与骑手联系。

translation.en: Organisations on high alert as techs race to fix software flaw
translation.zh: 技术人员竞相修复软件缺陷，企业处于高度戒备状态

translation.en: A critical vulnerability in a widely used software tool - one quickly exploited in the online game Minecraft - is rapidly emerging as a major threat to organizations around the world.
translation.zh: 一款广泛使用的软件工具中的一个关键漏洞正在迅速成为世界各地组织的主要威胁，在线游戏《我的世界》(Minecraft) 也因此漏洞遭到大量攻击。

translation.en: "The internet's on fire right now," said Adam Meyers, senior vice president of intelligence at the cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike.
translation.zh: 网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 高级情报副总裁亚当·迈耶斯 (Adam Meyers) 说:“互联网现在着火了。”

translation.en: "People are scrambling to patch," he said, "and all kinds of people scrambling to exploit it."
translation.zh: “有人在着急忙慌地修补漏洞，”他说，“有人在争先恐后地利用漏洞。”

translation.en: He said Friday morning that in the 12 hours since the bug's existence was disclosed that it had been "fully weaponised," meaning malefactors had developed and distributed tools to exploit it.
translation.zh: 他在周五上午表示，自该漏洞被披露以来的 12 个小时内，它已被“完全武器化”，这意味着不法分子已经开发并分发了利用该漏洞的工具。

translation.en: The flaw may be the worst computer vulnerability discovered in years.
translation.zh: 该漏洞可能是多年来发现的最严重的计算机漏洞。

translation.en: It was uncovered in a utility that's ubiquitous in cloud servers and enterprise software used across industry and government.
translation.zh: 该漏洞出自一个实用程序，而该实用程序在云服务器和各行各业及政府使用的企业软件中无处不在。

translation.en: Unless it is fixed, it grants criminals, spies and programming novices alike easy access to internal networks where they can loot valuable data, plant malware, erase crucial information and much more.
translation.zh: 除非修复该漏洞，否则罪犯、间谍和编程新手都能轻松进入内部网络，窃取有价值的数据、植入恶意软件、删除关键信息等等。

translation.en: Cyber attacks are now seen as the biggest threat to financial stability.
translation.zh: 如今，网络攻击被视为金融稳定的最大威胁。

translation.en: "I'd be hard-pressed to think of a company that's not at risk," said Joe Sullivan, chief security officer for Cloudflare, whose online infrastructure protects websites from malicious actors.
translation.zh: Cloudflare 首席安全官乔•沙利文 (Joe Sullivan) 表示:“我很难想象有哪家公司没有风险，”Cloudflare 的在线基础设施可保护网站免受恶意行为的攻击。

translation.en: Untold millions of servers have it installed, and experts said the fallout would not be known for several days.
translation.zh: 有数以百万计的服务器安装了该软件，专家表示，其后果要过几天才能知道。

translation.en: Amit Yoran, CEO of the cybersecurity firm Tenable, called it "the single biggest, most critical vulnerability of the last decade" - and possibly the biggest in the history of modern computing.
translation.zh: 网络安全公司 Tenable 的首席执行官阿米特·约兰 (Amit Yoran) 称其为“过去十年中最大、最关键的漏洞”——可能是现代计算机史上最大的漏洞。

translation.en: The vulnerability, dubbed "Log4Shell," was rated 10 on a scale of one to 10 the Apache Software Foundation, which oversees development of the software.
translation.zh: 这个被称为“Log4Shell”的漏洞被其所属的阿帕奇软件基金会 (Apache Software Foundation) 评为 10 级（1 到 10 级）。

translation.en: Anyone with the exploit can obtain full access to an unpatched computer that uses the software.
translation.zh: 任何人都可以利用该漏洞完全访问使用该软件且未打补丁的计算机。

translation.en: Experts said the extreme ease with which the vulnerability lets an attacker access a web server - no password required - is what makes it so dangerous.
translation.zh: 专家表示，攻击者不需要密码就能轻而易举地进入网络服务器，这就是它如此危险的原因。

translation.en: New Zealand's computer emergency response team was among the first to report that the flaw was being "actively exploited in the wild" just hours after it was publicly reported Thursday and a patch released.
translation.zh: 新西兰的计算机应急响应小组是首批报告该漏洞“被积极利用”的机构之一，几小时后（周四），该漏洞被公开报告，并发布了一个补丁。

translation.en: The vulnerability, located in open-source Apache software used to run websites and other web services, was reported to the foundation on November 24 by the Chinese tech giant Alibaba, it said.
translation.zh: 报告称，该漏洞在用于运行网站和其他网络服务的开源 Apache 软件中，中国科技巨头阿里巴巴于 11 月 24 日向该基金会报告了该漏洞。

translation.en: It took two weeks to develop and release a fix.
translation.zh: 开发和发布修复程序花了两周时间。

translation.en: Have a great day
translation.zh: 祝您愉快

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to chat to me today.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天联系我。

translation.en: Once this chat has ended you will be sent a 'rate my chat' feedback email.
translation.zh: 本次聊天结束后，您将收到“对我进行评价”的反馈电子邮件。

translation.en: Please kindly fill this in if you have a moment, however if you don't have time then may I wish you a wonderful day and thank you again.
translation.zh: 请您抽空对我进行评价，如果您没有时间，也没关系，再次感谢您！

translation.en: Yep…we guys all have guns.
translation.zh: 没错，我们人人都有枪。

translation.en: Even babies.
translation.zh: 婴儿也不例外。

translation.en: We all walk around with them like it’s the Wild West.
translation.zh: 我们全都携枪而行，就像在狂野的西部一样。

translation.en: I don’t even know where to begin here.
translation.zh: 我都不知道该从何说起。

translation.en: You honestly think that a crackhead would own an expensive gun, and then save up enough money for ammo?
translation.zh: 你真的认为一个瘾君子会有一把昂贵的枪，然后存够钱买弹药吗？

translation.en: A crack head is not a “professional mugger.”
translation.zh: 瘾君子不是“职业抢劫犯”。

translation.en: If you don’t hear of people being stabbed, so what?
translation.zh: 即使你没听说过有人被刺伤，那又怎样？

translation.en: Stabbings don’t get the same press treatment as shootings.
translation.zh: 刺伤案不像枪击案那样受到媒体的关注。

translation.en: Just because the press doesn’t highlight something doesn’t mean it’s not happening.
translation.zh: 但是，媒体没有关注，并不意味着它没有发生。

translation.en: WTF does this have to do with race?
translation.zh: 这和种族有什么关系?

translation.en: Missed Out on Shiba Inu?
translation.zh: 错过了柴犬币 (Shiba Inu)？

translation.en: EverGrow Might Be The Next Big Crypto To Explode in 2022
translation.zh: EverGrow 可能是 2022 年爆发的下一个大型加密货币

translation.en: Shiba Inu is the latest meme-crypto to go viral and despite being down almost 60% from it's all-time high, the market cap still stands at an eye-watering $20 billion, making it the 12th biggest crypto in the world by valuation.
translation.zh: 柴犬币是最新一款走红的表情包加密货币，尽管已经从历史高点下跌了近 60%，但其市值仍高达 200 亿美元，按估值计算，它是全球第 12 大加密货币。

translation.en: A $100 investment at launch would be worth over $2 million today!
translation.zh: 当初投资 100 美元可以换来今天的 200 多万美元！

translation.en: Many are no doubt kicking themselves for missing out on such gains, but the reality is that a bet on Shiba Inu was a pure gamble.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问，许多人会为自己错过这样的收益而后悔不已，但现实是，押注柴犬币纯粹是一场赌博。

translation.en: Shiba's run was a combination of some very smart marketing and a whole lot of hype, that led droves of investors, with FOMO (fear of missing out) to pile into the meme-coin.
translation.zh: 柴犬币的运行是一些非常聪明的营销和大量炒作的结合，这导致了大批投资者因为 FOMO（害怕错过）而涌入模因 (Meme) 币市场。

translation.en: Even the name itself, which was a homage to Elon Musk backed Dogecoin, was all part of the design.
translation.zh: 柴犬币就连名字本身也是设计的一部分，是为了向埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 支持的狗狗币致敬。

translation.en: In reality, Shiba Inu offers no tangible utility or value, with seemingly little effort to do so in the future.
translation.zh: 在现实中，柴犬币并没有提供任何有形的效用或价值，似乎未来也是如此。

translation.en: Being on the Ethereum blockchain, there would've been plenty of opportunity for development had the team behind Shiba Inu been motivated to do so.
translation.zh: 在以太坊区块链上，如果柴犬币背后的团队有意去做开发，将有大量的机会。

translation.en: There are, however, several cryptocurrencies that are working to rise above the pack, and back their popularity with real utility and fundamental value.
translation.zh: 然而，有一些加密货币正在努力超越它，并以实际效用和基本价值支撑其受欢迎程度。

translation.en: Just 10 weeks ago, EverGrow Coin ($EGC) was launched by a team of experienced finance, blockchain and marketing experts.
translation.zh: 就在 10 周前，一支经验丰富的金融、区块链和营销专家团队推出了 EverGrow Coin ($EGC)。

translation.en: One ground-breaking element of their project is the fact the token pays a stable currency to holders.
translation.zh: 他们项目的一个突破性元素是，代币以稳定的货币支付给持币者。

translation.en: In the short time since launch, holders of EverGrow Coin have received over $30 million of binance-pegged USD rewards - a stable, regulated currency pegged 1-to-1 with the USD.
translation.zh: 自发行以来，EverGrow Coin 的持有者在短时间内就获得了超过 3000 万美元的与币挂钩的美元奖励，这是一种与美元一对一挂钩的稳定的、受监管的货币。

translation.en: The project currently has 110,000 holders according to BSCScan.
translation.zh: 根据 BSCScan 的数据，该项目的持币者目前达到了 11 万之多。

translation.en: With their revolutionary contract, EverGrow Coin quickly grew to over $1 billion in market-cap, but then a major data error on CoinMarketCap, just weeks into the launch, caused mass panic amongst investors.
translation.zh: 这种颠覆性的契约让 EverGrow Coin 的市值迅速增长到超过 10 亿美元，但在推出后才数周，CoinMarketCap 上就出现了一个重大数据错误，在投资者中引发了大规模恐慌。

translation.en: With such a new project, trust can take time to build, and this panic was exploited by a series of articles, rumoured to have been paid for by rivals of the project, using the incorrect data to try to draw EverGrow investors away from the project.
translation.zh: 对于这样一个新项目，建立信任需要时间，而这种恐慌情绪被一系列文章所利用，据说这些文章的背后推手是该项目的竞争对手，他们试图利用不正确的数据诱惑 EverGrow 的投资者退出该项目。

translation.en: Over the next month, the errors remained unfixed, and EverGrow sunk to below $300 million in valuation.
translation.zh: 在接下来的一个月里，这些错误仍然没有得到修正，EverGrow 的估值跌至 3 亿美元以下。

translation.en: Yesterday, CoinMarket Cap placed an alert on EverGrow's page, confirming that the data error had been fixed.
translation.zh: 昨天，CoinMarket Cap 在 EverGrow 的页面上发布了提醒，确认数据错误已经修复。

translation.en: The price has now stabilised, and signs of returning confidence saw an increase of 22% from the recent lows.
translation.zh: 现在价格已经稳定下来，市场信心有了恢复的迹象，表现在最近低点上升了 22%。

translation.en: However, EverGrow still remains well below the highs achieved before this error.
translation.zh: 然而，EverGrow 估值仍远低于该错误发生前的高点。

translation.en: EverGrow is very different from Shiba Inu.
translation.zh: EverGrow 和柴犬币大不相同。

translation.en: In addition to the obvious benefits of USD rewards, the team behind the project have already launched a SWAP dApp on their website, have recently revealed the upcoming release of a Crypto Wallet, promising to surpass the features offered by Trust Wallet or Safemoon Wallet, and have a whole suite of utilities, from content creation platform to NFT Market Place & Lending, designed to bring continuous value to investors.
translation.zh: 除了美元奖励这个明显的优势外，此项目背后的团队已经在网站上推出了 SWAP dApp，最近还透露即将发布一个加密钱包，并承诺提供比 Trust 钱包和 Safemoon 钱包更出色的功能，还提供从内容创作平台到 NFT Market Place & Lending 的一整套实用工具，将持续为投资者创造价值。

translation.en: Is EverGrow Coin the next Shiba Inu?
translation.zh: EverGrow Coin 会成为下一个柴犬币吗？

translation.en: With Shiba Inu, offering little to no utility, valued at around 66 times that of EverGrow Coin, there is a clear argument for an innovative and ground-breaking project like EverGrow to see some serious upside from their current low market cap.
translation.zh: 柴犬币几乎不提供任何实用功能，其估值约为 EverGrow Coin 的 66 倍，因此，像 EverGrow 这样具有创新性和突破性的项目，以目前的低市值来看，可以预期会有一些实质性的增长。

translation.en: If the team continues to impress the crypto community with their innovation and transparency and can shake off the fear spread among investors by the CoinMarketCap errors, there is a good chance EverGrow Coin could be one of the top cryptos to invest in for 2022.
translation.zh: 如果该团队继续以其创新和透明度给加密货币社区留下深刻印象，并能够摆脱 CoinMarketCap 错误在投资者中蔓延的恐惧，那么 EverGrow Coin 很有可能成为 2022 年最值得投资的加密货币之一。

translation.en: There's a circularity to it...
translation.zh: 这就是一个循环……

translation.en: I think the meal boxes are an insane proposition.
translation.zh: 我觉得订购盒饭的主张十分疯狂。

translation.en: The math they do is just crazy.
translation.zh: 他们的计算方式也让人匪夷所思。

translation.en: "We're actually saving money because we don't have to go out and buy a whole bottle of soy sauce to try Asian cooking..." Madness.
translation.zh: “我们实际上是在省钱，因为我们不需要去买一整瓶酱油来尝试亚洲食物……” 真是疯了。

translation.en: I think that in the consumer space, cheaper goods at lower margins is the only reason that anyone outside of the upper class has experienced any sort of wage growth.
translation.zh: 我认为，在消费领域，商品更便宜、利润更低是上层社会以外的人群工资见长的唯一原因。

translation.en: Wages didn't really go up, but shit got cheaper.
translation.zh: 但是工资并未上涨，反而降了。

translation.en: The problem is that we sold out the people below us.
translation.zh: 问题在于我们出卖了下层人群。

translation.en: I agree with you.
translation.zh: 我同意你的看法。

translation.en: Some of us need to give up at least some convenience to make society better.
translation.zh: 为了让社会变得更好，我们中的一些人至少需要放弃一些便利。

translation.en: Even if I'm not in the income level that would pay more taxes, I can still buy fewer things that are more expensive so that they can be made by people making a living wage and I can be willing to wait a few days to get it so that some gig worker doesn't have to be worked to the bone...
translation.zh: 即使我的收入水平到不了要缴纳更多税费的层次，我仍然可以少买贵的东西，给制造它们的人以谋生的机会，我愿意多等几天，这样一些零工工人就不用拼命工作了……

translation.en: how did it go?
translation.zh: 怎么样了？

translation.en: A dream to keep all children safe this Christmas
translation.zh: 梦想：希望所有孩子平安度过圣诞节

translation.en: Her brother (nearly two) had to be persuaded not to walk off with the baby Jesus.
translation.zh: 她的弟弟（将近两岁）不得不听从大人的话，不能跟婴儿 Jesus 一起走。

translation.en: So there was the usual gentle chaos that attends any gathering of toddlers.
translation.zh: 所以，在蹒跚学步的孩子们的聚会上，呈现的是一种温和的混乱。

translation.en: But everyone was so pleased that it had gone ahead when so many other Christmas events have been cancelled as yet another Covid variant hove into view.
translation.zh: 但每个人都很高兴，要知道许多其他圣诞活动都因为出现了新的新冠病毒变异株而取消了。

translation.en: My granddaughter is four which means that half her life - half her life! - has been blighted by the pandemic.
translation.zh: 我的孙女四岁了，这意味着她有一半的生命都被疫情毁了。

translation.en: Since she became properly aware she has known nothing but mask wearing, obsessive hand washing and keeping your distance.
translation.zh: 自从她懂事后，她就知道戴口罩、勤洗手和保持距离。

translation.en: On several occasions (through various lockdowns) when I saw her I didn't know if I should kiss her or not.
translation.zh: 有几次（在多次封锁期间），当我看到她时，我不知道是否应该亲吻她。

translation.en: What kind of message does that send into the receptive, super-alert brain of a tiny child?
translation.zh: 这会向一个接受能力强、高度警觉的小孩子传递什么样的信息呢？

translation.en: I dread to think.
translation.zh: 我不敢去想。

translation.en: I say this not as someone opposed to lockdowns or distancing.
translation.zh: 我这么说并不是反对封锁或隔离。

translation.en: For all the criticism of our Government not a single nation has got it exactly right.
translation.zh: 尽管我国政府受到各种批评，但没有一个国家的批评是完全正确的。

translation.en: It's been two steps forward, and one back (and sometimes the opposite) since the beginning of 2020.
translation.zh: 自 2020 年初以来，我们是前进两步后退一步，有时候又是后退两步前进一步。

translation.en: AND one knew - though many of us during those early sunny months rather enjoyed the luxury of not going out - that all over Britain there were those for whom being at home was hell not heaven.
translation.zh: 尽管我们中有许多人在最初阳光明媚的几个月里享受着不出门的奢侈，但人们知道，在整个英国，对有些人而言，在家就是地狱，而不是天堂。

translation.en: Children such as Arthur Labinjo-Hughes who became invisible with no school staff to ponder on why he was so thin and ill, no neighbours, no passers-by, no nothing.
translation.zh: 像 Arthur Labinjo-Hughes 这样的孩子，已经变隐形了，没有人关心他为什么这么瘦，病秧秧的，没有邻居，没有路人，什么都没有。

translation.en: Molecular Diagnosis Test Can Detect Omicron Variant In 20 Minutes: Report
translation.zh: 分子诊断测试可在 20 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株：报告

translation.en: Korean researchers have developed molecular diagnostics technology that can detect Omicron variants.
translation.zh: 韩国研究人员开发出了可以检测奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术。

translation.en: The technology development has been currently completed, and it is expected to take time for commercialization.
translation.zh: 该技术目前已经完成开发，预计还需要一段时间后才能商业化。

translation.en: POSTECH announced on the 10th that a research team led by Professor Lee Jung-wook of the Department of Chemical Engineering has developed molecular diagnostic technology that can detect the Omicron variant in just 20-30 minutes and will publish the results online.
translation.zh: 浦项工科大学 10 日表示，该大学化学工程系李正旭教授带领的研究小组开发出了可以在 20-30 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术，并将在网上公开结果。

translation.en: Omicron is a variant in which 26-32 mutations in the spike, which is used to infect cells by the COVID-19 virus.
translation.zh: 奥密克戎是一种变异毒株，其刺突中有 26-32 个突变，被新冠病毒用于感染细胞。

translation.en: According to the research team, molecular diagnostics technology can distinguish mutations at the single-nucleotide base, so it can detect "Stealth Omicron," which are difficult to be detected by PCR tests.
translation.zh: 研究小组表示，分子诊断技术可以识别单核苷酸碱基的突变，因此可以检测出 PCR 很难检测出的“隐形奥密克戎”。

translation.en: Currently, the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is using three methods to detect COVID-19 variants: whole-genome analysis, target DNA (mutations such as spike protein) analysis, and PCR test.
translation.zh: 目前，韩国疾病控制和预防中心正在使用全基因组分析、目标 DNA（刺突蛋白等突变）分析、PCR 检测等 3 种方法来检测新型冠状病毒的变异株。

translation.en: In the case of the Delta variant, it can be detected by the current PCR test, but Omicron cannot.
translation.zh: 目前的 PCR 检测可以检测出 Delta 变异株，但无法检测出奥密克戎。

translation.en: The newly developed technology this time is not a sequencing method that reads DNA or RNA sequences, but the molecular diagnostic technology.
translation.zh: 此次新开发的技术不是读取 DNA 或 RNA 序列的测序技术，而是分子诊断技术。

translation.en: The existing technology screens only specific areas of the virus, but the molecular diagnostic technology was designed to cause nucleic acid-binding reactions only when the COVID-19 RNA exists, enabling rapid detection.
translation.zh: 目前的技术只筛选病毒的特定区域，但分子诊断技术是在新冠病毒 RNA 存在时才会引起核酸结合反应，因此可以达到快速检测的效果。

translation.en: According to Professor Lee, Omicron has a strong signal for N genes in PCR tests but has a weak signal for S genes.
translation.zh: 李教授表示：“在 PCR 检测中，奥密克戎对 N 基因的信号较强，但对 S 基因的信号较弱。

translation.en: In the case of "Stealth Omicron," both N and S genes confirmed positive, making it difficult to distinguish from other variants.
translation.zh: 在“隐形奥密克戎”中，N 和 S 基因都被确认为阳性，这使得它很难与其他变异株区分开来。

translation.en: The molecular diagnostic technology works in different mechanisms from PCR, detecting the Omicron variant efficiently.
translation.zh: 分子诊断技术的机制与 PCR 不同，可以有效地检测到奥密克戎变异株。

translation.en: Unlike conventional technology that generally processes up to 96 samples per device, the new technology can process more than 125 in 30 minutes (more than 250 samples per hour).
translation.zh: 与一般每台设备最多处理 96 个样本的传统技术不同，新技术可以在 30 分钟内处理 125 个以上样本（每小时处理 250 个以上）。

translation.en: In addition, this technology does not need specialized equipment, thus can make diagnostic kits simply and easily.
translation.zh: 此外，该技术不需要专门的设备，因此可以制作简单、方便的诊断试剂盒。

translation.en: As the method can develop the diagnosis kit in 4 days, it is expected to respond quickly even if a new variant or virus occurs in the future.
translation.zh: 该方法可以在 4 天内开发出诊断试剂，因此即使以后出现新的变异株或病毒，也能迅速做出反应。

translation.en: "I hope the disclosure of this technology will help us return to normal daily life as soon as possible," said Professor Lee.
translation.zh: 李教授表示：“我们希望通过公开该技术，尽快恢复正常的生活。”

translation.en: We will try to quickly diagnose and respond to new variants that may come out after COVID-19.
translation.zh: 我们将努力快速诊断和应对新冠病毒之后可能出现的新变异株。

translation.en: This technology is currently before commercialization.
translation.zh: 该技术目前尚未商业化。

translation.en: However, it can be used as an auxiliary in current situations where the PCR test for Omicron has not been developed.
translation.zh: 但是，在目前还没有开发出奥密克戎的 PCR 检测方法的情况下，它可以作为一种辅助手段。

translation.en: Professor Lee said, "I think this technology will be close to commercialization in the second half of next year after clinical trials.
translation.zh: 李教授表示:“（该技术）有望在明年下半年通过临床试验后实现商业化。

translation.en: The reason why I disclose the technology is to share it with others to develop better technologies for overcoming COVID-19 and to allow underdeveloped countries also analyze COVID-19 variants."
translation.zh: 我公开这项技术是为了开发更好的新冠病毒应对技术，让落后国家也能分析新冠病毒变异株。”

translation.en: I told ya so....
translation.zh: 我早就跟你说过……

translation.en: The grocery store I worked at was undergoing a complete and total reorganization.
translation.zh: 当时我工作的杂货店正在进行改头换面。

translation.en: Aisles were changing, and we were all learning where everything was.
translation.zh: 过道都改变了，不过我们都知道每样东西在哪里。

translation.en: Needless to say, it was chaos.
translation.zh: 不用说，那肯定是一片混乱。

translation.en: At the time this happened, we were pretty busy, and I had a line of customers, but Karen decides to skip the line to ask me where something was.
translation.zh: 事情发生的时候，我们都很忙，我的收银台前排着一排顾客，但是凯伦穿过队伍来问我某样东西在哪里。

translation.en: I don't remember the exact item, but it was something like paper plates (or something that would be near them...plastic forks?
translation.zh: 我不记得具体是什么了，好像是纸盘之类的东西（或者是类似的东西……塑料餐叉？

translation.en: straws?).
translation.zh: 或者是吸管？)。

translation.en: Since I had a line of customers, I couldn't leave to help her locate, so I told her "I believe they are now on aisle 7."
translation.zh: 因为有顾客在排队，我不能自己前去寻找，只能告诉她“可能在 7 号通道。”

translation.en: Before I can even get on my walkie to ask someone for sure, she storms off.
translation.zh: 我还没来得及用对讲机问清楚，她就快步走了。

translation.en: Only to come storming back a couple of minutes later to tell me they are not there.
translation.zh: 几分钟后她又回来了，说她要的东西不在那里。

translation.en: A manager is now nearby, so I ask him if he can help her, and I tell him that I thought they were on 7, but she said they were not.
translation.zh: 有位经理就站在附近，于是我问他能否帮她，我说我以为她要的东西在 7 号通道，但她说没有。

translation.en: He looks confused and says "OK, maybe they are on 8.
translation.zh: 他也不能肯定，就说:“好吧，也有可能在 8 号。

translation.en: I'll help you find them, ma'am."
translation.zh: 我会帮你找到的，女士。”

translation.en: As they are about to walk away, she turns to me and says "You should know better than to tell someone where something is if you don't actually know".
translation.zh: 当他们要走开时，她转向我说:“如果你不知道东西在哪里，就不要瞎说。”

translation.en: Long story short, she comes back to the checkout, but goes to another line.
translation.zh: 长话短说，她后来回到收银台时，没有在我这里排队。

translation.en: As the manager comes back, he leans in and whispers to me "They WERE on aisle 7, like you told her."
translation.zh: 当经理回来时，他靠过来小声对我说:“就在 7 号通道，你没记错。”

translation.en: HA....told you so!
translation.zh: 哈……我就说嘛！

translation.en: To update your payment information please follow these steps:
translation.zh: 要更新付款信息，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Log in to your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.zh: 登录您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.en: Click on "My Account" and in the menu select "Account Settings”
translation.zh: 单击“我的帐户”，并在菜单中选择“帐户设置”

translation.en: Select the “Payment Information” tab.
translation.zh: 选择“付款信息”选项卡。

translation.en: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date.
translation.zh: 在“付款信息”下，选择信用卡类型并输入卡上的卡号、安全码 (CVV) 和过期日期。

translation.en: Click "Save”
translation.zh: 单击“保存”

translation.en: did yo utried this steps?
translation.zh: 您执行这些步骤了吗？

translation.en: Water heater temp and bath issue.
translation.zh: 热水器温度和浴缸问题。

translation.en: My water heater is set pretty low.
translation.zh: 我把热水器温度调得相当低。

translation.en: It’s a small tank in a closet (I live in an old pre-war apartment).
translation.zh: 它就是壁橱里的一个小水箱（我住在一个战前旧公寓里）。

translation.en: Question is, it does fill the bathtub up all the way without going cold.
translation.zh: 问题是，它需要给浴缸里灌满水而且不能变凉。

translation.en: If I only bathe once a week (but shower every 2 days or so) and the heater has enough water for quick showers, is it worth turning up the heat for the once a week bath?
translation.zh: 如果我一周只在浴缸里洗一次澡（但每两天左右淋浴一次），而且热水器里的水已经足够冲澡了，那么就为了一周使用一次浴缸，值得把热水器温度调高吗？

translation.en: Or would I save more electricity heating up my stock pot on the stove and adding it to the bath once the water heater is emptied?
translation.zh: 或者，如果热水器里的水不够，那我在炉子上用汤锅把水烧热再倒到浴缸里，可以省更多的电吗？

translation.en: Edit: Thanks everyone for the advice!
translation.zh: 编辑：感谢大家提出的建议！

translation.en: I turned up the heat just a little and it did the trick.
translation.zh: 我把温度调高一点，就可以达到我想要的效果了。

translation.en: The comment about boiling being inefficient is probably correct bc even though the water heater is running continuously, that thing has SO MUCH insulation.
translation.zh: 关于把水烧沸效率很低的看法可能是正确的，因为即使热水器一直在运行，它的隔热性能也很好。

translation.en: It’s hard to get to so I’m leaving it at that temp and calling it a day.
translation.zh: 温度调来调去很麻烦，所以我就一直保持这个温度了，今天就到此为止吧。

translation.en: Iran reports lowest number of daily COVID-19 cases in more than one year
translation.zh: 伊朗报告一年多来最低的每日 COVID-19 病例数

translation.en: Iran's Health Ministry has registered 1,686 new daily COVID-19 infections, the lowest tally over the past 460 days, marking a sharp decline in cases as the fifth wave of the pandemic subsides.
translation.zh: 伊朗卫生部登记了 1686 例新增 COVID-19 感染病例，这是过去 460 天以来的最低记录，标志着随着第五波疫情消退，病例数量急剧下降。

translation.en: According to Press TV, the Ministry announced on Saturday that 58 Iranians died from the disease, noting that out of the new cases detected over the past 24 hours, 286 patients were admitted to hospital.
translation.zh: 据 Press TV 报道，伊朗卫生部周六宣布，58 名伊朗人死于该病，并指出在过去 24 小时发现的新病例中，有 286 名患者入院治疗。

translation.en: It added that 6,152,524 people in the country have contracted COVID-19 and 5,963,373 of the infected people recovered and were discharged from hospitals.
translation.zh: 它还补充道，全国累计确诊病例 6,152,524 例，累计康复出院 5,963,373 例。

translation.en: According to the Ministry, 3,126 COVID-19 patients are in intensive care units (ICU) while 39,951,481 diagnosis tests have been so far conducted across Iran.
translation.zh: 据伊朗卫生部统计，目前有 3126 名新冠肺炎患者在重症监护室 (ICU) 接受治疗，伊朗全国进行了 39,951,481 次诊断检测。

translation.en: Coronavirus figures have been on a downward trend since the government started a mass vaccination campaign.
translation.zh: 自政府大规模接种疫苗以来，冠状病毒数据一直呈下降趋势。

translation.en: So far, 58,595,066 people have received the first dose of the COVID vaccine, 49,157,835 have received the second dosage and 2,237,841 have gotten the booster shots.
translation.zh: 截至目前，共有 58,595,066 人接种了第一剂疫苗，49,157,835 人接种了第二剂疫苗，2,237,841 人接种了加强剂疫苗。

translation.en: The total number of vaccines injected in the country reached 109,990,742 doses.
translation.zh: 全国注射的疫苗总数达到 109,990,742 剂。

translation.en: Over the past 24 hours, 19 provinces reported almost no death case or only one dead.
translation.zh: 在过去 24 小时内，19 个省几乎没有报告死亡病例或只有 1 例死亡病例。

translation.en: According to the latest figures, eight cities are in the orange zones, 119 in the yellow category, and 321 cities are in blue zones.
translation.zh: 根据最新数据，8 个城市在橙色区域，119 个在黄色区域，321 个在蓝色区域。

translation.en: There is no city in the high-risk red zone.
translation.zh: 没有城市在高危红色区域。

translation.en: Iran's First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber said on Wednesday that the country is fully prepared to roll out coronavirus booster vaccinations.
translation.zh: 伊朗第一副总统穆罕默德·莫赫贝尔 (Mohammad Mokhber) 周三表示，该国已全面做好推行新冠病毒增强疫苗的准备。

translation.en: "Today there is neither concern nor any shortage in the supply of vaccine and the ground is ready for the third and fourth dose vaccinations," Mokhber added.
translation.zh: Mokhber 补充说:“如今，疫苗供应既不短缺也没有隐患，我们已经为接种第三和第四剂疫苗做好了准备。”

translation.en: You know what I understand you.
translation.zh: 我明白您的意思。

translation.en: since we want you to have your order from us.
translation.zh: 我们也希望您能在我们这里下单。

translation.en: As a courtesy on your first order I will process a full amount credit on this order so you can use this credit to place a order with the right branch,
translation.zh: 为了向您的第一个订单表示感谢，我们将按照此订单的总金额送您一张抵免券，您可以使用此抵免券向您喜欢的门店下单。

translation.en: Free Training on CompTIA A+ | Will Cover Full Course
translation.zh: CompTIA A+ 免费培训 | 将涵盖全部课程

translation.en: I'm currently delivering free training on the CompTIA A+ course.
translation.zh: 我目前正在提供免费的 CompTIA A+ 培训课程。

translation.en: The course consists of 18 modules and I will be doing a dedicated video on each module.
translation.zh: 本课程由 18 个模块组成，我将为每个模块制作专门的视频。

translation.en: Some of these videos might be a bit long since it will be a whole module in each video so please feel free to make use of the time stamps in descriptions if you're looking for specific topics only or just want to refresh on certain topics only.
translation.zh: 有些视频可能会有点长，因为每个视频都是一个完整的模块，所以如果你只想寻找特定的主题或只想复习特定的主题，请使用描述中的时间戳。

translation.en: The time stamps are there to make life easier for you so it's your own fault if you end up skimming through the module back and forth like a crazy person looking for their lost teeth.
translation.zh: 时间戳的存在就是为了方便寻找内容，所以如果你像一个要把丢掉的牙齿找回来的疯子一样来回查找模块，那是你自己的错。

translation.en: I will make 20 videos for this course, the first is just the 4 min intro explaining the course, the last will be a dedicated exam tips video and then obviously the 18 videos in between will be your modules.
translation.zh: 我会为这个课程制作 20 个视频，第一个视频时长 4 分钟，介绍这个课程，最后一个视频专门教授考试技巧，中间的 18 个视频对应不同的模块。

translation.en: The training should be enough to pass both the international exams for A+, and the other courses I deliver should also be enough to pass the exams associated if there is a exam associated to that specific course.
translation.zh: 完成培训后，你应该足以通过 A+ 的国际考试，我提供的其他课程也应该足以帮助你通过相关考试（如果有与该特定课程相关的考试）。

translation.en: If you have a question about a specific topic in a module or the course in general that you would like more clarity on, please feel free to ask and I will try to assist you where I can if I'm online.
translation.zh: 如果你对某个模块或课程的特定主题有疑问要弄清楚，请随时问我，如果我在网上，我会尽量帮助你。

translation.en: Here is the course intro
translation.zh: 以下是课程简介

translation.en: **CompTIA A+ Course Intro**
translation.zh: **CompTIA A+ 课程介绍**

translation.en: Thanks for waiting.
translation.zh: 感谢您的耐心等候。

translation.en: Wrong order was selected earlier that's why I got confused earlier.
translation.zh: 我之前看错订单了，所以没说对。

translation.en: I thought it was already delivered.
translation.zh: 我以为已经送到了。

translation.en: I checked the correct order and I can see here that the rider is currently trying to pick it up now.
translation.zh: 我看了您的订单，骑手目前正在取餐。

translation.en: He will be there in 10-15 minutes.
translation.zh: 10-15 分钟后就能送到。

translation.en: I'm sorry but I don't see that you have sign in to your account, unless you have another account.
translation.zh: 抱歉，我没有看到您已经登录帐户了，您是有另一个帐户吗？

translation.en: If this the case please let me know the email you are already signed in on the ereader.
translation.zh: 如果是，请把您用来登录电子阅读器的电子邮箱告诉我。

translation.en: Front: 1 large pocket and 1 zipper pocket
translation.zh: 正面：1 个大口袋和 1 个拉链口袋

translation.en: 1.5 Inch wide and 58 inches long adjustable leather shoulder strap
translation.zh: 宽 1.5 英寸宽、长 58 英寸的可调节真皮肩带

translation.en: Bag made in a pet and smoke free environment
translation.zh: 皮包在无宠物、无烟环境中制成

translation.en: Naturally tanned with Sunflower oil only, no use of dye or chemicals
translation.zh: 只使用葵花油自然鞣制，不使用染料或化学物质

translation.en: UNIQUE CHARACTERISTICS OF HANDMADE LEATHER BAGS-
translation.zh: 独具特色的手工皮包 -

translation.en: Bag is made of Genuine Real Goat Leather (Full Grain) processed and tanned naturally with sunflower oil only.
translation.zh: 这款皮包使用真正的山羊皮（全谷物）制成，只使用葵花籽油自然加工和鞣制。

translation.en: Each vintage leather bag is a totally natural and handmade product therefore the colors and the finish can vary from one piece to the other.
translation.zh: 每个复古的皮包都是完全自然和手工制作的产品，因此每块皮的颜色与光泽可能有所不同。

translation.en: Each bag has a unique antique leather / lightly distressed vintage leather look.
translation.zh: 每个皮包都呈现出别具一格的古董皮革/轻微做旧皮革质感。

translation.en: Parts from several hides may be used to make a single leather bag.
translation.zh: 一个皮包可能用了几块皮的某些部分。

translation.en: So there may be some variation in color and the textures to the different parts of a bag, which will create a wonderfully unique effect.
translation.zh: 因此，皮包各个部分的颜色和纹理可能不一样，这将形成一个奇妙而独特的效果。

translation.en: Because of different craftsman and there may be small differences in the style, construction of the bags is shown on the website.
translation.zh: 因为工匠的不同，款式上可能会有细微的差异，包包的构造在网站上有展示。

translation.en: The lining may be a lighter or darker colour to the one shown in the images.
translation.zh: 里衬的颜色可能比图片中显示的颜色浅或深。

translation.en: Please write to us to know the current stock color.
translation.zh: 要想知道当前库存皮包的颜色，请联系我们。

translation.en: Genuine leather might have very small cut / scars / mark on it.
translation.zh: 真皮表面可能有很小的切口/疤痕/印记。

translation.en: This does not mean it is damaged.
translation.zh: 这并不意味着它损坏了。

translation.en: There may also be visible creases in the leather.
translation.zh: 皮革上还可能有明显的折痕。

translation.en: These features show the genuine origin of our leather satchels and messengers bags, they form part of the bag and do not affect its durability.
translation.zh: 这些特征表明我们的真皮挎包和邮差包的真正来源，它们不影响包的耐用性。

translation.en: Pure leather may smell a little when it is fresh but the smell will go away with use.
translation.zh: 真皮制成的新包可能会有一点气味，但使用后气味会消失。

translation.en: Please keep it in sunlight and fresh air for a few days.
translation.zh: 请把它放在通风的地方晾几天。

translation.en: There may be local customs / VAT charges which are unknown to us and beyond our control.
translation.zh: 当地可能会征收关税/增值税，这不在我们的控制范围内。

translation.en: Buyers are responsible for CUSTOMS at destination.
translation.zh: 目的地的海关费用由买家支付。

translation.en: You know something.
translation.zh: 你是知道一些的。

translation.en: I get what Dave's point was.
translation.zh: 我明白戴夫的意思。

translation.en: It's worse to kill black people than it is to make fun of trans people.
translation.zh: 杀害黑人比取笑变性人更不可取。

translation.en: And of course that's true.
translation.zh: 这当然是对的。

translation.en: But Dave forgot something.
translation.zh: 但是戴夫忘了一些东西。

translation.en: Many people who hate trans people also hate black people.
translation.zh: 许多人既讨厌变性人，也讨厌黑人。

translation.en: He hasn't endeared anyone to #blacklivesmatter.
translation.zh: 他没有让任何人拥戴 #blacklivesmatter。

translation.en: He's just given transphobes another hero and more anti-trans rhetoric.
translation.zh: 他只是给跨性别恐惧者造就了另一个英雄和更多的反变性言论。

translation.en: He's given credibility to transphobia.
translation.zh: 他在跨性别恐惧者中赢得了信任。

translation.en: And considering the most vulnerable trans people are trans women of colour, he has made them a target for violence.
translation.zh: 考虑到最容易受到攻击的变性人是有色人种的女性变性者，他将她们变成了暴力的目标。

translation.en: He left his show because he realized that white people were laughing AT him, not WITH him.
translation.zh: 他退出了他的节目，因为他意识到白人在嘲笑他，而不是跟他同心同德。

translation.en: How he didn't realize he's done the exact same thing to trans people is very sad.
translation.zh: 他竟然没有意识到他对变性人做了同样的事，真是可悲。

translation.en: You're welcome, one moment please.
translation.zh: 不客气，请稍等。

translation.en: I've ordered a replacement item for you, this is scheduled to dispatch on February 19.
translation.zh: 我已经为您订购了一个更换件，预计 2 月 19 日发货。

translation.en: I will just arrange a returns label for you now.
translation.zh: 我现在就给您安排退货标签。

translation.en: A Thief’s Pants Falls Down As He Attempts To Flee.
translation.zh: 小偷逃跑时裤子掉了。

translation.en: So to note, I didn’t witness this.
translation.zh: 我先声明，我没有亲眼目睹这个场景。

translation.en: I was told this by co-workers at my first retail job.
translation.zh: 这是我从事第一份零售工作时同事告诉我的。

translation.en: These two guys came to the store.
translation.zh: 那天有两个人来到店里。

translation.en: One of them was pretty infamous in town for always being in trouble with the law.
translation.zh: 其中一个经常犯事儿，因此在镇上臭名昭著。

translation.en: After a while of browsing, the infamous one left and went back to his vehicle while the other one took a shopping cart, and put a large 500 dollar socket set in it.
translation.zh: 这人逛了一会儿就出去了，回到车里坐着；另一个人推着购物车，往车里放了一个 500 美元的大套筒扳手组。

translation.en: This accomplice then waited until the two cashiers at the exit door were busy, then walked right by them and out the door.
translation.zh: 然后，这人趁着出口处的两名收银员忙着收银，径直从他们身边走过，走出了门。

translation.en: Both of them noticed, and asked each other if the guy paid.
translation.zh: 这两名收银员都注意到他了，互问此人有没有付钱。

translation.en: When it was confirmed he didn’t, one ran after him.
translation.zh: 当证实他没有付款时，一名收银员追了上去。

translation.en: I was told the cashier shouted for him to stop as she chased after him, but he began running with the cart to the getaway vehicle.
translation.zh: 我同事说，收银员边追边喊他停下来，他却开始推着购物车跑向同伙的车。

translation.en: I don’t know if he was one of those guys who liked wearing his pants low, or he didn’t have a belt on.
translation.zh: 此人当时穿着低腰裤，而且没有系皮带。

translation.en: But I was told his pants started falling down, and he was struggling to pull them up while running and pushing a cart with a heavy socket set.
translation.zh: 他跑着跑着，裤子就掉了，他一边往上拉裤子，一边跑，一边还推着车，车里放着沉重的套筒扳手组。

translation.en: He then ditches the cart, leaving the socket set in it as he yanked his pants up, and ran to the getaway vehicle, jumping in with his infamous accomplice diving them off.
translation.zh: 到后来，他扔下购物车和套筒扳手组不管了，拉起裤子，跑向同伙，跳进车里，两人就开车跑了。

translation.en: I'm in HR and have worked payroll in the past.
translation.zh: 我在人力资源部门工作，过去做过工资单方面的工作。

translation.en: If someone comes to me and tells me that they're working to get out of a financially abusive relationship and their abuser looks at their paystubs,
translation.zh: 如果有人来找我，说他们正在努力摆脱一段经济虐待关系，而施虐者知晓他们的工资单，

translation.en: we might be able to help!
translation.zh: 我们也许能帮上忙！

translation.en: Depending on the company.
translation.zh: 这件事需要公司的帮忙。

translation.en: I haven't had to do any of the below but I have had to keep staff off our directories and teach reception to pretend they didn't know who someone was and how to identify the abuser if he came by.
translation.zh: 我没有必要做以下任何一件事，但我必须将工作人员从名录中删除，并教前台假装他们不知道某人是谁，以及如何在施虐者出现时辨认出来。

translation.en: I could make an arrangement to syphon money as an after tax deduction, give the deduction an incongruous name that makes it look like some sort of obligatory deduction and then "remit" that deduction back to you separately.
translation.zh: 我可以划出一部分工资作为税后扣除额，并给这个扣除额一个不甚了然的名称，让它看起来像某种强制性扣除额，然后把扣除额单独“汇”回你。

translation.en: I'd probably have to have you sign an agreement of course.
translation.zh: 当然，我可能需要你签署一份协议。

translation.en: Another thing I might be able to do: have a fake email conversation with you about why your paystubs are going missing or why your password isn't working (after you change it) and how we're "trying to figure this out, thank you for your patience!"
translation.zh: 我还可以做的另一件事是：通过电子邮件与你进行一次虚假的对话，讨论为什么你的工资单不见了，或者你的密码不对（由你先更改密码），以及我们如何“试图解决这个问题，感谢你的耐心等待！”

translation.en: We don't have this but some employers can issue all or part of a paycheck onto their own debit card, no bank needed.
translation.zh: 我们不这样做，但一些雇主可以将全部或部分工资存入他们自己的借记卡，不需要经过银行。

translation.en: Also a lot of employers have various underutilized employee support services.
translation.zh: 此外，许多雇主提供各种未充分利用的员工支持服务。

translation.en: These can range from counseling help, legal insurance, to discounts and coupons.
translation.zh: 这包括咨询帮助、法律保险、折扣和优惠券。

translation.en: It is worth asking what they have so you can take advantage of anything that helps.
translation.zh: 可以问问雇主，这样你就可以利用任何有用的资源。

translation.en: Some gyms let you rent lockers.
translation.zh: 有些健身房会让你租储物柜。

translation.en: Not an ideal place to hide stuff as theft is a risk, but it is an option that might work for some.
translation.zh: 这不是一个理想的藏东西的地方，因为存在偷窃风险，但对某些人可能有帮助。

translation.en: I've done that several times, it doesn't work.
translation.zh: 我试过几次了，没用。

translation.en: I issued you a refund of the book.
translation.zh: 这本书我给您退款了。

translation.en: I am very dissatisfied with the solution, what do I do if the problem occurs again in the next book?
translation.zh: 我对这个解决方案很不满意，如果下一本书再次出现这个问题，我该怎么办？

translation.en: It is a rear occasion that it happens.
translation.zh: 这个问题极少出现的。

translation.en: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，为了提高服务质量，如果您在 2 分钟内没有回应，我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: I will close this chat now since no response has been received.
translation.zh: 由于一直没有收到您的回复，我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: Amazing.
translation.zh: 很神奇的。

translation.en: But good on you.
translation.zh: 但很适合你。

translation.en: Yeah, when I was 16 I applied and got offered a job at a restaurant.
translation.zh: 我 16 岁的时候找了一份在餐馆

translation.en: Dishwasher.
translation.zh: 当洗碗工的工作。

translation.en: First shift they had me close.
translation.zh: 第一班，我就一直工作到打烊才下班。

translation.en: Saturday.
translation.zh: 那是星期六。

translation.en: We were working till past 1am.
translation.zh: 我们都工作到了凌晨 1 点多。

translation.en: I quit the next day.
translation.zh: 第二天我就辞职了。

translation.en: Best way to lose a new young worker, by shocking them with that.
translation.zh: 要说什么是失去年轻员工的最好办法，就是这一招。

translation.en: Same happened to my friend after I had been working with Pizza Hut for a couple years (didn't make me close until months after I started working and trained up), got him a job there on the spot.
translation.zh: 同样的事情也发生在我的朋友身上，我在必胜客工作了几年（直到我工作和培训几个月后才让我上班到打烊），他也在必胜客找了一份工作。

translation.en: They proceeded to put him on two closes in a row.
translation.zh: 他们让他连续两天工作到打烊。

translation.en: He quit.
translation.zh: 他辞职了。

translation.en: Unless you advertise a job as a closing gig late at night, expect to lose your workers if you hit them with it too early.
translation.zh: 除非你的职位描述里说了要工作到深夜打烊，否则如果过早出这一招，你就得做好失去员工的准备。

translation.en: I can see that you've ordered from a restaurant that does their own delivery.
translation.zh: 我知道您从一家自己送餐的餐厅点餐了。

translation.en: They have accepted your order which is #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 他们已经接受您的订单，编号是 #PRS_ORG#。

translation.en: The restaurant called you and they do not have the item that you ordered?
translation.zh: 餐厅打电话给您，说没有您点的菜？

translation.en: Regrettably this is currently out of stock, I will just see if this is returning.
translation.zh: 很遗憾，这款商品目录缺货，我看看会不会补货。

translation.en: Please bear with me a moment
translation.zh: 请等一下

translation.en: This has been discontinued so will not be returning to stock, we do apologize.
translation.zh: 这款产品已经停产，所以无法补货，很抱歉。

translation.en: Boris Johnson teeters on edge of favour with Tory MPs
translation.zh: 鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 在保守党议员的支持边缘徘徊

translation.en: Boris Johnson has long been considered a king of comebacks.
translation.zh: 鲍里斯·约翰逊一直被认为是复出之王。

translation.en: And some Tory MPs hope he'll continue that streak by managing to rescue himself from plummeting poll ratings in the wake of a string of Downing Street parties in defiance of Covid laws.
translation.zh: 一些保守党议员希望他能继续这一势头，设法挽回在唐宁街举行一系列无视新冠肺炎法律的派对后民调支持率直线下降的局面。

translation.en: The prime minister had tangled himself in knots by repeatedly denying any rules were broken before more reports and evidence emerged to suggest the opposite.
translation.zh: 在没有更多对他不利的报道和证据出来之前，他一再否认违反了任何规定，这让他自己陷入了困境。

translation.en: First there was the video of No 10 aides laughing while they discussed a Christmas gathering on 18 December last year.
translation.zh: 最先爆出来的是去年 12 月 18 日他的助手们在唐宁街 10 号讨论圣诞聚会时开怀大笑的视频。

translation.en: Then Dominic Cummings, once Johnson's closest adviser, promised pictures had been taken of parties, and so with bated breath critics of the government waited for them to surface.
translation.zh: 后来，约翰逊最亲密的顾问多米尼克·卡明斯 (Dominic Cummings) 表示已经拍下了派对的照片，因此政府的批评者们屏息以待这些照片浮出水面。

translation.en: When an image was published on Sunday showing Johnson on a screen hosting a Christmas quiz for staffers tuning in from No 10 and at home, it was not quite the smoking gun some thought would finally skewer him, however.
translation.zh: 周日发布的一张照片显示，约翰逊正在屏幕上为在唐宁街 10 号和在家里收看的工作人员主持一个圣诞问答会，然而，有些人认为这张照片并不是能够刺痛他的铁证。

translation.en: The Sunday Mirror image shows Johnson with two aides who were dressed up with tinsel and a Santa hat - not socially distanced from one another, and clearly engaged in a social occasion while mixing households.
translation.zh: 在《星期日镜报》的照片中，约翰逊和两名助手穿着金光闪闪的衣服，戴着圣诞老人的帽子，他们彼此之间并没有社交距离，显然是在参加一个有多个家庭出席的社交场合。

translation.en: But it could have been worse.
translation.zh: 但情况本可能更糟。

translation.en: There have been other parties hosted in No 10 and Conservative party headquarters in which people drank copious amounts of alcohol, played party games, exchanged secret Santa gifts and socialised into the small hours, sources have told media outlets including the Guardian, Mirror, BBC and Times.
translation.zh: 有消息人士告诉《卫报》、《镜报》、英国广播公司和《泰晤士报》等媒体，在唐宁街 10 号和保守党总部举行的其他派对上，人们喝了很多酒，玩派对游戏，交换秘密的圣诞礼物，一直社交到凌晨。

translation.en: Ministers will quietly breath a sigh of relief no pictures of these scenes have been leaked - yet.
translation.zh: 不过，部长们可以松一口气了，因为这些场景的照片还没有被披露出来。

translation.en: While Johnson's attendance at the quiz broke the rules, according to Keir Starmer, the Labour leader and a former director of public prosecutions, Tory MPs think people will look at the photo and judge that it really shows him hosting a virtual quiz - a familiar sight during the pandemic.
translation.zh: 据工党领袖、前检察长基尔•斯塔默 (Keir Starmer) 表示，约翰逊参加问答会违反了规定，但保守党议员认为，人们看到照片后会判断，这真的是他在主持一个虚拟问答会，而这是疫情期间常见的一幕。

translation.en: The staff, dialling in from other rooms in No 10 while drinking and not socially distancing, cannot be seen.
translation.zh: 在唐宁街 10 号喝酒时在其他房间打电话和没有保持社交距离的工作人员没有被曝光出来。

translation.en: On Sunday Nadhim Zahawi insisted the picture was just an example of Johnson "thanking his staff" and used it to play down the party scandal as "hype."
translation.zh: 周日，纳齐姆·扎哈维 (Nadhim Zahawi) 坚称，这张照片只是约翰逊“感谢他的工作人员”的一个例子，并用它来把保守党的丑闻淡化为“炒作”。

translation.en: He told LBC: "On that front page, I think your listeners will look at that and see a PM in his office, with the two close people that work with him, with no alcohol, taking 10 to 15 minutes to thank and motivate his staff, who have been coming in because they can't work from home."
translation.zh: 他告诉 LBC：“我认为，你的听众会在封面上看到首相在他的办公室，旁边有两个关系密切的工作人员，他们没有喝酒，他用了 10 到 15 分钟感谢并激励他的员工，而他们在场，是因为他们不能居家工作。”

translation.en: Much damage has already been done, with mutinous MPs furious at the prime minister allowing a "one rule for them" narrative to take hold, from Cummings to Matt Hancock and more recently Owen Paterson.
translation.zh: 从卡明斯到马特·汉考克，再到最近的欧文·帕特森，反对首相的议员们对他的“只许州官放火”的说法感到愤怒，这已经造成了很大的损害。

translation.en: Johnson is teetering on the edge of favour with his own MPs; if further photos surface, they may push him over the edge.
translation.zh: 约翰逊在保守党中受到的支持正摇摇欲坠；如果有更多的照片浮出水面，他可能会被推到边缘。

translation.en: As I can see here this rider came to your location at 12:39. he try to deliver this order until 12:52.
translation.zh: 我看到这名骑手在 12 点 39 分到达您所在的位置。在 12 点 52 分之前，他是想把您的订餐送到。

translation.en: The rider try to leave the order on the Security but he did not accept it.
translation.zh: 这名骑手想把您的订餐放在保安那，但被拒绝了。

translation.en: That is why the order was taken by the rider as he goes.
translation.zh: 所以他又把您的订餐带走了。

translation.en: Long queues for Banksy's shirts supporting statue-toppling protesters
translation.zh: 为支持推翻雕像的抗议者，人们排长队购买班克西 (Banksy) 设计的衬衫

translation.en: Crowds desperate to buy shirts designed by the mysterious street artist Banksy have been seen in Bristol, UK.
translation.zh: 在英国的布里斯托尔，为了支持在“黑人的命也是命”(BLM) 游行中推翻奴隶贸易商雕像的抗议者，

translation.en: They were released to support protesters on trial for toppling a slave trader statue during a Black Lives Matter march.
translation.zh: 人们争相购买神秘街头艺术家班克西设计的衬衫。

translation.en: Banksy designed the limited edition "souvenir shirts" to mark the trial of four people charged with damaging a controversial statue in Bristol last year.
translation.zh: 为纪念去年被控破坏布里斯托尔一座有争议的雕像的四人受审案件，班克西设计了这款限量版“纪念衬衫”。

translation.en: "All proceeds to the defendants so they can go for a pint," the artist wrote on Instagram.
translation.zh: “所有收益都赠予被告，这样他们就可以去喝一杯了，”这位艺术家在 Instagram 上写道。

translation.en: Sold for £25 ($33) plus VAT and limited to only one item per person at several shops, the shirt has been in such demand that people queued around blocks to get it.
translation.zh: 这款衬衫的售价为 25 英镑（33 美元），外加增值税，几家商店要求每人限购一件，由于供不应求，有些人在几个街区排队后才买到。

translation.en: An almost two-minute long video posted on Twitter shows an endless line of customers.
translation.zh: 在推特上发布的一段近两分钟长的视频显示，购买衬衫的顾客排起了长龙。

translation.en: UK media reported that "thousands" were eager to raise cash for the protesters by purchasing the gray T-shirt, which depicts an empty plinth with "Bristol" written above it.
translation.zh: 据英国媒体报道，“数千人”急于购买这款灰色 T 恤，为抗议者筹集资金，T 恤上画着一个空底座，上面写着“布里斯托尔”。

translation.en: It refers to a toppled bronze memorial to the 17th century merchant Edward Colston, who was involved in the transatlantic slave trade.
translation.zh: 这个底座意寓已被推倒的为 17 世纪参与了跨大西洋奴隶贸易的商人爱德华·科尔斯顿 (Edward Colston) 而建的青铜纪念碑。

translation.en: The activists, known as the "Colston Four," are facing a trial at Bristol Crown Court next week, charged with inflicting criminal damage to a monument belonging to the city council.
translation.zh: 这些被称为“科尔斯顿四人组”的活动人士将于下周在布里斯托尔刑事法庭接受审判，他们被控对属于市议会的一座纪念碑造成刑事毁坏。

translation.en: The men - who have all pleaded not guilty - are accused of sinking the statue "without lawful excuse."
translation.zh: 这四名男子拒不认罪，他们被指控“没有合法理由”就将雕像沉到了水下。

translation.en: Praised by some for leaving money to various charitable causes after his death, the controversial trader's statue was attacked in June 2020, when a protest supporting the Black Lives Matter (BLM) movement was happening in the city.
translation.zh: 贸易商爱德华·科尔斯顿饱受争议，有些人称赞他死后为各种慈善事业留下了资金，他的雕像在 2020 年 6 月遭到毁坏，当时该市正在举行一场支持“黑人的命也是命”(BLM) 运动的抗议活动。

translation.en: The damaged plinth and graffitied statue was later recovered by the city council from Bristol Harbour, where it was thrown during the unrest, and re-emerged as a local museum exhibit, alongside a curated selection of BLM posters from the march.
translation.zh: 在骚乱期间，这尊雕像底座受损，雕像本身被涂鸦并被推进了布里斯托尔港口，后来被市议会从布里斯托尔港捞出来，并把它与 BLM 游行海报一起放在当地博物馆里。

translation.en: A sculpture of a BLM protester was erected on the empty plinth previously occupied by Colston.
translation.zh: 现在，放在底座上的是一名 BLM 抗议者的雕塑。

translation.en: Joe Biden Laments Failure to Stop Global Warming After Deadly Tornados
translation.zh: 致命龙卷风过后，乔·拜登哀叹未能阻止全球变暖

translation.en: President Joe Biden lamented the world's failure to stop global warming on Saturday after addressing the deadly tornadoes that swept through several states.
translation.zh: 周六，美国总统乔·拜登 (Joe Biden) 就席卷了美国几个州的致命龙卷风发表讲话，对未能阻止全球变暖表示遗憾。

translation.en: "We all know that everything is more intense when the climate is warming.
translation.zh: “我们都知道，当气候变暖时，一切都会变得更加严重。

translation.en: Everything," he said.
translation.zh: 一切,”他说。

translation.en: "And obviously it has some impact here."
translation.zh: “显然它在这里产生了一些影响。”

translation.en: At least 30 tornadoes were reported across six different states causing widespread devastation, and over 100 people are expected killed from the storm.
translation.zh: 据报道，至少有 30 场龙卷风席卷了六个州，造成大面积破坏，预计超过 100 人死于这场风暴。

translation.en: The president said he did not know the full extent of global warming's contribution to the deadly storms, which he described as one of the "largest tornado outbreaks in history."
translation.zh: 总统说，他不知道全球变暖对这场致命风暴的影响程度，他称这是“历史上最大的龙卷风暴之一”。

translation.en: He said he would get the Environmental Protection Agency to investigate.
translation.zh: 他说他会让环境保护局展开调查。

translation.en: "All that I know is that the intensity of the weather across the board has some impact as a consequence of the warming of the planet," Biden said.
translation.zh: 拜登说:“我所知道的是，由于地球变暖，各地天气的强度都受到了一定的影响。”

translation.en: The president praised the reporter who asked him about climate change.
translation.zh: 总统赞扬了问他关于气候变化问题的记者。

translation.en: "As usual, you ask always the best question," he said with a wry chuckle.
translation.zh: “跟平时一样，你总是问最好的问题，”他苦笑着说。

translation.en: "How are we going to handle this?" he continued.
translation.zh: “我们要怎么处理这件事？”他继续说。

translation.en: "Part of it is acknowledging that the likelihood of fewer weather catastrophes, absent of continued movement on dealing with global warming, it's just not going to happen."
translation.zh: “首先要知道，我们是有可能减少气候灾难的，前提是要持续采取行动来应对全球变暖。”

translation.en: Biden said he was shocked by the record wildfires in the country during 2021, expressing alarm that global warming was a major contribution.
translation.zh: 拜登表示，他对 2021 年美国创纪录的野火感到震惊，并表示全球变暖是主要原因。

translation.en: "So we have to act," he said.
translation.zh: “所以我们必须采取行动，”他说。

translation.en: Biden said the first step was to save lives and care for the families who were affected by the storms.
translation.zh: 拜登说，第一步是拯救生命，照顾受风暴影响的家庭。

translation.en: "I promise you.
translation.zh: “我承诺。

translation.en: Whatever is needed.
translation.zh: 不管需要什么，

translation.en: Whatever is needed, the federal government is going to supply it," Biden said.
translation.zh: 无论需要什么，联邦政府都会提供，”拜登说。

translation.en: He said he would continue to monitor the storm recovery closely and do whatever was needed by the federal government.
translation.zh: 他说，他将继续密切关注风暴恢复情况，并采取联邦政府需要采取的任何措施。

translation.en: "I want folks in all these states to know.
translation.zh: “我想告诉这些州的所有民众，

translation.en: We're going to get through this.
translation.zh: 我们会扛过去的。

translation.en: We're going to get through this together and the federal government is not going to walk away," he said.
translation.zh: 我们将一起度过难关，联邦政府不会袖手旁观，”他说。

translation.en: "This is one of those times when we aren't Democrats or Republicans."
translation.zh: “现在不应该是区分民主党人或共和党人的时候。”

translation.en: The president said he would visit the storm affected areas when it was clear he would not get in the way of local rescue efforts.
translation.zh: 总统表示，他将前往受风暴影响的地区，同时明确表示他不会妨碍当地的救援工作。

translation.en: "I do plan on going," he said.
translation.zh: “我确实打算去，”他说。

translation.en: You can come back any time as our chat service window is open 24/7
translation.zh: 我们的聊天服务窗口全年全天候开放，您可以随时回来

translation.en: I sincerely hope you get to find a resolution
translation.zh: 我真诚地祝您找到解决的办法

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent evening.
translation.zh: 祝您度过一个愉快的夜晚。

translation.en: I can see the details match.
translation.zh: 我看到细节都对的上。

translation.en: I am sorry but it seems your original order was accidentally spilled, that is why my colleague had to make a new order.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，看起来您原来订的餐不小心洒了，所以我的同事重新下了订单。

translation.en: The new order is order #NUMBER# and it will be there in just 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 新订单号是 #NUMBER#，20 分钟后就能送到。

translation.en: The rider is picking it up and will delivery asap.
translation.zh: 骑手正在取货，并会尽快送到。

translation.en: Wendy Rogers Calls New Zealand PM 'Lenin With Hair,' Claims 'Satanic Communists' in U.S.
translation.zh: 温迪·罗杰斯 (Wendy Rogers) 称新西兰总理是“留着头发的列宁”，呼吁美国警惕“邪恶的共产主义者”

translation.en: Republican Arizona Senator Wendy Rogers on Sunday called New Zealand's Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern "Lenin with Hair" and warned against communism in the United States.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯周日称呼新西兰总理杰辛达·阿德恩 (Jacinda Ardern) 为“留着头发的列宁”，并警告美国警惕共产主义。

translation.en: Rogers appeared to be criticizing Ardern's COVID response as she referred to Soviet leader Vladimir Lenin in a Tweet she posted along with a short clip of the prime minister.
translation.zh: 罗杰斯似乎是在批评阿德恩对新冠肺炎的反应，她在推特上提到了苏联领导人弗拉基米尔·列宁 (Vladimir Lenin)，并附上了该总理的一段视频。

translation.en: Rogers didn't further explain her criticism of Ardern in her Tweet.
translation.zh: 罗杰斯没有就她在推特上对阿德恩的批评进行解释。

translation.en: In the clip, Ardern was speaking about COVID misinformation and New Zealand's efforts to keep people informed about the pandemic.
translation.zh: 在视频中，阿德恩谈到了有关新冠病毒的错误信息，以及新西兰在帮助民众了解疫情方面作出的努力。

translation.en: "More bold Christians are needed in office to counter the satanic Communists in both parties," the Arizona Senator wrote in another tweet on Sunday.
translation.zh: 周日，这位亚利桑那州参议员在另一条推文中写道:“政府需要更多大胆的基督徒来对抗两党中邪恶的共产党人。”

translation.en: Her Tweet was met with ridicule from different social media users, with one person tweeting back: "Please offer your definitions of Communism and Christianity, because I don't think you understand either."
translation.zh: 她的推文遭到了不同社交媒体用户的嘲笑，其中一人回复道：“请给出你对共产主义和基督教的定义，因为我认为你也不懂。”

translation.en: "I see that Wendy is going all out today, trying to compete with the craziest of the crazy," another person tweeted.
translation.zh: 另一个人在推特上写道:“我看到温迪今天全力以赴，试图与最疯狂的人竞争。”

translation.en: Rogers has been vocal about her stance against communism before on social media.
translation.zh: 罗杰斯此前曾在社交媒体上公开表达过她反对共产主义的立场。

translation.en: In September, she called Labor Day a "Communist Holiday" without further explanation.
translation.zh: 9 月，她称劳动节为“共产主义节日”，但没有进一步解释。

translation.en: Her tweet was mocked among social media users, including The Arizona House Democrats, who replied: "Says the heart and soul of Arizona's Republican Party (prove us wrong)."
translation.zh: 她的推文遭到了社交媒体用户的嘲笑，包括亚利桑那州众议院民主党人，他们回应道：“这是亚利桑那州共和党的心声（证明我们错了）。”

translation.en: "You do realize that if you keep falsely calling all good things communist you're only going to make communism more attractive, no?" asked another social media user.
translation.zh: 另一位社交媒体用户问道:“你知道，如果你一直错误地把所有好的都称为共产主义，你只会让共产主义更有吸引力，不是吗？”

translation.en: Republican Senator Wendy Rogers warned against communists in America and called for having more "bold Christians" in office.
translation.zh: 共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯警告美国警惕共产主义者，并呼吁让更多“大胆的基督徒”执政。

translation.en: Writer Shiv Ramdas also denounced the tweet by paraphrasing her own words: "'working is Communism.'"
translation.zh: 作家希夫·拉姆达斯 (Shiv Ramdas) 也用自己的话谴责了这条推文：“‘工作就是共产主义。’”

translation.en: Separately, Rogers has frequently suggested that Donald Trump won the 2020 presidential election and called for a new election.
translation.zh: 另外，罗杰斯经常暗示，唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 赢得了 2020 年总统大选，并呼吁重新选举。

translation.en: "I call for the Biden electors to be recalled to Arizona & a new election must be conducted.
translation.zh: “我呼吁将拜登的选举人召回亚利桑那州，重新举行选举。

translation.en: Arizona's electors must not be awarded fraudulently..." the senator tweeted in July.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州的选民不应该遭到欺骗……”这位参议员 7 月份在推特上写道。

translation.en: In July, Rogers campaigned for the election to be decertified and previously launched a petition that she claimed gained 663,000 signatures.
translation.zh: 今年 7 月，罗杰斯发起了取消选举认证的活动，此前她发起了一份请愿书，声称已经获得了 66.3 万个签名。

translation.en: "Things are really taking off!
translation.zh: “事情真的成功了！

translation.en: Let's get to 1 million ASAP.
translation.zh: 让我们尽快拿到一百万个签名。

translation.en: Audit results are coming soon, more states are coming online," she tweeted in September.
translation.zh: 审计结果很快就会出来，更多的州将上线，”她 9 月份在推特上写道。

translation.en: The Trump supporter has also pushed for debunked claims of voter fraud in Arizona.
translation.zh: 特朗普的支持者还推动了亚利桑那州选民欺诈的指控。

translation.en: Newsweek contacted Senator Rogers' office for comment.
translation.zh: 《新闻周刊》联系了罗杰斯参议员的办公室请其置评。

translation.en: Thank you, please bear with me a moment whilst I look into this for you
translation.zh: 谢谢，请您稍候，我查一下

translation.en: I do apologise about this, as the account holder is not yourself we would need #NAME# to contact us to confirm her details, once she has done this and has confirmed she is happy for us to discuss the order with yourself we can then look at the previous correspondence for you.
translation.zh: 抱歉，帐户持有人不是您，必须由 #NAME# 本人与我们联系，确认她的详细信息，等她确认同意我们与您讨论订单后，我们可以为您查找以前的通信内容。

translation.en: I understand would you please check if the ebook can open it?
translation.zh: 我明白了，您能检查一下能否打开电子书吗？

translation.en: Were you able to find the ebook?
translation.zh: 您找到电子书了吗？

translation.en: Due to no response, and for quality purposes, I have to release this chat, please feel free to contact us for any inquiry or question, We will be more than glad to provide you assistance with it.
translation.zh: 由于您没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我不得不发布此聊天内容，如有任何询问或问题，请随时联系我们，我们非常乐意为您提供帮助。

translation.en: Have a wonderful day, Goodbye!
translation.zh: 祝您有美好的一天，再见！

translation.en: Please wait for the order, and you can report to us if ever food is not hot so we can help you.
translation.zh: 请等待订餐的送达，如果食物变凉了，请您告诉我们，我们可以帮助您。

translation.en: I know having a credit will not make your food experience better, but allow me to compensate for the delay.
translation.zh: 我知道给您抵免券也不能改善您的用餐体验，但是请允许我为这次延迟作出补偿。

translation.en: 'Interview with the Vampire' author Anne Rice dies at age 80
translation.zh: 《夜访吸血鬼》的作者安妮·赖斯去世，享年 80 岁

translation.en: She passed away due to complications resulting from a stroke, Christopher Rice said.
translation.zh: 她的儿子克里斯多夫·赖斯说，她死于中风引起的并发症。

translation.en: Rice's biggest success was her first novel, "Interview with the Vampire," which was published in 1976 and introduced the character of the vampire Lestat, who would be the central character in the 13-book Chronicles series, the most recent of which was published in 2018.
