translation.zh: 赖斯最成功的作品是她的第一部小说《夜访吸血鬼》，该书于 1976 年出版，塑造了吸血鬼莱斯特这个角色，莱斯特是《编年史》13 部全集的中心人物，最新一部于 2018 年出版。

translation.en: "I had an idea of Lestat as the man of action, the man who could do things that I couldn't do," Rice said in a talk at Southern Illinois University in 2010.
translation.zh: 2010 年，赖斯在南伊利诺伊大学的一次演讲中说：“我认为莱斯特是个实干家，他能做我做不到的事情。”

translation.en: "Interview with the Vampire" was made into a successful feature film in 1994, helping to reignite interest in the vampire genre which continued with the TV series "The Vampire Diaries" and the "Twilight" film series.
translation.zh: 1994 年，《夜访吸血鬼》被拍成电影并获得了成功，它重新点燃了人们对吸血鬼题材的兴趣，之后的电视剧《吸血鬼日记》和《暮光之城》系列电影相继上映。

translation.en: Although she lived most of her life in California, Rice was a native of New Orleans and set many of her stories there, according to her website biography.
translation.zh: 根据赖斯网站上的个人简介，尽管她大部分时间在加州度过，但她是新奥尔良人，而她的许多故事也都发生新奥尔良。

translation.en: Rice's son, Christopher Rice, said he was at his mother's bedside when she died.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗·赖斯说，他母亲去世时，他就在她的床边。

translation.en: Anne Rice will be buried in a private ceremony in New Orleans, with a public memorial planned next year, he said.
translation.zh: 他说，他将为安妮·赖斯举行一个私人葬礼，明年将举行一个公众纪念活动。

translation.en: Apple Music Documents & Data Storage Size
translation.zh: Apple Music 文档和数据存储大小

translation.en: Recently, I made the switch from an iPhone 12 Pro to a 13 Pro Max, and on both iPhones I have noticed a bug that is eating up my internal storage.
translation.zh: 最近，我把 iPhone 12 Pro 换成 13 Pro Max 了，但我发现，这两款 iPhone 上都有一个 bug 在吞噬手机的内部存储空间。

translation.en: Apple Music’s Documents and Data are using about 35GB of internal storage.
translation.zh: Apple Music 文档和数据使用了大约 35GB 的内部存储空间。

translation.en: I have tried remediating this by deleting the app, but since this is a stock app the documents and data are never truly deleted from the iPhone.
translation.zh: 我试着删除这个应用程序来恢复存储空间，但这款应用程序是自带的，文档和数据从未真正从 iPhone 中删除。

translation.en: I thought that once I moved to the new iPhone 13 Pro that the bug would disappear, but that was not the case.
translation.zh: 我原以为，只要换了新的 iPhone 13 Pro，这个 bug 就会消失，但事实并非如此。

translation.en: After installing from an iCloud backup, I checked the Apple Music app and it was still using more then 30GBs for documents and data.
translation.zh: 通过 iCloud 备份安装后，我检查了 Apple Music，它的文档和数据仍然超过 30GB。

translation.en: After contacting two Apple Support specialists, one suggested that I wipe my iPhone and start fresh, while another didn’t offer any real suggestions as the issue goes beyond anything they can do.
translation.zh: 我联系了两名苹果支持专家，其中一位建议我擦除 iPhone 后重新安装，而另一位则没有提供任何真正的建议，因为这个问题超出了他们的能力范围。

translation.en: I also checked my iPad and it seems AM is only using 15GBs for documents and data on it, but that still is not acceptable.
translation.zh: 我也检查了我的 iPad，Apple Music 的文档和数据似乎只有 15GB，但这也还是太多了。

translation.en: Now I am turning to the community to see how widespread this issue is, and maybe get Apple’s attention on this issue.
translation.zh: 现在我来社区看看这个问题有多普遍，或许能引起苹果公司对这个问题的关注。

translation.en: Have you experienced this as well?
translation.zh: 您也遇到过这样的问题吗？

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。

translation.en: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.zh: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。

translation.en: To be eligible for the Virus Protection Promise, you must purchase, renew, or upgrade your Norton subscription directly from Symantec, or subscribe to the Norton Automatic Renewal Service.
translation.zh: 要获得“病毒防护承诺”，您必须直接从赛门铁克购买、续订或升级诺顿订阅，或订阅诺顿自动续订服务。

translation.en: If a Symantec service representative is unable to remove a virus from your device, then you may receive a full refund on the actual price paid for the Norton subscription, or if a Norton bundle, the total Norton bundle price paid (net of any discounts or refunds received and less any shipping, handling and applicable taxes, except in certain states and countries where shipping, handling and taxes are refundable) and only for the current paid subscription service period for that subscription or subscription bundle.
translation.zh: 如果赛门铁克服务代表无法清除您的设备中的病毒，那么您可以按照在订阅诺顿时实际支付的价格获得全额退款；如果是诺顿捆绑包，则可以按照诺顿总包价格（扣除获得的任何折扣或收到退款，减去任何运输费、处理费和适用的税费，但在可退还运输费、处理费和税费的某些州和国家除外）获得全额退款，但仅限该订阅或订阅捆绑包的当前付费订阅服务期间。

translation.en: The Norton subscription must be installed and activated on your device prior to the time it is infected by a virus.
translation.zh: 您必须在设备感染病毒之前安装并激活诺顿订阅。

translation.en: The refund DOES NOT apply to any damages incurred as a result of viruses.
translation.zh: 不能以病毒造成的任何损害为由要求退款。

translation.en: See Norton website for more detail.
translation.zh: 有关详细信息，请参见诺顿网站。

translation.en: Protect what matters with a top-rated security service
translation.zh: 以卓越的安全服务保护重要的东西

translation.en: Your online life and real life are merging into one seamless experience, and you need security that can keep viruses, identity theft, and other digital threats from becoming real-life headaches.
translation.zh: 您的在线生活和现实生活正在无缝融合为一体，您需要安全产品来防御日益严重的病毒、身份盗窃和其他数字威胁。

translation.en: We see more, analyse more and stop more online threats
translation.zh: 我们可以发现、分析和阻止更多的网络威胁

translation.en: Why were Skyler and Walt Jr. so annoyed with Walt working on the house in season 2?
translation.zh: 为什么在第二季中，斯凯乐和小沃尔特对沃尔特修葺房屋而生气？

translation.en: Specifically 2.10 "Over"
translation.zh: 特别是第二季第 10 集“Over”

translation.en: Walt replaces the hot water heater, then replaces boards that were apparently maybe not necessarily rotting.
translation.zh: 沃尔特换了热水器，又换了显然没有腐坏的电路板。

translation.en: Why does Skyler seem so pissed about this?
translation.zh: 为什么斯凯乐看起来这么生气？

translation.en: Fed up completely, she asks "Are you even going to work today?"
translation.zh: 她忍无可忍，问道:“你今天去上班吗？”

translation.en: A week or two prior, she was gung-ho about him resting and recovering the entire time.
translation.zh: 就在一两周前，她还劝他在家多休息，等着身体康复。

translation.en: I understand she's unhappy in the relationship, but Walter Jr. seems vaguely annoyed and completely puzzled by Walt doing some renovations.
translation.zh: 我理解她在这段婚姻中并不开心，但小沃尔特似乎也有点生气，不能理解沃尔特为什么要修理房子。

translation.en: I'm also aware Skyler is openly flirting with Ted in the hope that someone treats her as a priority for a change whilst carrying a child whereas Walt has made everything about him ever since his 50th birthday.
translation.zh: 我还看到斯凯乐公开与泰德调情，说如果有人想要生孩子，希望能把她作为首选，而沃尔特过了 50 岁生日后就只把心思放在自己身上。

translation.en: Still, I always find it odd on rewatch that Sky and Jr. seem so incredibly ticked off that Walt is doing something productive at home, not lying or killing people or making drugs.
translation.zh: 不过，我在再次刷剧之后，发现了奇怪的一点，沃尔特在家做的明明是正事，既不撒谎，也不杀人和制毒，斯凯乐和小沃尔特为什么还那么生气呢？

translation.en: Just fixing up the house like a homeowner would and should with nothing but spare time.
translation.zh: 他只是把自己当房主修葺了一下房子，因为他只有大把的空闲时间。

translation.en: I also understand this is just another form of desperation to attempt to retain his role as husband and family man despite a day or two prior forcing tequila onto his teenage son.
translation.zh: 我也明白，这只是另一种形式的绝望，他试图保留作为丈夫和一名顾家的男人的尊严，尽管就在一两天前他还强迫十几岁的儿子喝龙舌兰酒。

translation.en: He's clearly trying to get back in their good graces by hyping up an issue that isn't an immediate priority to make it seem like he's done a terrific job and is a terrific person!
translation.zh: 他显然是想通过解决一个并非当务之急的问题来重新赢得他们的好感，让人觉得他做的事很了不起，他本人也很了不起！

translation.en: He clearly sucks at damage control.
translation.zh: 他显然不善于控制损失。

translation.en: Regardless, the reaction from his wife and son still always rubbed me the wrong way and felt forced in this situation to try and highlight Walt's desperate bid to make up for ugly mistakes.
translation.zh: 不管怎样，他妻子和儿子的反应总是让我感到不快，好像是在刻意强调沃尔特为弥补可怕的错误而做出的绝望努力。

translation.en: Deluxe Manual/ Battery Powered Vacuum Erection Penis Pump, manufactured by VVI Ltd England, allows you to get a handle on your erectile dysfunction, commonly known as ED.
translation.zh: 豪华手动/电动真空阴茎勃起泵，VVI Ltd England 制造，可以治疗勃起功能障碍（俗称 ED）。

translation.en: Erectile dysfunction can be emotionally and financially demanding, which is why Encore provides one of the most affordable penis pumps available on the market.
translation.zh: 勃起功能障碍容易让人产生情绪焦虑，也很花钱，这就是 Encore 提供这款市场上最实惠的阴茎泵之一的原因。

translation.en: This multi powered vacuum pump has a special grip handle built into the pump head that gives the user excellent control over the pumping and suction process.
translation.zh: 这种多动力真空泵在泵头内置了一个特殊的握把，用户可以很好地控制抽吸过程。

translation.en: Vacuum therapy has been proven to effectively treat erectile dysfunction in over 95% of men without any major side effects or medication.
translation.zh: 真空疗法已被证明能有效治疗 95% 以上的男性勃起功能障碍，没有任何重大副作用，不需要使用药物。

translation.en: The pump head and cylinder are both covered by a lifetime manufacturer warranty, meaning that Encore will replace either part in the event of breakage or malfunction.
translation.zh: 泵头和泵缸享受制造商的终身保修，这意味着如果出现损坏或故障，Encore 负责更换其中任何一个部件。

translation.en: After a little practice, vacuum therapy with this system becomes easy and comfortable.
translation.zh: 只需要稍稍练习，就能方便、舒适地使用这个真空系统进行治疗。

translation.en: In addition, VVI includes several additional items in this kit that makes the process fast and user-friendly.
translation.zh: 此外，VVI 在此套装中包含了另外几个商品，治疗过程快速且对用户友好。

translation.en: The patented ring ejector, loading cone, and lubricant included in the kit help to apply the tension bands after pumping.
translation.zh: 该套装含有获得专利的环形喷射器、装载锥和润滑剂有助于泵送后使用张力带。

translation.en: Tension bands, also known as penis rings, help sustain the erection once it has been achieved with the pump.
translation.zh: 张力带也被称为阴茎环，有助于在使用泵勃起后维持勃起状态。

translation.en: This kit includes comes with an assortment of tension bands, in the most popular sizes, to help the user find the most effective tension level.
translation.zh: 这个套装配有多种最常用尺寸的张力带，以帮助用户找到最合适的张力水平。

translation.en: To top it off, the whole kit fits in a sleek and discreet carrying bag that stores virtually anywhere.
translation.zh: 最重要的是，这个套装装在一个优美、低调的手提袋里，几乎可以存放在任何地方。

translation.en: VVI Medical understands that a lot of individuals want to keep their sexual lives private, which is why we will take the utmost discretion when shipping this product.
translation.zh: VVI Medical 理解很多人想要保持性生活的隐私，因此，我们会采用最能保护隐私的方式邮寄这个产品。

translation.en: You will receive your shipment of the Encore Deluxe Manual/ Battery powered Vacuum Erection Penis Pump in a plain box.
translation.zh: 这款豪华手动/电动真空勃起阴茎泵装在一个普通的盒子里邮寄。

translation.en: No prescription required to purchase this pump.
translation.zh: 购买这件产品不需要处方。

translation.en: OK, you can try performing a factory reset on your device to see if this fixes the problem.
translation.zh: 好的，您可以尝试对设备执行出厂重置，看看能否解决问题。

translation.en: I understand that you have already tried turning it off and back on with no success, correct?
translation.zh: 我知道您已经试过关机再开机，结果没能解决问题，对吗？

translation.en: In some communities, the church provides a safe place for some persecuted social groups.
translation.zh: 在某些社区，教会会为一些受迫害的社会团体提供一个安全的处所。

translation.en: It’s not a coincidence the civil rights movement was very much intertwined with minority churches, masjid, & temples.
translation.zh: 民权运动与少数民族教堂、清真寺和寺庙紧密联系在一起，这并非巧合。

translation.en: Ahmad Aubrey’s trial is also an example of positive impact.
translation.zh: 哈迈德·奥布里 (Ahmad Aubrey) 案件的审判也是一个积极影响的例子。

translation.en: The Satanic Temple is also doing good stuff.
translation.zh: 撒旦神庙也在做好事。

translation.en: However, examples where something is very wrong with the system has always been evident.
translation.zh: 然而，系统出现严重问题的例子显而易见。

translation.en: Religious organizations and institutions should generally be held to the same standards as any other charitable organization.
translation.zh: 通常，宗教组织和机构应遵循与任何其他慈善组织相同的标准。

translation.en: Transparency is the name of the game.
translation.zh: 透明度是游戏的名字。

translation.en: Looking at cases like the Catholic Church, it might be advisable to ensure funds acquired by these tax-exempt religious organizations don't leave the country.
translation.zh: 看看天主教会这样的例子，确保这些免税的宗教组织获得的资金不离开这个国家可能是明智的。

translation.en: When I think of religious memberships, perhaps a co-op model is useful; each member gets a single vote as a stakeholder.
translation.zh: 说到宗教成员资格，合作社模式可能十分有用；作为利益相关者，每个成员都有一票。

translation.en: Hopefully, they are at least contributing to Social Security.
translation.zh: 希望他们至少对社会保障有所贡献。

translation.en: I am not familiar with Teleloading.
translation.zh: 我对远程下载不熟悉。

translation.en: However if you want to open a recent purchased book from #PRS_ORG# in your #PRS_ORG# e reader you would only need to sync your e reader via WiFi and download the book in your e reader to start reading, computer or email transfer is not necessary.
translation.zh: 不过，如果您想在 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器的 #PRS_ORG# 中打开一本最近购买的书，只需要通过 WiFi 同步电子阅读器，并在电子阅读器中下载这本书即可，无需通过电脑或电子邮件传输。

translation.en: If the book still has issues to open after sync in your e reader we can try some trouble shooting process.
translation.zh: 如果在同步电子阅读器后，仍然无法阅读此书，可以试着进行故障排除。

translation.en: I would need to know if the book shows error message, seem blocked or not even appearing in your #PRS_ORG# account inside your #PRS_ORG# e reader.
translation.zh: 我需要知道，此书是否显示了错误信息、是否被阻止或者根本没有出现在您的 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户中。

translation.en: I think it's possible (but I don't know) they were telling them it wasn't safe to drive.
translation.zh: 我认为这是可能的（但我不能确定），他们说开车不安全。

translation.en: When tornadoes get that imminent, the weather guys usually do that "Take cover now!!"
translation.zh: 当龙卷风逼近时，气象专家通常会说“马上找掩体！！”

translation.en: thing because you don't know if it will be in two minutes or ten minutes or what.
translation.zh: 因为你不知道它是两分钟内到，还是十分钟内到。

translation.en: I don't know what right they have to actually forbid people to leave, but I could see where they would be telling them to take cover.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们有什么权利禁止人们离开，但我看到他们告诉人们去哪里躲避。

translation.en: Can you imagine all those people trying to get out of the parking lot when that touched down?
translation.zh: 你能想象当飞机着陆时，所有人都试图离开停机坪吗？

translation.en: They'd all have been killed.
translation.zh: 否则他们必死无疑。

translation.en: BUT if they were like "Keep working!"
translation.zh: 但如果他们说“继续工作！”

translation.en: instead of "Take Shelter!",
translation.zh: 而不是“躲起来！”

translation.en: that's different.
translation.zh: 这是不一样的。

translation.en: Does anybody know if they were still working or if they were sheltering in there somewhere?
translation.zh: 有人知道他们应该继续工作，还是躲在哪里吗？

translation.en: Yes that means when I work out I really don’t care how many calories it burns, and I don’t change my numbers or macros because of how much I burned.
translation.zh: 是的，这意味着我在锻炼时不会真正关心消耗了多少卡路里，我不会因为消耗的热量而改变我的数字或巨量营养素。

translation.en: I (try) to stick to the 1200-1300.
translation.zh: 我（尝试）坚持达到 1200-1300 之间。

translation.en: But if I’m extra hungry, yes I’ll eat something more to fuel my body and accept that weight-loss might be a day slower, or not.
translation.zh: 但如果我特别饿，是的，我会吃更多的东西来给我的身体提供能量，而不在乎减肥的速度是否会变慢。

translation.en: If you’re already doing a 500 calorie cut, an extra piece of steak or even bread after a hard workout is not going to ruin your progress at all.
translation.zh: 如果你已经消耗了 500 卡路里的热量，那么在辛苦锻炼后再吃一块牛排甚至面包，根本不会影响你的锻炼成果。

translation.en: It might just narrow your deficit that one day.
translation.zh: 总有一天可以缩小赤字的。

translation.en: An extra piece of pizza or bowl of ice cream though?
translation.zh: 再多吃一块披萨或一碗冰淇淋？

translation.en: That’s a no go.
translation.zh: 那不行。

translation.en: If you always need to eat more because of working out, consider not cutting so many calories in the first place.
translation.zh: 如果你总是因为锻炼而需要吃得更多，那么从一开始就不要想着消耗这么多的卡路里。

translation.en: Maybe start with 300 deficit.
translation.zh: 也许可以从 300 的热量赤字开始。

translation.en: Hope this helps!
translation.zh: 希望这对你有帮助！

translation.en: Can you please disconnect your eReader from the computer and try a factory reset?
translation.zh: 您能把您的电子阅读器从电脑上断开并尝试重置吗？

translation.en: This will delete the information on your eReader but you can make a back up and transfer the information again afterwards
translation.zh: 这将删除您的电子阅读器上的信息，但您可以先备份，以后再把信息传输回到电子阅读器上

translation.en: You can follow these steps:
translation.zh: 您可以执行以下步骤：

translation.en: To perform a factory reset on your #PRS_ORG#, please follow the steps below:
translation.zh: 要在 #PRS_ORG# 上执行出厂重置，请按以下步骤操作：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap Home at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“主页”。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Tap Factory reset under Advanced.
translation.zh: 在“高级”下点击“出厂重置”。

translation.en: Tap Reset Now.
translation.zh: 点击“立即重置”。

translation.en: PlanetJupiter finally left my office’s solar system
translation.zh: PlanetJupiter 终于离开了办公室的太阳系

translation.en: I posted some years ago about my office nemesis, a woman called PlanetJupiter in my stories.
translation.zh: 几年前，我在我的文章里写过一个叫 PlanetJupiter 的女人，她是我在办公室里的死对头。

translation.en: Not much to say here.
translation.zh: 此处不再赘述。

translation.en: The last time I saw her before Corona, she had lost some weight and seemed to be paying a bit of attention to food groups when she ate lunch, though she was still using her power wheelchair and being a bit smelly.
translation.zh: 上次我在 Corona 前面见到她时，她瘦了一些，午饭时似乎很注意饮食，不过她仍在使用电动轮椅，身上有点臭。

translation.en: I asked how she is, like I ask all my co-workers if I see them.
translation.zh: 我问她怎么样了，就像问候所有同事一样。

translation.en: “Not so good, OP, I found out I have diabetes, so I have to eat fewer carbs.”
translation.zh: “不太好，OP，我查出有糖尿病，必须少吃碳水化合物。”

translation.en: To her slight credit, the lunch had cauliflower rice instead of regular.
translation.zh: 所以，她午餐吃的是花椰菜饭，而不是普通的饭菜。

translation.en: I am a Midwesterner, and have always been nice to PJ’s face, so I told her I was sorry, that sucked, what about this project we’re both on?
translation.zh: 我是中西部人，当着她的面，我表现得很是友善，所以我对她示以同情，说这糟透了，并问我们一起做的项目怎么办？

translation.en: Will she also work late to get it done for the court deadline?
translation.zh: 她也会加班加点，在法庭最后期限前完成工作吗？

translation.en: “Sure, OP.
translation.zh: “当然了，OP。

translation.en: I am saving money to move.”
translation.zh: 我正在攒钱搬家。”

translation.en: This is really rare.
translation.zh: 这可太稀奇了。

translation.en: My state has the lowest out-migration of any state, ever.
translation.zh: 我所在的州是所有州中移民最少的。

translation.en: Where is she moving?
translation.zh: 她要搬到哪里去？

translation.en: To another Midwest city that works a lot in the beef industry.
translation.zh: 她说要搬到另一个牛肉产业发达的中西部城市。

translation.en: I hope they didn’t mistake her for a steer!
translation.zh: 哦，我希望他们不会把她错当成阉牛！

translation.en: It turns out me and others documenting all her slow/bad work, falling asleep at the desk, annoying others, and smelling, has caused her to lose out on positions with all but one of the companies that often hires me, her, and others for contract work.
translation.zh: 事实证明，我和其他人都记得她的工作做得又慢又不好，还会在桌子上睡觉，让人烦躁，身上气味难闻，这些恶习让她屡遭解雇，最后只剩下一个公司经常雇用我、她还有其他人完成合同工作。

translation.en: So she sort of has to move to where family is in that city.
translation.zh: 所以她不得不搬到她的家人所在的城市。

translation.en: She’ll go blight another workplace, but at least not mine.
translation.zh: 她会毁了另一个工作单位，但至少我的保住了。

translation.en: Not that it matters now, because I got a much better remote position.
translation.zh: 不过现在不重要了，因为我已经找到了一个更好的可以远程工作的职位。

translation.en: Assam Anti-CAA Outfits Pay Tributes To People Who Died During Protests
translation.zh: 阿萨姆反 CAA 组织悼念在抗议运动中死亡的人

translation.en: Five agitators were killed during the anti-CAA stirs in Assam two years ago.
translation.zh: 两年前，在阿萨姆邦的反 CAA 风波中，五名示威者被杀。

translation.en: Several organisations in Assam on Sunday paid tributes to the five agitators who were killed in the anti-CAA stir two years ago, and resolved to resume the movement against the Act.
translation.zh: 周日，阿萨姆邦的几个组织对两年前在反 CAA 运动中被杀的五名示威者表示哀悼，并决心恢复反对该法案的运动。

translation.en: Memorial meetings were organised at the residence of Sam Stafford, one of the agitators who died, and a playground in Guwahati, with attendees resolving to once again to intensify the stir against the Citizenship (Amendment) Act.
translation.zh: 追悼会在死者之一山姆·斯塔福德 (Sam Stafford) 的住所和古瓦哈蒂 (Guwahati) 的一个游乐场举行，与会者决心再次升级反对《公民身份（修正案）法案》(Citizenship (Amendment) Act)的运动。

translation.en: The Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti (KMSS), which was among the first groups to organise protests against CAA after it was passed in Parliament, paid tributes to the agitators at Sam Stafford's Hatigaon residence.
translation.zh: KMSS (Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti) 是议会通过 CAA 后第一批组织抗议的团体之一，他们在山姆·斯塔福德位于哈蒂冈的住所向这些死者致敬。

translation.en: Sibsagar MLA Akhil Gogoi, who was a Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti leader during the stir and was jailed for his role in it, while paying floral tributes at the photographs of those who died, said that political parties and "nationalist organisations" must take the lead in resuming the movement.
translation.zh: Sibsagar MLA Akhil Gogoi 在运动期间是 Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti 的领导人，并因其在其中扮演的角色而被监禁，他在向死者的照片献花时表示，政党和“民族主义组织”必须带头恢复运动。

translation.en: Commenting on the artiste fraternity that had taken the centerstage in the 2019 stir, he said, "We can't expect them to organise agitations.
translation.zh: 在谈到占据 2019 年运动中心舞台的艺人兄弟会时，他说，“我们不能指望他们组织煽动。

translation.en: Their help is crucial but they shouldn't be blamed for not reviving the movement."
translation.zh: 他们的帮助至关重要，但他们不应该因为没有恢复运动而受到指责。”

translation.en: All Assam Students' Union (AASU), another key player in the stir, organised a memorial at the Hatigaon Higher Secondary School playground.
translation.zh: 阿萨姆邦学生联合会 (AASU) 是这场运动的另一个关键参与者，它在哈蒂冈高中的操场上组织了一场纪念活动。

translation.en: Speaking on the occasion, AASU chief advisor Samujjal Kumar Bhattacharya said, "It is wrong to say that the anti-CAA movement has died out.
translation.zh: AASU 首席顾问 Samujjal Kumar Bhattacharya 说:“说反 CAA 运动已经消亡是错误的。

translation.en: It had lost its intensity due to the commencement of examinations (in January 2020) and then the pandemic and lockdowns.
translation.zh: 由于开始检查（2020 年 1 月），然后是疫情和封锁，运动不再那么激烈。

translation.en: We will resume the agitation with full intensity once again.
translation.zh: 我们将再次全力鼓动大家。

translation.en: We won't let the sacrifices go in vain," he said.
translation.zh: 我们不会让死者白白牺牲。”

translation.en: Mr Bhattacharya said the anti-CAA agitation will once again be a pan-Northeast one like in 2019.
translation.zh: Bhattacharya 表示，反 CAA 运动将再次像 2019 年那样，成为泛东北地区的运动。

translation.en: Singer-music composer Zubeen Garg, who had taken a leading role in the 2019 protests, also paid his tributes at the programme organised by the AASU.
translation.zh: 在 2019 年抗议活动中发挥主导作用的歌手兼音乐作曲家祖宾·加格 (Zubeen Garg) 也在 AASU 组织的节目中表达了自己的敬意。

translation.en: "We won't accept the CAA and that is for sure.
translation.zh: “我们不会接受 CAA，这是肯定的。

translation.en: The government is trying to confuse us, but we won't allow them to make us accept it," he said.
translation.zh: 政府试图迷惑我们，但我们不会允许他们强迫我们接受。”

translation.en: Several organisations, including AASU, North East Students' Organisation (NESO) and Assam Jatiya Parishad (AJP), had observed "black day" on December 11 to mark two years of the passage of CAA in Parliament.
translation.zh: 一些组织，包括 AASU、东北学生组织 (NESO) 和阿萨姆 Jatiya Parishad (AJP)，在 12 月 11 日庆祝“黑色日”，以纪念 CAA 在议会通过两周年。

translation.en: This year's trend for a second Christmas tree in the bedroom sends sales of smaller spruces soaring
translation.zh: 在卧室里也放一棵圣诞树的流行趋势促使今年小云杉的销量飙升

translation.en: Got just the one Christmas tree?
translation.zh: 你还是只准备一棵圣诞树吗？

translation.en: Then you could be behind the times.
translation.zh: 那你可就落伍了。

translation.en: This year's trend is for a second tree in the bedroom, and it has sent sales of smaller spruces soaring.
translation.zh: 今年的流行趋势是在卧室里也放一棵圣诞树，这使得小云杉的销量飙升。

translation.en: More than a quarter of British homes now boast two festive firs, experts say - and it could be more than a status symbol.
translation.zh: 专家称，超过四分之一的英国家庭现在会在节日准备两棵冷杉，这可能不仅仅是一种身份象征。

translation.en: Both the soothing green colour and the pine aroma are said to be good for mental health and sleep cycles - while even fake trees can help evoke a feeling of nostalgia.
translation.zh: 据说，舒缓的绿色和松树的香气都有利于心理健康和睡眠，即使是假树也能帮助唤起怀旧之情。

translation.en: Other families get two trees so children can decorate one as gaudily as they like, providing a place for any home-made masterpieces, while leaving a more elegantly garlanded fir on more prominent display to impress the neighbours.
translation.zh: 还有的家庭准备两棵树，一棵让孩子们随意装饰，为家里自制的作品提供一个展示之处，留下一棵更优雅的花环冷杉装饰得更加显眼，给邻居留下深刻的印象。

translation.en: Among those buying into the trend, which started in the US, are Carole Middleton, mother of the Duchess of Cambridge, who gets a second tree for grandchildren George, Louis and Charlotte at her home in Bucklebury, West Berkshire.
translation.zh: 剑桥公爵夫人的母亲卡罗尔•米德尔顿也加入了这股风潮，她在位于西伯克郡巴克尔伯里的家中为孙子乔治、路易和夏洛特另外买了一棵圣诞树。

translation.en: Last week, she posted on Instagram: "Once again this year we plan to have two Christmas trees: one for the children to decorate and one which I do myself."
translation.zh: 上周，她在 Instagram 上发帖说：“今年我们计划再买两棵圣诞树：一棵给孩子们装饰，另一棵我自己动手。”

translation.en: British Garden Centres said sales of smaller trees are up 50 per cent this year across its 58 sites.
translation.zh: 英国花园中心表示，今年它的 58 个销售点的小树销量增长了 50%。

translation.en: Director Boyd Douglas-Davies, who is also president of the Horticulture Trades Association, said: "People are trading up from a plant in the bedroom and putting in beautifully decorated trees."
translation.zh: 博伊德·道格拉斯-戴维斯是园艺业协会的主席，他说：“人们热衷于把卧室里的植物换成装饰漂亮的树。”

translation.en: Fellow garden centre chain Squire's reports that 30 per cent of their customers plan on having at least two trees - and more than one in ten intend to have three or more.
translation.zh: 另一家园艺中心连锁店 Squire 的报告称，30% 的客户计划至少购买两棵树，超过十分之一的客户打算购买三棵或更多。

translation.en: Chairman Sarah Squire said: "They give a bedroom a lovely, calming scent that is the perfect aid for a good night's sleep."
translation.zh: 主席莎拉·斯夸尔说：“它们给卧室带来一种好闻的、镇静的气味，能让人晚上睡一个好觉。”

translation.en: Just as bedroom plants have been known to help mental health and purify the air, trees are also said to aid slumber.
translation.zh: 众所周知，卧室里的植物有助于心理健康和净化空气，树木据说也有助于睡眠。

translation.en: Sleep expert Carl Walsh said: "Our brains collect information from our surroundings and this translates into signals releasing hormones in response.
translation.zh: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说：“我们的大脑从周围环境收集信息，然后转化为信号，释放激素。

translation.en: In this instance melatonin and cortisol are the hormones that control your sleep cycle and put your body into a sleepy state."
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，控制睡眠周期的褪黑激素和皮质醇可让你的身体进入昏昏欲睡的状态。”

translation.en: He added that a bedroom tree could also transport people back to a more carefree and youthful era.
translation.zh: 他补充说，卧室里的圣诞树还可以让人们回到更无忧无虑、更年轻的时代。

translation.en: "Christmas can be a pretty stressful time.
translation.zh: “圣诞节可能是一个压力很大的时候。

translation.en: A bedroom tree takes people back to their childhood when they had no responsibilities and can forget about stressful things.
translation.zh: 卧室里的圣诞树可以让人们忘记压力，回到没有负担的童年时代。

translation.en: That is always good for sleep."
translation.zh: 这对睡眠总是有好处的。”

translation.en: I am afraid I would not be able to confirm the price of the bed until it is available on the website again as it was reduced in our winter sale it is likely this will not be the price of the article when it is added back to the website
translation.zh: 现在我可能没法确定床的价格，恐怕要到网站上显示有货的时候才能知道，不过，之前是冬季促销，补货后可能就不是这个价格了

translation.en: Sorry for the inconveniences
translation.zh: 给您带来不便，非常抱歉

translation.en: Is there anything else I can assist you with?
translation.zh: 还有什么可以帮您的吗？

translation.en: This is the first time and I hope the last.
translation.zh: 这是第一次，希望也是最后一次。

translation.en: Have a wonderful rest of your day and happy new year!
translation.zh: 祝您新年快乐，顺顺利利！

translation.en: Makeshift Munster crush Wasps in Champions Cup cracker
translation.zh: 临时组织的芒斯特在冠军杯比赛中击败黄蜂队

translation.en: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.zh: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。

translation.en: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.zh: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。

translation.en: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.zh: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。

translation.en: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.zh: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。

translation.en: Missing 17 players to injury, Wasps also had to contend with the loss of four more to Covid in the morning, resulting in a hasty reconfiguration of the team.
translation.zh: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。

translation.en: Munster, meanwhile, were missing 34 squad personnel because of quarantine following their recent ill-fated United Rugby Championship trip to South Africa, creating five debutants in the starting XV and another seven on the bench.
translation.zh: 与此同时，芒斯特队在最近命运多舛的南非联合橄榄球锦标赛之旅后，由于隔离而致使 34 名队员缺阵，这使得首发的 15 人中有 5 名队员初次登场，另有 7 名替补队员。

translation.en: Crucially, however, Ireland stars such as Tadhg Beirne, Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Keith Earls were present to stiffen their ranks.
translation.zh: 然而，至关重要的是，像塔德赫•贝尔尼、彼得•奥马奥尼、康纳•默里和基思•厄尔斯等爱尔兰明星都出席了比赛，为他们的队伍鼓气。

translation.en: For all the absentees, it was an enjoyable spectacle where it appeared at times anything could happen, at least until Munster showed the extraordinary depth of their playing resources to pull clear.
translation.zh: 对于所有缺席的球员来说，这是一个令人愉快的场面，似乎任何事情都有可能不时地发生，至少在芒斯特展示出他们非凡的板凳深度拉开距离之前是这样的。

translation.en: Wasps' Covid-affected start to the day was compounded when play got underway, with Thomas Young denied a certain try by O'Mahony's excellent covering tackle.
translation.zh: 比赛开始后，黄蜂队受新冠的影响变得更加严重，托马斯·杨拒绝了奥马奥尼出色的掩护拦截。

translation.en: And while Joey Carbery sent a penalty between the uprights to draw first blood for Munster, Jimmy Gopperth struck the crossbar to continue the two-time champions' unfortunate opening.
translation.zh: 当乔伊·卡伯里在两根立柱之间罚出点球，让芒斯特出师告捷时，吉米·戈伯斯击中横梁，延续了两届冠军球队不幸的开局。

translation.en: But their scrum was offering a foothold in the game and it took feverish defence to keep their maul at bay until they produced the first of two turnovers in quick succession.
translation.zh: 但他们的争球为他们在比赛中提供了一个立足点，他们需要疯狂防守来阻止他们的惨败，直到他们第一次连续两次迅速造成失误。

translation.en: Munster were fighting for every ball in defiance of their absentees and their victory prospects received a dramatic boost when Shields was shown his dubious red card, with referee Romain Poite saying his shoulder had caught Kilcoyne's neck.
translation.zh: 芒斯特不顾主力的缺席，为每一个球而战，当希尔兹因为主裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀卡住了基尔科因的脖子而被出示可疑的红牌时，他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的加强。

translation.en: Carbery directed a simple penalty at the post and while he was on target soon after, a dramatic twist followed as Wasps plundered a stunning try through Barbeary.
translation.zh: 卡贝里在门柱上简单地罚了一个点球，当他很快瞄准目标时，一个戏剧性的转折发生了，黄蜂队通过巴巴里完成了一次漂亮的尝试。

translation.en: It concluded an exhilarating spell of end-to-end rugby in which the rivals took it in turns to attack from deep and, having been at the heart of the home advances, Barbeary delivered the telling blow.
translation.zh: 这场比赛结束了一段令人兴奋的连续橄榄球比赛，在这场比赛中，对手们轮流纵深进攻，作为主场进攻的核心，巴巴里发出了有力的一击。

translation.en: A kind bounce off Murray's kick presented Earls with the simplest of tries as Munster hit back and then Frost departed for the sin-bin as the home side were reduced to 13.
translation.zh: 穆雷的一脚射门给了厄尔斯一个最简单的带球触地得分，芒斯特回击，然后弗罗斯特被罚下场，主队人数减少到 13 人。

translation.en: It did not take long for the advantage in personnel to be felt as Beirne started a breakout try that ended with full-back Campbell producing a brilliant finish.
translation.zh: 没过多久，在人员上的优势就显现出来了，贝尔尼开始了一次突破性的带球触地得分，以后卫坎贝尔的精彩进球结束。

translation.en: And Munster were out of sight in the 49th minute when a loose pass during a promising counter-attack fell for Conway to scoop up and complete a simple run-in.
translation.zh: 第 49 分钟，芒斯特出现视线盲区，在一次充满希望的反击中传球失误，康威完成了一次简单的跑进。

translation.en: Hooker Scott Buckley, man of the match on his Munster debut, was the next over from a lineout move and that was the game won, although Michael Le Bourgeois picked a quality line to improve Wasps' final score.
translation.zh: 在芒斯特的处子秀上，本场最佳球员前场中锋斯科特·巴克利是下一名外线球员，这是比赛的胜利，尽管迈克尔·勒·布里克选择了一条高质量的线路来提高黄蜂队的最后得分。

translation.en: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.zh: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应

translation.en: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.zh: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。

translation.en: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.zh: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。

translation.en: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.zh: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。

translation.en: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.zh: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。

translation.en: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.zh: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。

translation.en: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.zh: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。

translation.en: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.zh: 美国国防安全合作局周五表示，它已经批准以 69 亿美元的价格出售四艘洛克希德·马丁公司的战斗护卫舰，以及另一项价值 25 亿美元的计划来升级希腊的 MEKO 级护卫舰。

translation.en: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.zh: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。

translation.en: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.zh: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。

translation.en: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.
translation.zh: 据法国军方称，这一次，美国“警告我们，将会公布这一声明”，而且据称美国“无意继续”出售他们的护卫舰。

translation.en: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.zh: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助

translation.en: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.zh: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。

translation.en: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.zh: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。

translation.en: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.zh: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。

translation.en: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.zh: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。

translation.en: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.zh: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。

translation.en: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.zh: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。

translation.en: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.zh: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。

translation.en: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.zh: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。

translation.en: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.zh: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。

translation.en: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道他需要我的帮助呢？

translation.en: He just said "hello" which plenty of customers say to be polite.
translation.zh: 他只是说“你好”，很多顾客出于礼貌都会这样说。

translation.en: This is the only customer I've had who has just said hello without asking a question, then expected me to know he needed help.
translation.zh: 这是我遇到过的唯一一位没有问题，只有问候，然后又指望我知道他需要帮助的顾客。

translation.en: He didn't say anything rude to me, but his tone of voice was extremely angry the whole time, even though I tried to help him.
translation.zh: 他没有对我说任何不礼貌的话，但从他的语气能听出来，他很生气，即使我已经试着帮他了。

translation.en: Heavy snowfall wreaks havoc in Serbia and much of Balkans
translation.zh: 大雪在塞尔维亚和巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏

translation.en: Heavy snowfall wreaked havoc in much of the Balkans on Sunday, disrupting public transportation.
translation.zh: 周日，大雪在巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏，扰乱了公共交通。

translation.en: Flights were cancelled at Serbia's main airport in Belgrade on Sunday and many areas reported power cuts and damage to buildings.
translation.zh: 周日，位于贝尔格莱德的塞尔维亚主要机场的航班被取消，许多地区断电，建筑物受损。

translation.en: Much of western Serbia was without electricity as authorities warned against unnecessary travel and appealed to people in Serbia to conserve power.
translation.zh: 塞尔维亚西部大部分地区停电，当局警告不进行非必要的旅行，并呼吁塞尔维亚人节约用电。

translation.en: There was some damage to cars and buildings in Belgrade due to the snow.
translation.zh: 大雪对贝尔格莱德的汽车和建筑物造成了一些损坏。

translation.en: Several flights from and to Belgrade's main airport were cancelled because of the weather conditions and a brief power cut to the main terminal, Belgrade media reported.
translation.zh: 据贝尔格莱德媒体报道，由于天气状况和主要航站楼短暂断电，几架往返贝尔格莱德主要机场的航班被取消。

translation.en: A highway leading to the airport was closed for several hours because of a traffic jam caused by the snowfall.
translation.zh: 由于降雪造成的交通堵塞，通往机场的高速公路关闭了几个小时。

translation.en: Passengers on a local train to Belgrade were stuck in snow for seven hours before they were provided bus transportation to the capital.
translation.zh: 前往贝尔格莱德的当地火车上的乘客被困在雪中 7 个小时后，才被安排乘坐公共汽车前往首都。

translation.en: Emergency services have been assisting authorities in the cleanup operation, while another alert for more snow and ice has been issued.
translation.zh: 紧急服务部门一直在协助当局进行清理工作，同时又发布了有关更多冰雪的警报。

translation.en: Meanwhile, in Bulgaria, heavy rains and major floods have been ravaging southern parts of the country over the weekend, forcing authorities there to declare a state of emergency.
translation.zh: 与此同时，保加利亚南部地区周末遭遇暴雨和大洪水，迫使当地政府宣布进入紧急状态。

translation.en: The worst-hit areas were in the Smolyan region, near the border with Greece, where rivers burst their banks to cause the overflowing of roads and the flooding of homes.
translation.zh: 受灾最严重的地区是靠近希腊边境的斯莫利亚地区，那里的河流决堤，导致道路泛滥，房屋被淹没。

translation.en: Several trucks were trapped in a landslide on an intercity road.
translation.zh: 几辆卡车被困在一条发生滑坡的城际公路。

translation.en: Strong winds disrupted power supply in dozens of villages, authorities said.
translation.zh: 当局称，强风中断了数十个村庄的电力供应。

translation.en: Further south in Albania, authorities mobilised police, army and emergency forces to cope with floods following three days of continuous rainfall and snow.
translation.zh: 在更远的南部阿尔巴尼亚，当局动员警察、军队和紧急部队应对连续三天的雨雪造成的洪水。

translation.en: The Vjosa River in the south flooded many areas.
translation.zh: 南部的 Vjosa 河淹没了许多地区。

translation.en: An older couple who had stayed overnight on the rooftop of their house in southwest Albania was rescued by police in the morning.
translation.zh: 一对在阿尔巴尼亚西南部的屋顶上过夜的老夫妇在早上被警方救出。

translation.en: Many roads were temporarily blocked by landslides in the south.
translation.zh: 南部的许多道路因山体滑坡而暂时被封锁。

translation.en: Elsewhere in the northeast and southeast of the country, heavy snow has hampered or temporarily blocked traffic.
translation.zh: 在该国东北部和东南部的其他地方，大雪阻碍或暂时中断了交通。

translation.en: We had power go out a couple of times.
translation.zh: 我们经历过几次停电的情况。

translation.en: Step 1: Get someone on the door immediately.
translation.zh: 步骤 1：马上派人去守住门口。

translation.en: They are security now.
translation.zh: 他们现在就是保安。

translation.en: Don't let anyone in and pay attention to people as they leave (esp kids' hands).
translation.zh: 不要让任何人进来，并注意出去的顾客（尤其是孩子的手）。

translation.en: Step 2: Call Store Manager if they aren't there.
translation.zh: 步骤 2：如果门店经理不在现场，那就打电话给他。

translation.en: Step 3: Those that are at tills and anyone else really are free to wait a couple minutes to see if backup generators can get us going again.
translation.zh: 步骤 3：让那些在收银台的顾客和其他人等待几分钟，看看备用发电机能否让电力恢复。

translation.en: Step 4: Go throughout the store and getting every non employee to leave.
translation.zh: 步骤 4：搜寻全店，让所有非员工人员离开，

translation.en: As well as every cart brought to the front.
translation.zh: 并把每辆购物车都推到前面。

translation.en: Step 5: Go through the carts looking for anything cold and produce.
translation.zh: 步骤 5：把购物车里需要冷藏的加工的商品拣出来。

translation.en: Step 6: Return said cold/produce.
translation.zh: 步骤 6：把它们送回到冷藏区/加工区。

translation.en: Step 7: Cover all non-doored cold i.e. cheese/meat/veggies, etc.
translation.zh: 步骤 7：盖好所有不带门冷藏区的商品，如奶酪/肉类/蔬菜等。

translation.en: Step 8: Sign our names on a sheet of paper as we left to be clocked out.
translation.zh: 步骤 8：离开时在纸上签名，代替下班打卡。

translation.en: (Some were allowed to leave earlier, esp if they weren't comfortable in the dark or didn't still have 6hrs to go).
translation.zh: （有些人被允许提前离开，特别是那些不习惯呆在黑暗中或者不到 6 个小时后就要下班的员工)。

translation.en: It's really dark, even upfront.
translation.zh: 即使门店的前面也很暗。

translation.en: No way can we let customers just hang out.
translation.zh: 我们不能让顾客随便闲逛。

translation.en: I'm not sure why some tills still had some power while others didn't.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么有些收银机仍然有电，有些却没电。

translation.en: Not sure, but I don't think we had any way of having them pay.
translation.zh: 我不确定，但我觉得可能没法收银。

translation.en: I do think items would scan, but no way would we trust the customers to pay later.
translation.zh: 我相信可以扫描商品，但我们不可能相信顾客以后会付款。

translation.en: One time it took only like 3 hrs for power to go back on.
translation.zh: 有一次 3 个小时后就恢复了供电。

translation.en: They had a few of us stay so if it did, as they were told by the power company it should, we could reopen.
translation.zh: 我们当中有些人被留了下来，如果真的像电力公司所说的那样，我们就可以重新营业。

translation.en: I don't mind, as long as we have the choice to stay or not, helping out preserving product as best as we could.
translation.zh: 我不介意，只要我们有留下或离开的选择，我们会尽自己所能保护商品。

translation.en: Not having a choice, as well as endangering customers, is where I draw the line.
translation.zh: 但是，没有选择，同时又会危及顾客，就触碰到了我的底线。

translation.en: This Arab state plans to boost trade with Russia
translation.zh: 这个阿拉伯国家计划加强与俄罗斯的贸易合作

translation.en: The United Arab Emirates plans to increase its trade turnover with Russia to $20 billion in the next five years, the country's Foreign Trade Minister Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi has announced.
translation.zh: 阿拉伯联合酋长国对外贸易部长萨尼·本·艾哈迈德·阿尔·泽尤迪 (Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi) 宣布，该国计划在未来五年内将与俄罗斯的贸易额提高到 200 亿美元。

translation.en: "We are working with the Russian side to increase trade turnover to $20 billion over the next five years and to continue investing in other areas [of economic cooperation]," Al Zeyoudi told RIA news agency on Saturday during a plenary session of the Expo-2020 international forum in the UAE, which had been postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.zh: “我们正在与俄方加强贸易合作，计划在未来五年将贸易额提高到 200 亿美元，并在其他领域（经济合作）继续展开投资合作，”阿尔·泽尤迪于周六在由于新冠疫情而推迟的 2020 年阿联酋国际论坛上对 RIA 通讯社如是说。

translation.en: According to the official, "relations between Abu Dhabi and Moscow are strategic."
translation.zh: 这位官员表示，“阿布扎比和莫斯科之间建立了战略性关系。”

translation.en: He noted that up to 90% of all Russian investments in the Arab world are made in the UAE.
translation.zh: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的投资有 90% 在阿联酋进行。

translation.en: The UAE also significantly invests in Russia, making up some 80% of all Arab investments in Russia's economy.
translation.zh: 阿联酋在俄罗斯也有大量投资，占阿拉伯对俄罗斯经济投资的 80% 左右。

translation.en: "If we are talking about the number of Russian companies in the UAE, it has reached almost 4,000," Al Zeyoudi stated.
translation.zh: 阿尔·泽尤迪说:“阿联酋的俄罗斯公司有将近 4000 家。”

translation.en: According to the minister, the UAE is already investing in several Russian sectors, including the petrochemical industry, oil and gas, the automotive industry and ports, and it plans to broaden this list.
translation.zh: 这位部长称，阿联酋已经在俄罗斯的几个领域进行投资，包括石化工业、石油和天然气、汽车工业和港口，并计划扩大投资范围。

translation.en: In 2020, the trade turnover between the two states reached $3.3 billion, and in the first 10 months of 2021 its volume exceeded $4 billion, reaching a new record, Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin said last week.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯总理米哈伊尔·米什乌斯廷 (Mikhail Mishustin) 上周表示，2020 年，两国之间的贸易额达到 33 亿美元，2021 年前 10 个月的贸易额超过 40 亿美元，创下了新的纪录。

translation.en: According to the Ministry of Economics, this year Russia mainly exported mineral products, precious stones and metals to the UAE, while Russian imports from the Arab country included machinery, equipment and vehicles.
translation.zh: 据俄罗斯经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产、宝石和金属，而从阿拉伯国家进口的产品包括机械、设备和车辆。

translation.en: Dallas Cowboys bring benches to Washington, rivalry heats up
translation.zh: 达拉斯牛仔队把长凳带到华盛顿，竞争加剧

translation.en: The visiting sideline at Washington has a familiar home look for the Dallas Cowboys.
translation.zh: 华盛顿的客场对于达拉斯牛仔队来说就是一个熟悉的主场。

translation.en: After getting word from other teams that the sideline benches at FedEx Field were in major need of an upgrade, the Cowboys brought their own for this showdown game.
translation.zh: 在从其他球队得到消息说联邦快递球场的边线长凳需要升级后，牛仔队自己带来了长凳来参加这场对决。

translation.en: When they arrived at the stadium Sunday, they were already decked out in Cowboys logos and wordmarks.
translation.zh: 当他们周日到达体育场时，长凳上已经加上了牛仔队的标志和文字。

translation.en: The Cowboys heard from the Seahawks, who recently played against Washington on a Monday night and had complaints that the heated benches were malfunctioning.
translation.zh: 牛仔队收到了海鹰队的投诉，海鹰队最近在周一晚上对阵华盛顿队，他们抱怨说加热的板凳出现了故障。

translation.en: Earlier in the week, Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott actually commented about the benefits of playing outdoors in colder games, because of the heated benches are beneficial to his knee injury.
translation.zh: 本周早些时候，牛仔队的跑锋艾泽基尔·艾略特说到在寒冷的户外比赛时，加热的板凳能让他受伤的膝盖更舒服点。

translation.en: The Cowboys just made sure Zeke and his teammates got that opportunity.
translation.zh: 牛仔队只是希望齐克和他的队友知道这一点。

translation.en: This move is just the latest twist in the Dallas-Washington rivalry, one that got juiced up even more this week when Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy predicted a win for his team, prompting some fireworks back and forth with Washington's Ron Rivera and players.
translation.zh: 这一举动只是达拉斯与华盛顿竞争的最新情况，本周，当牛仔队主教练麦克·麦卡锡预测他的球队会赢时，他们之间的竞争就变得更加激烈，这引发了华盛顿队的罗恩·里维拉和球员之间的激烈争论。

translation.en: Washington has beaten the Cowboys in consecutive matchups.
translation.zh: 华盛顿队在比赛中连续击败了牛仔队。

translation.en: It has been more than 30 years since it has defeated Dallas in three straight meetings (1986-88).
translation.zh: 自华盛顿上次在 1986-88 赛季中连续三次击败达拉斯以来，已经过去 30 多年前了。

translation.en: Cowboys fans made up more than half of the crowd at FedEx field, which was evident based on the blue and white jerseys in the stands.
translation.zh: 在联邦快递球场，牛仔队的球迷占了一半以上，从看台上蓝白相间的球衣就可以看出这一点。

translation.en: Owner Jerry Jones foreshadowed that earlier this week when he said on 105.3 FM in Dallas, "We have always sold more Cowboys' hats, caps, T-shirts.
translation.zh: 球队老板杰里·琼斯本周早些时候在达拉斯的 105.3 FM 节目中就预告了这一点，他说:“我们总能卖出更多的牛仔帽、帽子和 T 恤。

translation.en: We've always had our greatest fan support positive coming from Washington, that's outside the Dallas area.
translation.zh: 在达拉斯以外，华盛顿球迷对我们是最热情的。

translation.en: Outside the Texas area, Washington is where we have the most support of all when it comes to all the things you might count."
translation.zh: 除了德克萨斯州，华盛顿是我们可以收获最多支持的地方。”

translation.en: Warning of stormy weather as strong winds present 'danger to life'
translation.zh: 暴风天气预警，强风会“危及生命”

translation.en: Storm force winds are set to batter northern parts of Scotland with disruption to travel, especially ferry services, expected.
translation.zh: 强风暴将袭击苏格兰北部地区，预计旅游，尤其是轮渡服务将受到影响。

translation.en: The northwest, Shetland and Orkney will face gusts of up to 85mph overnight on Sunday into Monday morning.
translation.zh: 从周日到周一早上，西北部的设得兰群岛和奥克尼群岛将遭遇时速 85 英里的大风。

translation.en: The Hebrides, and western coast of the Highlands and parts of Argyll and Bute have been warned to be prepared for flying debris presenting a "danger to life" and causing damage to buildings.
translation.zh: 赫布里底群岛、高地西部海岸以及阿盖尔和比特的部分地区已经收到预警，要做好准备应对飘扬的碎片，这些碎片会“危及生命”，并对建筑物造成破坏。

translation.en: Experts are warning that the bad weather could lead to power cuts, road and bridge closures, and cancellations to air and ferry services.
translation.zh: 专家警告说，恶劣的天气可能会导致停电、道路和桥梁关闭、航空和轮渡服务取消。

translation.en: It follows two named storms, Arwen and Barra, that brought widespread disruption to large parts of the country.
translation.zh: 此前，两场命名为“亚文”(Arwen) 和“巴拉”(Barra) 的风暴给该国大部分地区造成了广泛的破坏。

translation.en: More than 100,000 homes had their power cut off by the extreme damage wrought by Storm Arwen on November 26 and 27.
translation.zh: 11 月 26 日和 27 日，飓风“亚玟”造成的巨大破坏导致超过 10 万户家庭断电。

translation.en: Storm Barra disrupted supplies to around 10,000 just 11 days later on December 7.
translation.zh: 11 天 后的 12 月 7 日，飓风“芭拉”中断了约 1 万人的物资供应。

translation.en: STV weather presenter Philip Petrie said it was very nearly three in a row.
translation.zh: STV 天气节目主持人菲利普·皮特里 (Philip Petrie) 说，这三次几乎是连着来的。

translation.en: The Met Office were keeping an eye on a low pressure system that is skirting along northwestern areas overnight on Sunday bringing with it very strong winds and squally, heavy showers.
translation.zh: 英国气象局 (Met Office) 一直在密切关注周日夜间沿西北地区移动的低压系统，该系统带来了强风和狂风暴雨。

translation.en: The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for wind with the first coming into force from 9pm on Sunday covering the Western Isles, and parts of the Highlands and Argyll and Bute.
translation.zh: 英国气象局发布了大风黄色天气预警，第一次预警将于周日晚上 9 点开始生效，覆盖西群岛、高地、阿盖尔和比特的部分地区。

translation.en: "Within this area there is the potential of gusts reaching 80-85mph causing disruption to ferries and also some damage and power cuts," Philip said.
translation.zh: 菲利普说:“在这个地区，风速可能达到每小时 80-85 英里，造成渡轮中断，也会造成一些损坏和电力中断。”

translation.en: A further warning comes into effect at midnight on Sunday covering Orkney and Shetland.
translation.zh: 下一个预警将于周日午夜开始生效，覆盖奥克尼和设得兰群岛。

translation.en: "This warning lasts until midday Monday as the centre of the low pressure system moves close to the Northern Isles, again bringing gusts of 80-85mph along coasts and locally in excess of 90mph in some areas," Philip said.
translation.zh: 菲利普说:“随着低压系统中心靠近北岛，这一预警将持续到周一中午，沿海地区再次迎来时速 80-85 英里的阵风，局部地区的风速超过 90 英里每小时。”

translation.en: "It is very fast moving though, so will clear away by Monday afternoon, with things beginning to ease and calm by lunchtime.
translation.zh: “飓风移动速度极快，所以周一下午就会消失，午饭前天气会开始缓和、平静。

translation.en: For the rest of the week things will continue to settle ahead of next weekend."
translation.zh: 在本周余下的时间里，下周末前天气将逐步稳定下来。”

translation.en: Yes, I amopening the account
translation.zh: 是的，我正在打开这个帐户

translation.en: Please follow the next process
translation.zh: 请按照以下步骤操作

translation.en: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.zh: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。

translation.en: Go to the Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.zh: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。

translation.en: Tap Repair.
translation.zh: 点击“修复”。
